AB Full: Except for the requirements of Sentences 7.2.6.3.(2) and 7.2.6.3.(3), a wading pool shall be constructed in accordance with the remainder of this Section.
AB Variations: Except for the requirements of Sentences 7.2.6.3.(2) and 7.2.6.3.(3), a wading pool shall be constructed in accordance with the remainder of this Section.

AB Full: Threaded firefighting hose couplings and fittings shall have threads that are 38 mm Straight Iron Pipe Thread (S.I.P.T.) on 38 mm couplings, or 3.15 threads per cm with a major thread diameter between 75.95 mm and 75.69 mm for male threads and 76.45 mm for female threads on 65 mm hose couplings and hydrant connections.
AB Variations: Threaded firefighting hose couplings and fittings shall have threads that are 38 mm Straight Iron Pipe Thread (S.I.P.T.) on 38 mm couplings, or 3.15 threads per cm with a major thread diameter between 75.95 mm and 75.69 mm for male threads and 76.45 mm for female threads on 65 mm hose couplings and hydrant connections.

AB Full: A receiving pool shall have a deck area on not less than three sides.
AB Variations: A receiving pool shall have a deck area on not less than three sides.

AB Full: Portable fire extinguishers shall be provided and installed in conformance with the NFC(AE).
AB Variations: Portable fire extinguishers shall be provided and installed in conformance with the NFC(AE).

AB Full: Ramps shall comply with the requirements of Article 3.8.3.5.
AB Variations: Ramps shall comply with the requirements of Article 3.8.3.5.

AB Full: Where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are present, electrical equipment shall conform to CSA C22.1-18 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I for hazardous locations. (See Notes A-4.1.4.1.(1)and A-5.1.2.1.(1).)
AB Variations: Where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are present, electrical equipment shall conform to CSA C22.1-18 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I for hazardous locations. (See Notes A-4.1.4.1.(1)and A-5.1.2.1.(1).)

AB Full: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 7.5.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
AB Variations: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 7.5.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

AB Full: The distance between the side of a water slide flume discharge and a receiving pool side wall shall be not less than 1.5 m.
AB Variations: The distance between the side of a water slide flume discharge and a receiving pool side wall shall be not less than 1.5 m.

AB Full: An illuminated exit sign shall be installed at each exit location serving a building having an occupant load more than 20.
AB Variations: An illuminated exit sign shall be installed at each exit location serving a building having an occupant load more than 20.

AB Full: The person in charge of a building classified as a Group B, Division 2 occupancy shall appoint a fire marshal.
AB Variations: The person in charge of a building classified as a Group B, Division 2 occupancy shall appoint a fire marshal.

AB Full: To ensure proper operation, monthly inspections and tests shall be made of all safety shut-off valves and other fire safety devices, with particular attention directed to normally open, fusible-link-operated valves, float valves and automatic controls.
AB Variations: To ensure proper operation, monthly inspections and tests shall be made of all safety shut-off valves and other fire safety devices, with particular attention directed to normally open, fusible-link-operated valves, float valves and automatic controls.

AB Full: Where storage tanks for service water heaters are of steel, they shall be coated with zinc, vitreous enamel (glass lined), hydraulic cement or other corrosion-resistant material.
AB Variations: Where storage tanks for service water heaters are of steel, they shall be coated with zinc, vitreous enamel (glass lined), hydraulic cement or other corrosion-resistant material.

AB Full: One or more thermometers shall be inserted in the piping system.
AB Variations: One or more thermometers shall be inserted in the piping system.

AB Full: A building with sleeping accommodation shall be provided with water closets on the basis of 1 unit for every 5 persons or part thereof up to 15 persons and 1 unit for every 15 persons or part thereof in excess of 15 persons, lavatories on the basis of 1 unit for every 5 persons or part thereof, showers or bathtubs on the basis of 1 unit for every 11 persons or part thereof, urinals in washrooms for males on the basis of 1 unit for every 25 persons or part thereof, and laundry facilities.
AB Variations: A building with sleeping accommodation shall be provided with water closets on the basis of 1 unit for every 5 persons or part thereof up to 15 persons and 1 unit for every 15 persons or part thereof in excess of 15 persons, lavatories on the basis of 1 unit for every 5 persons or part thereof, showers or bathtubs on the basis of 1 unit for every 11 persons or part thereof, urinals in washrooms for males on the basis of 1 unit for every 25 persons or part thereof, and laundry facilities.

AB Full: Walls made of logs placed horizontally shall have interlocking intersections that will prevent the collection of water in the joints, or butt against and be firmly attached to a vertical corner post.
AB Variations: Walls made of logs placed horizontally shall have interlocking intersections that will prevent the collection of water in the joints, or butt against and be firmly attached to a vertical corner post.

AB Full: A smoke alarm conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S531-14 Smoke Alarms shall be installed on the ceiling of every room providing sleeping accommodation.
AB Variations: A smoke alarm conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S531-14 Smoke Alarms shall be installed on the ceiling of every room providing sleeping accommodation.

AB Full: Hose bibcocks that are not less than 19 mm in diameter shall be provided so that all parts of a swimming pool or water spray park deck area, dressing rooms, shower and toilet areas are within reach of a 30 m hose.
AB Variations: Hose bibcocks that are not less than 19 mm in diameter shall be provided so that all parts of a swimming pool or water spray park deck area, dressing rooms, shower and toilet areas are within reach of a 30 m hose.

AB Full: Exhaust air from a ventilation system required in Sentence 6.9.1.2.(3) shall be discharged outdoors and shall be taken from a point within 300 mm of the floor near a wall, with at least one makeup air inlet located near the opposite wall.
AB Variations: Exhaust air from a ventilation system required in Sentence 6.9.1.2.(3) shall be discharged outdoors and shall be taken from a point within 300 mm of the floor near a wall, with at least one makeup air inlet located near the opposite wall.

AB Full: If dressing room facilities are required to be at a different elevation from the swimming pool deck or water spray park area, a ramp with a slip-resistant surface and a slope not more than 1:12 shall be provided.
AB Variations: If dressing room facilities are required to be at a different elevation from the swimming pool deck or water spray park area, a ramp with a slip-resistant surface and a slope not more than 1:12 shall be provided.

AB Full: Around the portion of a diving board or platform that is not above the water, a top guardrail that extends not less than 760 mm above the diving board or platform shall be provided if the diving board or platform is more than 1 m above the water surface.
AB Variations: Around the portion of a diving board or platform that is not above the water, a top guardrail that extends not less than 760 mm above the diving board or platform shall be provided if the diving board or platform is more than 1 m above the water surface.

AB Full: The material used on the floors, walls and ceilings of a personal service facility shall provide surfaces that can be easily cleaned.
AB Variations: The material used on the floors, walls and ceilings of a personal service facility shall provide surfaces that can be easily cleaned.

AB Full: Except as permitted by Articles 3.2.4.10. and 3.2.4.19., fire alarm systems, including the voice communication capability where provided, shall be installed in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S524-14 Installation of Fire Alarm Systems
AB Variations: Except as permitted by Articles 3.2.4.10. and 3.2.4.19., fire alarm systems, including the voice communication capability where provided, shall be installed in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S524-14 Installation of Fire Alarm Systems

AB Full: Where roughed-in plumbing is installed for the future installation of a bathroom or water closet room, provision shall be made for the future installation of the required ventilation.
AB Variations: Where roughed-in plumbing is installed for the future installation of a bathroom or water closet room, provision shall be made for the future installation of the required ventilation.

AB Full: An emergency lighting system that automatically operates whenever the main lighting system fails shall be provided for an indoor swimming pool or water spray park, or an outdoor swimming pool or water spray park with lighting for night use.
AB Variations: An emergency lighting system that automatically operates whenever the main lighting system fails shall be provided for an indoor swimming pool or water spray park, or an outdoor swimming pool or water spray park with lighting for night use.

AB Full: An electrical equipment vault that contains a dielectric-liquid filled piece of electrical equipment shall not be drained to a storm drain, a sanitary drainage system or a private sewage disposal system, and shall have a floor that drains to a sump with sufficient capacity for all the liquid in the transformers, or a curb of sufficient height around each transformer so that all the liquid in the transformer can be contained within the curb system.
AB Variations: An electrical equipment vault that contains a dielectric-liquid filled piece of electrical equipment shall not be drained to a storm drain, a sanitary drainage system or a private sewage disposal system, and shall have a floor that drains to a sump with sufficient capacity for all the liquid in the transformers, or a curb of sufficient height around each transformer so that all the liquid in the transformer can be contained within the curb system.

AB Full: Installation and fastening of insulation shall ensure that it cannot be displaced during transportation.
AB Variations: Installation and fastening of insulation shall ensure that it cannot be displaced during transportation.

AB Full: Walls or partitions of wood construction shall be mounted not less than 200 mm above the finished floor.
AB Variations: Walls or partitions of wood construction shall be mounted not less than 200 mm above the finished floor.

AB Full: It is permitted to use movable tanks for dispensing flammable liquids or combustible liquids into the fuel tanks of vehicles or other motorized equipment provided such movable tanks are used in conformance with the requirements of this Part for storage tanks. (See Note A-4.1.8.4.(1).)
AB Variations: It is permitted to use movable tanks for dispensing flammable liquids or combustible liquids into the fuel tanks of vehicles or other motorized equipment provided such movable tanks are used in conformance with the requirements of this Part for storage tanks. (See Note A-4.1.8.4.(1).)

AB Full: Dispensers at marine fuel-dispensing stations shall be in a location that will prevent watercraft or aircraft impact, or other physical damage.
AB Variations: Dispensers at marine fuel-dispensing stations shall be in a location that will prevent watercraft or aircraft impact, or other physical damage.

AB Full: The operator of a self-service outlet, a fuel-dispensing station or a marine fuel-dispensing station shall ensure that immediate corrective action is taken when a condition is identified that contravenes Sentences 4.6.10.1.(1) and 4.6.10.1.(2).
AB Variations: The operator of a self-service outlet, a fuel-dispensing station or a marine fuel-dispensing station shall ensure that immediate corrective action is taken when a condition is identified that contravenes Sentences 4.6.10.1.(1) and 4.6.10.1.(2).

AB Full: If special fittings, fixtures or provisions are needed to comply with the tie-down instructions, they shall be supplied with the module.
AB Variations: If special fittings, fixtures or provisions are needed to comply with the tie-down instructions, they shall be supplied with the module.

AB Full: This Subsection applies only to buildings conforming to Articles 3.2.2.50. and 3.2.2.58. of Division B of the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: This Subsection applies only to buildings conforming to Articles 3.2.2.50. and 3.2.2.58. of Division B of the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Spaces designated for use by persons using wheelchairs referred to in Sentence 3.8.2.3.(3) shall be clear and level, or level with removable seats, not less than 900 mm wide and 1 525 mm long to allow a person using a wheelchair to enter from a side approach and 1 220 mm long where the person using a wheelchair enters from the front or rear of the space, arranged so that at least 2 designated spaces are side by side, located adjoining a barrier-free path of travel without infringing on egress from any row of seating or any aisle requirements, and situated, as part of the designated seating plan, to provide a choice of viewing location and a clear view of the event taking place.
AB Variations: Spaces designated for use by persons using wheelchairs referred to in Sentence 3.8.2.3.(3) shall be clear and level, or level with removable seats, not less than 900 mm wide and 1 525 mm long to allow a person using a wheelchair to enter from a side approach and 1 220 mm long where the person using a wheelchair enters from the front or rear of the space, arranged so that at least 2 designated spaces are side by side, located adjoining a barrier-free path of travel without infringing on egress from any row of seating or any aisle requirements, and situated, as part of the designated seating plan, to provide a choice of viewing location and a clear view of the event taking place.

AB Full: This Subsection applies to the storage and handling of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in self-service storage buildings within the scope of Section 3.9. of Division B of the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: This Subsection applies to the storage and handling of flammable liquids and combustible liquids in self-service storage buildings within the scope of Section 3.9. of Division B of the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Except as permitted by Sentence 9.36.3.1.(3), this Subsection is concerned with the efficient use of energy by systems and equipment used for heating, ventilating and air-conditioning (HVAC).
AB Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence 9.36.3.1.(3), this Subsection is concerned with the efficient use of energy by systems and equipment used for heating, ventilating and air-conditioning (HVAC).

AB Full: No person shall sell, offer for sale, purchase, lease or otherwise distribute 65 mm or 38 mm hose couplings or fittings intended for use on firefighting hose or fire hydrants by a municipal fire department or fire brigade, unless the couplings and fittings comply with this Section.
AB Variations: No person shall sell, offer for sale, purchase, lease or otherwise distribute 65 mm or 38 mm hose couplings or fittings intended for use on firefighting hose or fire hydrants by a municipal fire department or fire brigade, unless the couplings and fittings comply with this Section.

AB Full: Buildings or portions of buildings that are not required to be conditioned spaces are exempted from the requirements of this Section. (See Note A-9.36.1.3.(5).) (See also Article 9.25.2.1.)
AB Variations: Buildings or portions of buildings that are not required to be conditioned spaces are exempted from the requirements of this Section. (See Note A-9.36.1.3.(5).) (See also Article 9.25.2.1.)

AB Full: Fire emergency procedures conforming to this Section shall be provided for every building containing an assembly, care, treatment or detention occupancy, every building required by the NBC(AE) to have a fire alarm system, demolition and construction sites regulated under part 5., storage areas required to have a fire safety plan in conformance with Articles 3.2.2.5.and 3.3.2.9., areas where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are stored or handled, in conformance with Article 4.1.5.5., and areas where hazardous processes or operations occur, in conformance with Article 5.1.5.1.
AB Variations: Fire emergency procedures conforming to this Section shall be provided for every building containing an assembly, care, treatment or detention occupancy, every building required by the NBC(AE) to have a fire alarm system, demolition and construction sites regulated under part 5., storage areas required to have a fire safety plan in conformance with Articles 3.2.2.5.and 3.3.2.9., areas where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are stored or handled, in conformance with Article 4.1.5.5., and areas where hazardous processes or operations occur, in conformance with Article 5.1.5.1.

AB Full: Except as permitted by Sentence 10.4.6.1.(2), every floor area shall be served by not less than 2 exits.
AB Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence 10.4.6.1.(2), every floor area shall be served by not less than 2 exits.

AB Full: Areas or rooms communicating with the landing area shall be separated therefrom by a fire separation conforming to the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Areas or rooms communicating with the landing area shall be separated therefrom by a fire separation conforming to the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Emergency planning measures conforming to part 2. shall be provided for storage areas described in Article 3.3.6.1.
AB Variations: Emergency planning measures conforming to part 2. shall be provided for storage areas described in Article 3.3.6.1.

AB Full: Smoke alarms shall be installed in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S553-14 Installation of Smoke Alarms (See Note A-2.1.3.3.(3).)
AB Variations: Smoke alarms shall be installed in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S553-14 Installation of Smoke Alarms (See Note A-2.1.3.3.(3).)

AB Full: Floors that are wet traffic areas for bathers, including dressing rooms, shall have a smooth but slip-resistant finish, be impervious to moisture with no open cracks or joints, be drained with no pooling of water, have a slope not less than 1:50 and not more than 1:25 in the direction of the closest drain, and have rounded corners for ease of cleaning where floors intersect with walls and partitions.
AB Variations: Floors that are wet traffic areas for bathers, including dressing rooms, shall have a smooth but slip-resistant finish, be impervious to moisture with no open cracks or joints, be drained with no pooling of water, have a slope not less than 1:50 and not more than 1:25 in the direction of the closest drain, and have rounded corners for ease of cleaning where floors intersect with walls and partitions.

AB Full: Access to heavy-duty equipment, such as bulldozers, front-end loaders and similar equipment, shall be included in the fire safety plan.
AB Variations: Access to heavy-duty equipment, such as bulldozers, front-end loaders and similar equipment, shall be included in the fire safety plan.

AB Full: Except as permitted by Sentence 9.13.2.5.(2) and required by Sentence 9.25.2.1.(3), thermal insulation conforming with Table 9.25.2.1. shall be provided for attached garages and heated detached garages serving a building of residential occupancy.
AB Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence 9.13.2.5.(2) and required by Sentence 9.25.2.1.(3), thermal insulation conforming with Table 9.25.2.1. shall be provided for attached garages and heated detached garages serving a building of residential occupancy.

AB Full: This Part applies to a one-storeybuilding without sleeping accommodation, that is not more than 1 200 m2 in building area, and if sprinklered, is not more than 2 400 m2 in building area, and with sleeping accommodation, that is not more than 600 m2 in building area, and if sprinklered, is not more than 1 200 m2 in building area, and a two-storeybuilding without sleeping accommodation, that is not more than 600 m2 in building area, and if sprinklered, is not more than 1 200 m2 in building area, and with sleeping accommodation, that is not more than 300 m2 in building area, and if sprinklered, is not more than 600 m2 in building area.
AB Variations: This Part applies to a one-storeybuilding without sleeping accommodation, that is not more than 1 200 m2 in building area, and if sprinklered, is not more than 2 400 m2 in building area, and with sleeping accommodation, that is not more than 600 m2 in building area, and if sprinklered, is not more than 1 200 m2 in building area, and a two-storeybuilding without sleeping accommodation, that is not more than 600 m2 in building area, and if sprinklered, is not more than 1 200 m2 in building area, and with sleeping accommodation, that is not more than 300 m2 in building area, and if sprinklered, is not more than 600 m2 in building area.

AB Full: The operators of day-care centres shall provide a staffing ratio for the supervision of children as required by the Child Care Licensing Act and its Regulations.
AB Variations: The operators of day-care centres shall provide a staffing ratio for the supervision of children as required by the Child Care Licensing Act and its Regulations.

AB Full: A whirlpool or group of whirlpools shall be designed to be served by an independent circulation system.
AB Variations: A whirlpool or group of whirlpools shall be designed to be served by an independent circulation system.

AB Full: In the application of Tables 11.2.1.2.-A to 11.2.1.2.-D and Table 11.2.1.3., each component includes the total of all elements or assemblies of the exterior envelope of the room or space that are of the same type, and the combined area of those elements or assemblies is to be used as the component area.
AB Variations: In the application of Tables 11.2.1.2.-A to 11.2.1.2.-D and Table 11.2.1.3., each component includes the total of all elements or assemblies of the exterior envelope of the room or space that are of the same type, and the combined area of those elements or assemblies is to be used as the component area.

AB Full: The smoke alarm in Sentence 10.6.3.5.(1) shall be installed by permanent connection to an electrical circuit, shall be equipped to show that it is in operating condition, shall have no disconnect switches between the overcurrent device and the smoke alarm, and is permitted to be tied into the building fire alarm system.
AB Variations: The smoke alarm in Sentence 10.6.3.5.(1) shall be installed by permanent connection to an electrical circuit, shall be equipped to show that it is in operating condition, shall have no disconnect switches between the overcurrent device and the smoke alarm, and is permitted to be tied into the building fire alarm system.

AB Full: Storage areas shall be maintained free of combustible vegetation for at least 4.5 m from the stored material and shall be not less than 30 m from brush and forested areas.
AB Variations: Storage areas shall be maintained free of combustible vegetation for at least 4.5 m from the stored material and shall be not less than 30 m from brush and forested areas.

AB Full: All piping that is part of a recirculating service water heating loop shall be covered with piping insulation that is at least 12 mm thick.
AB Variations: All piping that is part of a recirculating service water heating loop shall be covered with piping insulation that is at least 12 mm thick.

AB Full: Electrical installations for a swimming pool or water spray park shall comply with the Electrical Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.
AB Variations: Electrical installations for a swimming pool or water spray park shall comply with the Electrical Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.

AB Full: Where rooms or spaces within a building contain a high-hazard industrial occupancy, such occupancy shall be separated from the remainder of the building by fire separations in conformance with this Code and the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Where rooms or spaces within a building contain a high-hazard industrial occupancy, such occupancy shall be separated from the remainder of the building by fire separations in conformance with this Code and the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Industrial relocatable accommodation shall conform with the requirements of the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Industrial relocatable accommodation shall conform with the requirements of the NBC(AE).

AB Full: All aspects of chlorine storage and handling shall conform to the Occupational Health and Safety Act and its Regulations.
AB Variations: All aspects of chlorine storage and handling shall conform to the Occupational Health and Safety Act and its Regulations.

AB Full: Every plumbing system and private sewage disposal system shall be designed and installed in conformance with the Plumbing Code Regulation and Private Sewage Disposal Systems Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.
AB Variations: Every plumbing system and private sewage disposal system shall be designed and installed in conformance with the Plumbing Code Regulation and Private Sewage Disposal Systems Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.

AB Full: The occupancy classification of buildings intended for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.6.(1) of Division B of the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: The occupancy classification of buildings intended for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.6.(1) of Division B of the NBC(AE).

AB Full: All firefighting hose couplings shall meet the test requirements of ULC CAN/ULC-S513-11 Threaded Couplings for 38 mm and 65 mm Fire Hose for pull, compression, hardness, and corrosion resistance.
AB Variations: All firefighting hose couplings shall meet the test requirements of ULC CAN/ULC-S513-11 Threaded Couplings for 38 mm and 65 mm Fire Hose for pull, compression, hardness, and corrosion resistance.

AB Full: The fence and gate around a swimming pool or a private swimming pool shall be constructed so that all horizontal and diagonal members are located on the swimming pool side, and not permit the passage of a sphere whose diameter is more than 100 mm.
AB Variations: The fence and gate around a swimming pool or a private swimming pool shall be constructed so that all horizontal and diagonal members are located on the swimming pool side, and not permit the passage of a sphere whose diameter is more than 100 mm.

AB Full: If a fire alarm and detection system, or part thereof, is inoperative for more than 2 hours for any reason, the owner shall notify the fire department, and when directed, provide acceptable surveillance within the building continuously until the fire alarm and detection system is restored to operating condition.
AB Variations: If a fire alarm and detection system, or part thereof, is inoperative for more than 2 hours for any reason, the owner shall notify the fire department, and when directed, provide acceptable surveillance within the building continuously until the fire alarm and detection system is restored to operating condition.

AB Full: A voice communication system or systems integrated with the general fire alarm system shall be provided in buildings as specified in Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: A voice communication system or systems integrated with the general fire alarm system shall be provided in buildings as specified in Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC(AE).

AB Full: The circulation system includes the piping, pumps, hair catchers, filters, flow meters, water heaters, thermometers, pressure and vacuum gauges, suction cleaners and all appurtenances.
AB Variations: The circulation system includes the piping, pumps, hair catchers, filters, flow meters, water heaters, thermometers, pressure and vacuum gauges, suction cleaners and all appurtenances.

AB Full: Where Class IA or IB liquids specified in Subsection 4.1.2. of Division B of the NFC(AE) are dispensed within a storage room, the room shall be designed to prevent critical structural and mechanical damage from an internal explosion in conformance with good engineering practice such as that described in NFPA 68-2013 Explosion Protection by Deflagration Venting (See Note A-3.3.6.4.(2).)
AB Variations: Where Class IA or IB liquids specified in Subsection 4.1.2. of Division B of the NFC(AE) are dispensed within a storage room, the room shall be designed to prevent critical structural and mechanical damage from an internal explosion in conformance with good engineering practice such as that described in NFPA 68-2013 Explosion Protection by Deflagration Venting (See Note A-3.3.6.4.(2).)

AB Full: The principal ventilation system shall incorporate the following components: a principal ventilation fan complying with this Article, and provision for the introduction of outdoor air to the dwelling unit, in conformance with Article 9.32.3.4. or 9.32.3.5.
AB Variations: The principal ventilation system shall incorporate the following components: a principal ventilation fan complying with this Article, and provision for the introduction of outdoor air to the dwelling unit, in conformance with Article 9.32.3.4. or 9.32.3.5.

AB Full: Additional outside access for public swimming pools shall be provided to the equipment and mechanical room.
AB Variations: Additional outside access for public swimming pools shall be provided to the equipment and mechanical room.

AB Full: Fixed access shall be provided to rooftop heating, ventilating or air-conditioning equipment that is installed on a sloped roof.
AB Variations: Fixed access shall be provided to rooftop heating, ventilating or air-conditioning equipment that is installed on a sloped roof.

AB Full: Hypochlorinators or other adjustable output rate chemical feeding equipment shall conform to the requirements of NSF/ANSI 50-2017 Equipment and Chemicals for Swimming Pools, Spas, Hot Tubs and Other Recreational Water Facilities bear the seal of an approved testing laboratory, have no cross-connection with any domestic water supply, and include positive features to prevent siphoning if installed above the swimming pool.
AB Variations: Hypochlorinators or other adjustable output rate chemical feeding equipment shall conform to the requirements of NSF/ANSI 50-2017 Equipment and Chemicals for Swimming Pools, Spas, Hot Tubs and Other Recreational Water Facilities bear the seal of an approved testing laboratory, have no cross-connection with any domestic water supply, and include positive features to prevent siphoning if installed above the swimming pool.

AB Full: Roof design shall allow for the effects of drifting snow.
AB Variations: Roof design shall allow for the effects of drifting snow.

AB Full: Where a building is divided into more than one fire compartment with respect to Sentence 3.2.1.7.(1), the compartments shall be divided by fire separations having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h.
AB Variations: Where a building is divided into more than one fire compartment with respect to Sentence 3.2.1.7.(1), the compartments shall be divided by fire separations having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h.

AB Full: In areas where general cargo is handled or where piping might be subject to physical damage from vehicles, watercraft or aircraft, the piping shall be protected by means of guarding devices.
AB Variations: In areas where general cargo is handled or where piping might be subject to physical damage from vehicles, watercraft or aircraft, the piping shall be protected by means of guarding devices.

AB Full: The requirements regarding fire-resistance rating and type of cladding-sheathing assembly shall not apply to the exposing building face or projections from an exposing building face of a dwelling unit facing a detached garage or accessory building, or a garage or accessory building facing a dwelling unit, where the detached garage or accessory building serves only one dwelling unit or a house with a secondary suite, the detached garage or accessory building is located on the same property as that dwelling unit, and the dwelling unit served by the detached garage or accessory building is the only major occupancy on the property.
AB Variations: The requirements regarding fire-resistance rating and type of cladding-sheathing assembly shall not apply to the exposing building face or projections from an exposing building face of a dwelling unit facing a detached garage or accessory building, or a garage or accessory building facing a dwelling unit, where the detached garage or accessory building serves only one dwelling unit or a house with a secondary suite, the detached garage or accessory building is located on the same property as that dwelling unit, and the dwelling unit served by the detached garage or accessory building is the only major occupancy on the property.

AB Full: All flooring in storage areas shall be constructed of noncombustible materials, as stated in Sentence 3.3.6.6.(5) of Division B of the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: All flooring in storage areas shall be constructed of noncombustible materials, as stated in Sentence 3.3.6.6.(5) of Division B of the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Stairs or ramps used in a swimming pool shall have a slip-resistant surface sufficiently sloped toward the swimming pool to prevent an accumulation of settleable solids.
AB Variations: Stairs or ramps used in a swimming pool shall have a slip-resistant surface sufficiently sloped toward the swimming pool to prevent an accumulation of settleable solids.

AB Full: Where a building or part of building is designed for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids, there is no limit on the total quantity of storage per fire compartment provided the building or part of building is separated from adjacent buildings or parts of buildings by a firewall having a fire-resistance rating of at least 4 h, or spatial separation in conformance with the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Where a building or part of building is designed for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids, there is no limit on the total quantity of storage per fire compartment provided the building or part of building is separated from adjacent buildings or parts of buildings by a firewall having a fire-resistance rating of at least 4 h, or spatial separation in conformance with the NBC(AE).

AB Full: A sign used to direct traffic shall be diamond-shaped and of material not less rigid than 6 mm thick plywood, not less than 450 mm by 450 mm in size and mounted at one corner on a substantial pole not less than 1.2 m long, red on one side with black corner areas so that the red area is a regular 8-sided figure, and with the word "STOP" in clearly distinguishable white letters not less than 150 mm high located centrally on the sign, yellow on the other side with the word "SLOW" in clearly distinguishable black letters not less than 150 mm high located centrally on the sign, or symbols recognized by the International Traffic Code, and maintained in a clean condition when being used.
AB Variations: A sign used to direct traffic shall be diamond-shaped and of material not less rigid than 6 mm thick plywood, not less than 450 mm by 450 mm in size and mounted at one corner on a substantial pole not less than 1.2 m long, red on one side with black corner areas so that the red area is a regular 8-sided figure, and with the word "STOP" in clearly distinguishable white letters not less than 150 mm high located centrally on the sign, yellow on the other side with the word "SLOW" in clearly distinguishable black letters not less than 150 mm high located centrally on the sign, or symbols recognized by the International Traffic Code, and maintained in a clean condition when being used.

AB Full: Where batt/loose-fill insulation is used in a wall assembly, not less than full-cavity insulation shall be provided.
AB Variations: Where batt/loose-fill insulation is used in a wall assembly, not less than full-cavity insulation shall be provided.

AB Full: All steam room and sauna room floor finishes shall be slip-resistant when wet.
AB Variations: All steam room and sauna room floor finishes shall be slip-resistant when wet.

AB Full: Capacity requirements under Sentence 3.2.5.7.(1) do not apply to a building that is sprinklered in conformance with NFPA 13-2013 Installation of Sprinkler Systems NFPA 13R-2013 Installation of Sprinkler Systems in Low-Rise Residential Occupancies or NFPA 13D-2016 Installation of Sprinkler Systems in One- and Two-Family Dwellings and Manufactured Homes
AB Variations: Capacity requirements under Sentence 3.2.5.7.(1) do not apply to a building that is sprinklered in conformance with NFPA 13-2013 Installation of Sprinkler Systems NFPA 13R-2013 Installation of Sprinkler Systems in Low-Rise Residential Occupancies or NFPA 13D-2016 Installation of Sprinkler Systems in One- and Two-Family Dwellings and Manufactured Homes

AB Full: Except as provided in Sentence 3.9.3.1.(5) or unless the building is sprinklered throughout, each individual tenancy in a multiple-tenant self-storage warehouse classified as an industrial occupancy shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min.
AB Variations: Except as provided in Sentence 3.9.3.1.(5) or unless the building is sprinklered throughout, each individual tenancy in a multiple-tenant self-storage warehouse classified as an industrial occupancy shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min.

AB Full: If adaptable dwelling units or barrier-free dwelling units are provided, one parking stall per dwelling unit shall be provided for use by persons with physical disabilities.
AB Variations: If adaptable dwelling units or barrier-free dwelling units are provided, one parking stall per dwelling unit shall be provided for use by persons with physical disabilities.

AB Full: If the resistance to overturning, calculated as the sum of the stabilizing moment of dead load only, is less than twice the overturning moment due to the live loads acting on the building, provision for the attachment of tie-down devices shall be made in the construction of the modules.
AB Variations: If the resistance to overturning, calculated as the sum of the stabilizing moment of dead load only, is less than twice the overturning moment due to the live loads acting on the building, provision for the attachment of tie-down devices shall be made in the construction of the modules.

AB Full: If a fire alarm system is required by Sentence 10.6.3.1.(1), heat detectors conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S530-M91 Heat Actuated Fire Detectors for Fire Alarm Systems shall be placed in each service room, storage room, kitchen and clothes drying area.
AB Variations: If a fire alarm system is required by Sentence 10.6.3.1.(1), heat detectors conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S530-M91 Heat Actuated Fire Detectors for Fire Alarm Systems shall be placed in each service room, storage room, kitchen and clothes drying area.

AB Full: Thermostatic control of the heat supply shall be provided in each dwelling unit.
AB Variations: Thermostatic control of the heat supply shall be provided in each dwelling unit.

AB Full: Reset capability for emergency shut-off switches required by Sentence 4.6.4.2.(1) shall be restricted to manual operation.
AB Variations: Reset capability for emergency shut-off switches required by Sentence 4.6.4.2.(1) shall be restricted to manual operation.

AB Full: Sentence 10.4.9.1.(1) applies to the space beneath the module and to a roof space in addition to other parts of the building.
AB Variations: Sentence 10.4.9.1.(1) applies to the space beneath the module and to a roof space in addition to other parts of the building.

AB Full: Rooms, corridors, shafts and other spaces shall be separated where practicable by fire separations conforming to the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Rooms, corridors, shafts and other spaces shall be separated where practicable by fire separations conforming to the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.2.18.(2), an automatic sprinkler system conforming to the requirements of Articles 3.2.4.7., Article 3.2.4.8., Article 3.2.4.9. and Article 3.2.5.12. shall be installed throughout a building regulated by one or more of Articles 3.2.2.20., Article 3.2.2.21., Article 3.2.2.22., Article 3.2.2.23., Article 3.2.2.24., Article 3.2.2.26., Article 3.2.2.27., Article 3.2.2.29., Article 3.2.2.31., Article 3.2.2.33., Article 3.2.2.36., Article 3.2.2.37., Article 3.2.2.38., Article 3.2.2.39., Article 3.2.2.40., Article 3.2.2.41., Article 3.2.2.42., Article 3.2.2.43., Article 3.2.2.44., Article 3.2.2.45., Article 3.2.2.46., Article 3.2.2.47., Article 3.2.2.48., Article 3.2.2.49., Article 3.2.2.50., Article 3.2.2.51., Article 3.2.2.54., Article 3.2.2.55., Article 3.2.2.57., Article 3.2.2.58., Article 3.2.2.59., Article 3.2.2.61., Article 3.2.2.63., Article 3.2.2.64., Article 3.2.2.65., Article 3.2.2.67., Article 3.2.2.69., Article 3.2.2.70., Article 3.2.2.71., Article 3.2.2.72., Article 3.2.2.74., Article 3.2.2.75., Article 3.2.2.77., Article 3.2.2.79., Article 3.2.2.80., Article 3.2.2.82., Article 3.2.2.84., Article 3.2.2.86. and Article 3.2.2.88.
AB Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.2.18.(2), an automatic sprinkler system conforming to the requirements of Articles 3.2.4.7., Article 3.2.4.8., Article 3.2.4.9. and Article 3.2.5.12. shall be installed throughout a building regulated by one or more of Articles 3.2.2.20., Article 3.2.2.21., Article 3.2.2.22., Article 3.2.2.23., Article 3.2.2.24., Article 3.2.2.26., Article 3.2.2.27., Article 3.2.2.29., Article 3.2.2.31., Article 3.2.2.33., Article 3.2.2.36., Article 3.2.2.37., Article 3.2.2.38., Article 3.2.2.39., Article 3.2.2.40., Article 3.2.2.41., Article 3.2.2.42., Article 3.2.2.43., Article 3.2.2.44., Article 3.2.2.45., Article 3.2.2.46., Article 3.2.2.47., Article 3.2.2.48., Article 3.2.2.49., Article 3.2.2.50., Article 3.2.2.51., Article 3.2.2.54., Article 3.2.2.55., Article 3.2.2.57., Article 3.2.2.58., Article 3.2.2.59., Article 3.2.2.61., Article 3.2.2.63., Article 3.2.2.64., Article 3.2.2.65., Article 3.2.2.67., Article 3.2.2.69., Article 3.2.2.70., Article 3.2.2.71., Article 3.2.2.72., Article 3.2.2.74., Article 3.2.2.75., Article 3.2.2.77., Article 3.2.2.79., Article 3.2.2.80., Article 3.2.2.82., Article 3.2.2.84., Article 3.2.2.86. and Article 3.2.2.88.

AB Full: Operations such as the hoisting of major components onto a tall building or other activities that constitute a hazard from which the public cannot be protected by barricades, covered ways or similar means shall not be carried out until the street or other public way is closed.
AB Variations: Operations such as the hoisting of major components onto a tall building or other activities that constitute a hazard from which the public cannot be protected by barricades, covered ways or similar means shall not be carried out until the street or other public way is closed.

AB Full: The keys required to recall elevators and to permit independent operation of each elevator shall be kept in the locations required by Sentence 2.5.1.3.(1).
AB Variations: The keys required to recall elevators and to permit independent operation of each elevator shall be kept in the locations required by Sentence 2.5.1.3.(1).

AB Full: When an underground storage tank is to be reused for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids, the authority having jurisdiction shall be notified.
AB Variations: When an underground storage tank is to be reused for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids, the authority having jurisdiction shall be notified.

AB Full: A water-operated gas chlorinator shall provide an automatic shutoff of gas when water pressure fails and shall vent leakage to the outside atmosphere.
AB Variations: A water-operated gas chlorinator shall provide an automatic shutoff of gas when water pressure fails and shall vent leakage to the outside atmosphere.

AB Full: Where rooms are provided for the storage of combustible waste materials, such rooms shall conform to the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Where rooms are provided for the storage of combustible waste materials, such rooms shall conform to the NBC(AE).

AB Full: In buildings or areas described in Article 2.8.1.1., the required fire safety plan shall include the safety measures described in this Subsection for the safe conducting of hot works. (See Note A-5.2.3.7.(1).)
AB Variations: In buildings or areas described in Article 2.8.1.1., the required fire safety plan shall include the safety measures described in this Subsection for the safe conducting of hot works. (See Note A-5.2.3.7.(1).)

AB Full: If soil surrounding the storage tanks described in Sentence 4.3.17.1.(1) is found to be contaminated, the owner shall notify the authority having jurisdiction, when requested, provide a report showing the extent of the site soil contamination, and remove, treat or replace the contaminated soil in a manner acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction.
AB Variations: If soil surrounding the storage tanks described in Sentence 4.3.17.1.(1) is found to be contaminated, the owner shall notify the authority having jurisdiction, when requested, provide a report showing the extent of the site soil contamination, and remove, treat or replace the contaminated soil in a manner acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction.

AB Full: Foamed plastic shall have a flame-spread rating not more than 25.
AB Variations: Foamed plastic shall have a flame-spread rating not more than 25.

AB Full: Water supply required by Sentences 3.3.2.16.(1)and 3.3.2.16.(2) shall be available so that any part of the storage area can be reached by using not more than 150 m of hose.
AB Variations: Water supply required by Sentences 3.3.2.16.(1)and 3.3.2.16.(2) shall be available so that any part of the storage area can be reached by using not more than 150 m of hose.

AB Full: Where applicable, spill containment sumps shall be installed in accordance with part 4.
AB Variations: Where applicable, spill containment sumps shall be installed in accordance with part 4.

AB Full: Where wiring or electrical equipment is located in areas in which flammable gases or vapours, combustible dusts or combustible fibres are present in quantities sufficient to create a hazard, such wiring and electrical equipment shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.2.(4) of Division B of the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Where wiring or electrical equipment is located in areas in which flammable gases or vapours, combustible dusts or combustible fibres are present in quantities sufficient to create a hazard, such wiring and electrical equipment shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.2.(4) of Division B of the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Where tactile signage is installed, it shall be not less than 60 mm high, raised approximately 0.7 mm above the surface, be located not more than 1 200 mm above the finished floor, begin not more than 150 mm from the door or entrance, be contrasting in colour with the surface on which it is applied, and include Braille identification by use of Braille dots not less than 1 mm in relief, located directly below the tactile signage.
AB Variations: Where tactile signage is installed, it shall be not less than 60 mm high, raised approximately 0.7 mm above the surface, be located not more than 1 200 mm above the finished floor, begin not more than 150 mm from the door or entrance, be contrasting in colour with the surface on which it is applied, and include Braille identification by use of Braille dots not less than 1 mm in relief, located directly below the tactile signage.

AB Full: Materials selected for components and accessories used in and around a water slide flume shall have all parts with external surfaces and edges that may come into contact with a slider assembled, arranged and finished so that they will not constitute a cutting, pinching, puncturing or abrasion hazard in casual contact and in intended use.
AB Variations: Materials selected for components and accessories used in and around a water slide flume shall have all parts with external surfaces and edges that may come into contact with a slider assembled, arranged and finished so that they will not constitute a cutting, pinching, puncturing or abrasion hazard in casual contact and in intended use.

AB Full: Except as required by Article 3.8.3.6., the minimum widths of exits shall conform to Tables 3.4.3.2.-A and 3.4.3.2.-B.
AB Variations: Except as required by Article 3.8.3.6., the minimum widths of exits shall conform to Tables 3.4.3.2.-A and 3.4.3.2.-B.

AB Full: Where wiring or electrical equipment is located in areas in which flammable gases or vapours, combustible dusts or combustible fibres are present in quantities sufficient to create a hazard, such wiring and electrical equipment shall conform to the Electrical Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act. (See Note A-3.3.6.2.(4).)
AB Variations: Where wiring or electrical equipment is located in areas in which flammable gases or vapours, combustible dusts or combustible fibres are present in quantities sufficient to create a hazard, such wiring and electrical equipment shall conform to the Electrical Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act. (See Note A-3.3.6.2.(4).)

AB Full: Entryways, kitchens, washrooms, laundry rooms and other areas of a dwelling unit shall be designed with an unobstructed turning diameter of not less than 1 500 mm.
AB Variations: Entryways, kitchens, washrooms, laundry rooms and other areas of a dwelling unit shall be designed with an unobstructed turning diameter of not less than 1 500 mm.

AB Full: Insulation shields shall be installed around chimneys and gas vents to ensure that appropriate clearances are maintained when insulation is used in attics.
AB Variations: Insulation shields shall be installed around chimneys and gas vents to ensure that appropriate clearances are maintained when insulation is used in attics.

AB Full: Design floor loads in Group D occupancies shall be not less than 2.4 kPa.
AB Variations: Design floor loads in Group D occupancies shall be not less than 2.4 kPa.

AB Full: The power-ventilated enclosure required in Article 5.5.4.2. and its exhaust duct system shall conform to Article 6.3.4.4. of Division B of the NBC(AE) and be provided with instructions for its use and the operation of the ventilation system, and be provided with means to control accidental spillage.
AB Variations: The power-ventilated enclosure required in Article 5.5.4.2. and its exhaust duct system shall conform to Article 6.3.4.4. of Division B of the NBC(AE) and be provided with instructions for its use and the operation of the ventilation system, and be provided with means to control accidental spillage.

AB Full: Except for a flow-through water spray park, the perimeter of a spray deck or splash area of a water spray park shall be surrounded by a deck that is not less than 1.5 m wide, sloped not less than 1:50 and not more than 1:25 away from the spray deck or splash area, and drained to waste.
AB Variations: Except for a flow-through water spray park, the perimeter of a spray deck or splash area of a water spray park shall be surrounded by a deck that is not less than 1.5 m wide, sloped not less than 1:50 and not more than 1:25 away from the spray deck or splash area, and drained to waste.

AB Full: Where a standpipe system is to be installed in a building under construction or alteration, the system shall be installed progressively in conformance with Subsection 3.2.5. of Division B of the NBC(AE) in areas permitted to be occupied.
AB Variations: Where a standpipe system is to be installed in a building under construction or alteration, the system shall be installed progressively in conformance with Subsection 3.2.5. of Division B of the NBC(AE) in areas permitted to be occupied.

AB Full: Ventilation requirements shall be in accordance with ASHRAE ANSI/ASHRAE 62-2001 Ventilation for Acceptable Indoor Air Quality
AB Variations: Ventilation requirements shall be in accordance with ASHRAE ANSI/ASHRAE 62-2001 Ventilation for Acceptable Indoor Air Quality

AB Full: Ramps, ladders or recessed stairs shall be provided at the shallow end of a swimming pool if the water depth is greater than 600 mm.
AB Variations: Ramps, ladders or recessed stairs shall be provided at the shallow end of a swimming pool if the water depth is greater than 600 mm.

AB Full: If the authority having jurisdiction grants permission to abandon a storage tank in place in accordance with Sentence 4.3.17.2.(3), the owner shall be notified in writing.
AB Variations: If the authority having jurisdiction grants permission to abandon a storage tank in place in accordance with Sentence 4.3.17.2.(3), the owner shall be notified in writing.

AB Full: During construction and in addition to the means of access required by Sentences 5.6.1.4.(2)and 5.6.1.4.(3), at least one stairway shall be provided that consists of treads and risers complying with the dimensional requirements of Article 3.4.6.8. of Division B of the NBC(AE), is equipped with one handrail conforming to Sentences 3.4.6.5.(5), (6), (7), (11), (13), and (14) of Division B of the NBC(AE), is not less than 900 mm wide, and is equipped with guards that are not less than 920 mm high when measured vertically to the top of the guard from a line drawn through the outside edges of the stair nosings, and not less than 1070 mm high around landings.
AB Variations: During construction and in addition to the means of access required by Sentences 5.6.1.4.(2)and 5.6.1.4.(3), at least one stairway shall be provided that consists of treads and risers complying with the dimensional requirements of Article 3.4.6.8. of Division B of the NBC(AE), is equipped with one handrail conforming to Sentences 3.4.6.5.(5), (6), (7), (11), (13), and (14) of Division B of the NBC(AE), is not less than 900 mm wide, and is equipped with guards that are not less than 920 mm high when measured vertically to the top of the guard from a line drawn through the outside edges of the stair nosings, and not less than 1070 mm high around landings.

AB Full: Nozzles for standpipe and hose systems shall conform to Sentence 3.2.5.11.(7) of Division B of the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Nozzles for standpipe and hose systems shall conform to Sentence 3.2.5.11.(7) of Division B of the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Except as permitted by Sentences 2.3.1.3.(2) and 2.3.1.3.(3), decorative materials on walls or ceilings of occupanciesshall have a flame-spread rating not greater than that required for the interior finish of the space in which they are located.
AB Variations: Except as permitted by Sentences 2.3.1.3.(2) and 2.3.1.3.(3), decorative materials on walls or ceilings of occupanciesshall have a flame-spread rating not greater than that required for the interior finish of the space in which they are located.

AB Full: No person shall repair or service the cargo tank of a tank vehicle in a building unless all flammable liquids and combustible liquids have been removed from the cargo tank and stored in a storage tank or container constructed and installed in accordance with this Part, the cargo tank has been purged with steam of flammable vapours or combustible vapours, outside the building or in a well-ventilated area, to less than 10% of the lower explosive limit, and while the cargo tank is being repaired, it is monitored for the presence of flammable vapours and combustible vapours using combustible gas detection equipment.
AB Variations: No person shall repair or service the cargo tank of a tank vehicle in a building unless all flammable liquids and combustible liquids have been removed from the cargo tank and stored in a storage tank or container constructed and installed in accordance with this Part, the cargo tank has been purged with steam of flammable vapours or combustible vapours, outside the building or in a well-ventilated area, to less than 10% of the lower explosive limit, and while the cargo tank is being repaired, it is monitored for the presence of flammable vapours and combustible vapours using combustible gas detection equipment.

AB Full: Except for a building that is constructed in accordance with Article 3.2.2.50., a building of combustible construction that contains a residential occupancy shall have no occupied floor level more than 11 m above the lowest exit level. (See Note A-3.2.1.8.(1).)
AB Variations: Except for a building that is constructed in accordance with Article 3.2.2.50., a building of combustible construction that contains a residential occupancy shall have no occupied floor level more than 11 m above the lowest exit level. (See Note A-3.2.1.8.(1).)

AB Full: Except as provided in Sentence 5.5.4.3.(2), the ventilation system for a power-ventilated enclosure required in Article 5.5.4.2. shall conform to Article 6.3.4.3. of Division B of the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Except as provided in Sentence 5.5.4.3.(2), the ventilation system for a power-ventilated enclosure required in Article 5.5.4.2. shall conform to Article 6.3.4.3. of Division B of the NBC(AE).

AB Full: The minimum residual pressure at the hydraulically most remote hose station shall be 300 kPa, with a flow rate not less than 5 L/s.
AB Variations: The minimum residual pressure at the hydraulically most remote hose station shall be 300 kPa, with a flow rate not less than 5 L/s.

AB Full: In a module specifically produced to be transported by aircraft, the clear ceiling height shall be not less than 2 m over at least 90% of the floor area and shall be not less than 1.9 m over the remaining floor area.
AB Variations: In a module specifically produced to be transported by aircraft, the clear ceiling height shall be not less than 2 m over at least 90% of the floor area and shall be not less than 1.9 m over the remaining floor area.

AB Full: The surface of an above-ground swimming pool platform shall be flush with the top of the swimming pool tank.
AB Variations: The surface of an above-ground swimming pool platform shall be flush with the top of the swimming pool tank.

AB Full: When piping referred to in Sentence 4.5.6.10.(1) contains Class I liquids, the trench shall be provided with ventilation designed to prevent the accumulation of flammable vapours in accordance with Sentence 6.9.1.2.(2) of Division B of the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: When piping referred to in Sentence 4.5.6.10.(1) contains Class I liquids, the trench shall be provided with ventilation designed to prevent the accumulation of flammable vapours in accordance with Sentence 6.9.1.2.(2) of Division B of the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Appropriate forms required by Sentence 6.1.1.5.(1) are included in NFPA NY-FPS-93 Fire Protection Systems: Inspection, Test and Maintenance Manual ULC CAN/ULC-S536-13 Inspection and Testing of Fire Alarm Systems or ULC CAN/ULC-S537-13 Verification of Fire Alarm Systems
AB Variations: Appropriate forms required by Sentence 6.1.1.5.(1) are included in NFPA NY-FPS-93 Fire Protection Systems: Inspection, Test and Maintenance Manual ULC CAN/ULC-S536-13 Inspection and Testing of Fire Alarm Systems or ULC CAN/ULC-S537-13 Verification of Fire Alarm Systems

AB Full: Except where a ramp is incorporated in the design, a whirlpool that has an area less than 6 m2 or has no interior dimension more than 2.5 m is permitted to have the clear deck space on 25% of its perimeter less than 900 mm but not less than 300 mm.
AB Variations: Except where a ramp is incorporated in the design, a whirlpool that has an area less than 6 m2 or has no interior dimension more than 2.5 m is permitted to have the clear deck space on 25% of its perimeter less than 900 mm but not less than 300 mm.

AB Full: A sump or blow-off device shall be provided at the lowest part of the piping system to permit cleaning and draining.
AB Variations: A sump or blow-off device shall be provided at the lowest part of the piping system to permit cleaning and draining.

AB Full: The required clearance from the hood or canopy to combustible material may be waived if a 50 mm air space, having no materials in it, separates the hood from a noncombustible material backed by not less than 25 mm of mineral wool insulation which protects the combustible material.
AB Variations: The required clearance from the hood or canopy to combustible material may be waived if a 50 mm air space, having no materials in it, separates the hood from a noncombustible material backed by not less than 25 mm of mineral wool insulation which protects the combustible material.

AB Full: Smoke alarms conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S531-14 Smoke Alarms shall be installed in each dwelling unit and, except for care, treatment or detention occupancies required to have a fire alarm system, in each sleeping room not within a dwelling unit.
AB Variations: Smoke alarms conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S531-14 Smoke Alarms shall be installed in each dwelling unit and, except for care, treatment or detention occupancies required to have a fire alarm system, in each sleeping room not within a dwelling unit.

AB Full: Attendants on duty at fuel-dispensing stations shall supervise the dispensing of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, activate the controls to permit the dispensing of fuel at an individual dispenser only after the customer at the unit is ready to activate the nozzle, prevent the dispensing of flammable liquids and combustible liquids into containers that do not conform to Article 4.2.3.1., or are in a vehicle, take appropriate measures to prevent sources of ignition from creating a hazard at the dispensers, take appropriate action in the event of a spill to reduce the risk of fire, shut off the power to all dispensers in the event of a spill or fire, perform routine visual inspections in accordance with Article 4.5.10.5., and notify the fire department forthwith in accordance with Sentence 4.1.6.4.(1) when a spill or accident occurs that involves flammable liquids or combustible liquids.
AB Variations: Attendants on duty at fuel-dispensing stations shall supervise the dispensing of flammable liquids and combustible liquids, activate the controls to permit the dispensing of fuel at an individual dispenser only after the customer at the unit is ready to activate the nozzle, prevent the dispensing of flammable liquids and combustible liquids into containers that do not conform to Article 4.2.3.1., or are in a vehicle, take appropriate measures to prevent sources of ignition from creating a hazard at the dispensers, take appropriate action in the event of a spill to reduce the risk of fire, shut off the power to all dispensers in the event of a spill or fire, perform routine visual inspections in accordance with Article 4.5.10.5., and notify the fire department forthwith in accordance with Sentence 4.1.6.4.(1) when a spill or accident occurs that involves flammable liquids or combustible liquids.

AB Full: Where dwelling units are required to be adaptable in accordance with Sentence 3.8.1.1.(3), they shall be designed in accordance with this Subsection.
AB Variations: Where dwelling units are required to be adaptable in accordance with Sentence 3.8.1.1.(3), they shall be designed in accordance with this Subsection.

AB Full: Except as otherwise provided in this Code, where fire alarm, standpipe and sprinkler systems are provided, they shall be designed and installed in conformance with the NBC(AE). (See Note A-2.1.3.1.(1).)
AB Variations: Except as otherwise provided in this Code, where fire alarm, standpipe and sprinkler systems are provided, they shall be designed and installed in conformance with the NBC(AE). (See Note A-2.1.3.1.(1).)

AB Full: A deck shall be designed to be free of obstacles for the full minimum required width, be designed to be free of tripping hazards such as uneven surfaces or changes in elevation, and have its edges bevelled, tapered, or otherwise designed to eliminate sharp corners.
AB Variations: A deck shall be designed to be free of obstacles for the full minimum required width, be designed to be free of tripping hazards such as uneven surfaces or changes in elevation, and have its edges bevelled, tapered, or otherwise designed to eliminate sharp corners.

AB Full: Where required by the NFC(AE), cylinders of dangerous goods classified as flammable gases stored indoors shall be located in a room that is separated from the remainder of the building by a gas-tight fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of at least 2 h, that is located on an exterior wall of the building, that can be entered from the exterior, and whose closures leading to the interior of the building are equipped with self-closing devices that keep the closures closed when not in use, and constructed so as to prevent the migration of gases from the room into other parts of the building.
AB Variations: Where required by the NFC(AE), cylinders of dangerous goods classified as flammable gases stored indoors shall be located in a room that is separated from the remainder of the building by a gas-tight fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of at least 2 h, that is located on an exterior wall of the building, that can be entered from the exterior, and whose closures leading to the interior of the building are equipped with self-closing devices that keep the closures closed when not in use, and constructed so as to prevent the migration of gases from the room into other parts of the building.

AB Full: The depth of water to a seat or bench in a whirlpool shall be not more than 600 mm.
AB Variations: The depth of water to a seat or bench in a whirlpool shall be not more than 600 mm.

AB Full: No person shall store or permit to be stored, tires or shredded tires in outdoor storage piles that exceed an individual pile volume of 300 m3, an individual storage area of 100 m2, or a storage pile height of 3 m.
AB Variations: No person shall store or permit to be stored, tires or shredded tires in outdoor storage piles that exceed an individual pile volume of 300 m3, an individual storage area of 100 m2, or a storage pile height of 3 m.

AB Full: Hose connections for 65 mm diam hose are not required in a building that is not more than 25 m high, measured between grade and the ceiling level of the top storey and in which an automatic sprinkler system is not installed.
AB Variations: Hose connections for 65 mm diam hose are not required in a building that is not more than 25 m high, measured between grade and the ceiling level of the top storey and in which an automatic sprinkler system is not installed.

AB Full: The materials used in and around a water slide flume shall ensure that the operational strength of the entire assembly and each of its components is not adversely affected by exposure to rain, snow, ice, sunlight, local normal temperature extremes, local wind pressures, expected local air pollution products, and the mechanical, electrical and chemical environment in and around the water slide flume.
AB Variations: The materials used in and around a water slide flume shall ensure that the operational strength of the entire assembly and each of its components is not adversely affected by exposure to rain, snow, ice, sunlight, local normal temperature extremes, local wind pressures, expected local air pollution products, and the mechanical, electrical and chemical environment in and around the water slide flume.

AB Full: A wading pool shall have a floor with a maximum slope of 1:25 and a minimum slope of 1:50, depth of not more than 600 mm, and freeboard of not more than 150 mm.
AB Variations: A wading pool shall have a floor with a maximum slope of 1:25 and a minimum slope of 1:50, depth of not more than 600 mm, and freeboard of not more than 150 mm.

AB Full: A water slide flume shall be designed to prevent a hazardous concentration of disinfectant fumes and enclosed sections shall be ventilated if necessary.
AB Variations: A water slide flume shall be designed to prevent a hazardous concentration of disinfectant fumes and enclosed sections shall be ventilated if necessary.

AB Full: Door and window frames and baseboards shall be contrasting in colour to doors, walls and floors.
AB Variations: Door and window frames and baseboards shall be contrasting in colour to doors, walls and floors.

AB Full: Counters intended for the installation of a kitchen sink or a cooktop shall be provided with a means of adjusting their height so that the counter surface is not less than 710 mm above the finished floor, and not more than the height of the adjacent counter surface.
AB Variations: Counters intended for the installation of a kitchen sink or a cooktop shall be provided with a means of adjusting their height so that the counter surface is not less than 710 mm above the finished floor, and not more than the height of the adjacent counter surface.

AB Full: Except as provided in Sentence 3.8.2.5.(4), where parking stalls are required by the development authority, made pursuant to the Municipal Government Act and its Regulations, parking stalls for use by persons with disabilities shall be provided in conformance with Table 3.8.2.5.
AB Variations: Except as provided in Sentence 3.8.2.5.(4), where parking stalls are required by the development authority, made pursuant to the Municipal Government Act and its Regulations, parking stalls for use by persons with disabilities shall be provided in conformance with Table 3.8.2.5.

AB Full: Except as required by Sentence 10.4.1.3.(3), a corridor shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a wall having not less than a 5 min membrane protection on each face.
AB Variations: Except as required by Sentence 10.4.1.3.(3), a corridor shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a wall having not less than a 5 min membrane protection on each face.

AB Full: If a fire alarm system or sprinkler system is required to transmit a signal to the fire department in conformance with the NBC(AE), a key box shall be installed on the exterior wall of the building in proximity to the principal entrance.
AB Variations: If a fire alarm system or sprinkler system is required to transmit a signal to the fire department in conformance with the NBC(AE), a key box shall be installed on the exterior wall of the building in proximity to the principal entrance.

AB Full: The owner may be granted permission to abandon the storage tank in place if the authority having jurisdiction is satisfied that the storage tank is located in whole or in part beneath a permanent building or other facility making excavation impracticable, of a size or type of construction that makes excavation impracticable, inaccessible to the heavy equipment necessary for removal of the storage tank, or situated so that removal of the storage tank would endanger the structural integrity of nearby buildings or other facilities.
AB Variations: The owner may be granted permission to abandon the storage tank in place if the authority having jurisdiction is satisfied that the storage tank is located in whole or in part beneath a permanent building or other facility making excavation impracticable, of a size or type of construction that makes excavation impracticable, inaccessible to the heavy equipment necessary for removal of the storage tank, or situated so that removal of the storage tank would endanger the structural integrity of nearby buildings or other facilities.

AB Full: A minimum of two fire department access routes conforming to Article 3.2.5.6. of Division B of the NBC(AE) and located as remotely as possible from each other shall be provided for each tire storage area.
AB Variations: A minimum of two fire department access routes conforming to Article 3.2.5.6. of Division B of the NBC(AE) and located as remotely as possible from each other shall be provided for each tire storage area.

AB Full: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 9.38.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
AB Variations: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 9.38.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

AB Full: Where flammable liquids and combustible liquids are processed, handled, stored, dispensed or used within rooms or enclosed spaces, ventilation shall conform to the appropriate provincial or territorial regulations or municipal bylaws, or in the absence of such legislation, to this Part and the NBC(AE). (See Note A-4.1.7.1.(1).)
AB Variations: Where flammable liquids and combustible liquids are processed, handled, stored, dispensed or used within rooms or enclosed spaces, ventilation shall conform to the appropriate provincial or territorial regulations or municipal bylaws, or in the absence of such legislation, to this Part and the NBC(AE). (See Note A-4.1.7.1.(1).)

AB Full: Receptacles for recyclable material shall be emptied when full.
AB Variations: Receptacles for recyclable material shall be emptied when full.

AB Full: Not less than 2 duplex receptacles shall be installed in each sleeping room.
AB Variations: Not less than 2 duplex receptacles shall be installed in each sleeping room.

AB Full: All bottom slopes of a swimming pool shall be directed to the main drains where such drains are provided.
AB Variations: All bottom slopes of a swimming pool shall be directed to the main drains where such drains are provided.

AB Full: If it is considered impracticable to carry out the internal inspection required by Sentence 4.3.17.2.(5), the owner shall conduct precision leak tests if so directed by the authority having jurisdiction. (See part 4.)
AB Variations: If it is considered impracticable to carry out the internal inspection required by Sentence 4.3.17.2.(5), the owner shall conduct precision leak tests if so directed by the authority having jurisdiction. (See part 4.)

AB Full: Provision shall be made for directing water flow to poor circulation areas, including recessed ladders, steps, nooks and steep slopes.
AB Variations: Provision shall be made for directing water flow to poor circulation areas, including recessed ladders, steps, nooks and steep slopes.

AB Full: The equipment and mechanical room shall be reasonably accessible from the swimming pool enclosure, using doors that are locked to unauthorized persons.
AB Variations: The equipment and mechanical room shall be reasonably accessible from the swimming pool enclosure, using doors that are locked to unauthorized persons.

AB Full: A building regulated by this Part that is constructed in or relocated into Alberta after 01 April 2019 shall conform in all respects to this Code.
AB Variations: A building regulated by this Part that is constructed in or relocated into Alberta after 01 April 2019 shall conform in all respects to this Code.

AB Full: Combustible refuse in sufficient quantities to constitute a fire hazard shall be moved to a safe location. (See also Subsection 8.2.5. of Division B of the NBC(AE).)
AB Variations: Combustible refuse in sufficient quantities to constitute a fire hazard shall be moved to a safe location. (See also Subsection 8.2.5. of Division B of the NBC(AE).)

AB Full: In determining the location of a hose cabinet, allowance for spray shall be made only from the door of a bedroom to the back corner of the bedroom.
AB Variations: In determining the location of a hose cabinet, allowance for spray shall be made only from the door of a bedroom to the back corner of the bedroom.

AB Full: If a fire alarm system is required by Sentence 10.6.3.1.(1), smoke detectors conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S529-16 Smoke Detectors for Fire Alarm Systems shall be installed in every corridor serving rooms containing sleeping accommodation.
AB Variations: If a fire alarm system is required by Sentence 10.6.3.1.(1), smoke detectors conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S529-16 Smoke Detectors for Fire Alarm Systems shall be installed in every corridor serving rooms containing sleeping accommodation.

AB Full: All elevators shall be capable of operation on emergency power.
AB Variations: All elevators shall be capable of operation on emergency power.

AB Full: Requirements for a building that has separate water lines for hose and standpipe systems are permitted to be established by the authority having jurisdiction.
AB Variations: Requirements for a building that has separate water lines for hose and standpipe systems are permitted to be established by the authority having jurisdiction.

AB Full: A personal service facility shall be in a room entirely separate from a room used for living, dining or sleeping purposes, a room used for the preparation or storage of food, and a restaurant or other business handling unwrapped food.
AB Variations: A personal service facility shall be in a room entirely separate from a room used for living, dining or sleeping purposes, a room used for the preparation or storage of food, and a restaurant or other business handling unwrapped food.

AB Full: Every corridor more than 55 m in length shall be subdivided by smoke doors.
AB Variations: Every corridor more than 55 m in length shall be subdivided by smoke doors.

AB Full: Where more than one smoke alarm is required in a dwelling unit, the smoke alarms shall be interconnected so that the activation of one alarm will cause all alarms within the dwelling unit to sound.
AB Variations: Where more than one smoke alarm is required in a dwelling unit, the smoke alarms shall be interconnected so that the activation of one alarm will cause all alarms within the dwelling unit to sound.

AB Full: All firefighting hose with internal lug quick-connect couplings shall be in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S543-09 Internal Lug Quick-connect Couplings for Fire Hose
AB Variations: All firefighting hose with internal lug quick-connect couplings shall be in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S543-09 Internal Lug Quick-connect Couplings for Fire Hose
