AB Full: An unattended self-service outlet shall be provided with the following safety features: a video recording surveillance system connected to a monitoring facility (see Note A-4.6.8.2.(7)(a)), a manually actuated emergency shut-off switch that shuts off power to the individual dispensing unit, and can be actuated from both sides of the dispensing unit, a readily accessible, manually actuated, master emergency shut-off switch that is located more than 6 m but less than 10 m from the dispensing island, and shuts off power to all dispensing units at the station, dispensing devices that can only be reset by trained personnel in attendance at the site in the event an emergency shut-off switch has been actuated, a public pay telephone or other means of direct communication with the fire department shall be provided in a location acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction, an audible alarm actuated by the emergency shut-off switches which can be heard throughout the site, a strobe light actuated by an emergency shut-off switch in Sentence 4.6.8.2.(7) or 4.6.8.2.(7) in a visible location, dispensing pump cabinets and panels monitored with intrusion alarm devices connected to a monitoring facility, pump control and accessory buildings that are protected with intrusion alarm devices and smoke and heat detection devices connected to the monitoring facility in Sentence 4.6.8.2.(7), and electronic storage tank monitoring for inventory control.
AB Variations: An unattended self-service outlet shall be provided with the following safety features: a video recording surveillance system connected to a monitoring facility (see Note A-4.6.8.2.(7)(a)), a manually actuated emergency shut-off switch that shuts off power to the individual dispensing unit, and can be actuated from both sides of the dispensing unit, a readily accessible, manually actuated, master emergency shut-off switch that is located more than 6 m but less than 10 m from the dispensing island, and shuts off power to all dispensing units at the station, dispensing devices that can only be reset by trained personnel in attendance at the site in the event an emergency shut-off switch has been actuated, a public pay telephone or other means of direct communication with the fire department shall be provided in a location acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction, an audible alarm actuated by the emergency shut-off switches which can be heard throughout the site, a strobe light actuated by an emergency shut-off switch in Sentence 4.6.8.2.(7) or 4.6.8.2.(7) in a visible location, dispensing pump cabinets and panels monitored with intrusion alarm devices connected to a monitoring facility, pump control and accessory buildings that are protected with intrusion alarm devices and smoke and heat detection devices connected to the monitoring facility in Sentence 4.6.8.2.(7), and electronic storage tank monitoring for inventory control.

AB Full: If movable or adjustable water depth or floors are installed in a swimming pool, suitable markings shall be incorporated to advise bathers of these features.
AB Variations: If movable or adjustable water depth or floors are installed in a swimming pool, suitable markings shall be incorporated to advise bathers of these features.

AB Full: This Subsection shall not apply to the storage of tires or shredded tires that are covered by a minimum depth of 150 mm of noncombustible material, or buried in a lined and covered trench system for recovery and reuse.
AB Variations: This Subsection shall not apply to the storage of tires or shredded tires that are covered by a minimum depth of 150 mm of noncombustible material, or buried in a lined and covered trench system for recovery and reuse.

AB Full: All steam rooms and sauna rooms shall be provided with a full view of the inside of the room by either a full-length transparent panel in the door or a window providing an unobstructed view of the interior floor area of the room.
AB Variations: All steam rooms and sauna rooms shall be provided with a full view of the inside of the room by either a full-length transparent panel in the door or a window providing an unobstructed view of the interior floor area of the room.

AB Full: Impressed current cathodic protection systems shall be supplied with electrical power on a continuous basis and the power supply shall be inspected at least weekly.
AB Variations: Impressed current cathodic protection systems shall be supplied with electrical power on a continuous basis and the power supply shall be inspected at least weekly.

AB Full: A perimeter overflow system is permitted to be either a perimeter overflow gutter or channel system.
AB Variations: A perimeter overflow system is permitted to be either a perimeter overflow gutter or channel system.

AB Full: Walkways, steps and stairs between a receiving pool and the top of a water slide flume and between other facilities shall be not less than 1 100 mm in width.
AB Variations: Walkways, steps and stairs between a receiving pool and the top of a water slide flume and between other facilities shall be not less than 1 100 mm in width.

AB Full: Service water heaters shall conform to the Plumbing Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.
AB Variations: Service water heaters shall conform to the Plumbing Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.

AB Full: Where required by the NFC(AE), cylinders of anhydrous ammonia or dangerous goods classified as toxic or oxidizing gases stored indoors shall be located in a room that is separated from the remainder of the building by a gas-tight fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of at least 1 h, that is located on an exterior wall of the building, that can be entered from the exterior, and whose closures leading to the interior of the building are equipped with self-closing devices that keep the closures closed when not in use, and constructed so as to prevent the migration of gases from the room into other parts of the building.
AB Variations: Where required by the NFC(AE), cylinders of anhydrous ammonia or dangerous goods classified as toxic or oxidizing gases stored indoors shall be located in a room that is separated from the remainder of the building by a gas-tight fire separation having a fire-resistance rating of at least 1 h, that is located on an exterior wall of the building, that can be entered from the exterior, and whose closures leading to the interior of the building are equipped with self-closing devices that keep the closures closed when not in use, and constructed so as to prevent the migration of gases from the room into other parts of the building.

AB Full: The installation of electrical wiring and electrical equipment shall conform to the requirements of the Electrical Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.
AB Variations: The installation of electrical wiring and electrical equipment shall conform to the requirements of the Electrical Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.

AB Full: Where closures in fire separations are replaced, the replacements shall be in conformance with the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Where closures in fire separations are replaced, the replacements shall be in conformance with the NBC(AE).

AB Full: The person in charge shall forward a copy of the report referred to in Sentence 2.15.1.1.(2) to the authority having jurisdiction.
AB Variations: The person in charge shall forward a copy of the report referred to in Sentence 2.15.1.1.(2) to the authority having jurisdiction.

AB Full: Unless otherwise stated in this Part, records indicating inspection, testing and maintenance of fire protection equipment shall be on appropriate forms in conformance with this Article and be retained in conformance with Article 2.2.1.2..
AB Variations: Unless otherwise stated in this Part, records indicating inspection, testing and maintenance of fire protection equipment shall be on appropriate forms in conformance with this Article and be retained in conformance with Article 2.2.1.2..

AB Full: For each sleeping room, a window capable of serving as a means of emergency egress shall be provided, with an unobstructed openable area not less than 0.35 m2 with no dimension less than 380 mm, and with a sill height not more than 1 150 mm above the inside floor.
AB Variations: For each sleeping room, a window capable of serving as a means of emergency egress shall be provided, with an unobstructed openable area not less than 0.35 m2 with no dimension less than 380 mm, and with a sill height not more than 1 150 mm above the inside floor.

AB Full: A 22 m fire break shall be provided around the perimeter of individual storage piles where the total bulk volume of stored tires or shredded tires is greater than 4 800 m3.
AB Variations: A 22 m fire break shall be provided around the perimeter of individual storage piles where the total bulk volume of stored tires or shredded tires is greater than 4 800 m3.

AB Full: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.5.10.(5), 65 mm diam hose connections shall be installed in a standpipe system.
AB Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.2.5.10.(5), 65 mm diam hose connections shall be installed in a standpipe system.

AB Full: Gypsum board applications not described in this Subsection shall conform to ASTM C 840-13 Application and Finishing of Gypsum Board or CSA A82.31-M1980 Gypsum Board Application
AB Variations: Gypsum board applications not described in this Subsection shall conform to ASTM C 840-13 Application and Finishing of Gypsum Board or CSA A82.31-M1980 Gypsum Board Application

AB Full: Cleaning equipment required in Sentence 5.3.1.2.(1) that is used in an atmosphere containing combustible dusts shall conform to CSA C22.1-18 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I
AB Variations: Cleaning equipment required in Sentence 5.3.1.2.(1) that is used in an atmosphere containing combustible dusts shall conform to CSA C22.1-18 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I

AB Full: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 2.16.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
AB Variations: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 2.16.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

AB Full: The clearance between combustible materials and temporary heating equipment, including flues, shall be in conformance with Part 6 of Division B of the NBC(AE) or in conformance with the minimum clearances shown on certified heating equipment.
AB Variations: The clearance between combustible materials and temporary heating equipment, including flues, shall be in conformance with Part 6 of Division B of the NBC(AE) or in conformance with the minimum clearances shown on certified heating equipment.

AB Full: The design of a diving board or platform and the corresponding water depths and clearances for a semi-public swimming pool shall be in accordance with ANSI/APSP/ICC ANSI/APSP/ICC-1 2014 Public Swimming Pools
AB Variations: The design of a diving board or platform and the corresponding water depths and clearances for a semi-public swimming pool shall be in accordance with ANSI/APSP/ICC ANSI/APSP/ICC-1 2014 Public Swimming Pools

AB Full: Electrical equipment that is required to be located in a service room according to the Electrical Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act shall be installed in a service room separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h.
AB Variations: Electrical equipment that is required to be located in a service room according to the Electrical Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act shall be installed in a service room separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation having a fire-resistance rating not less than 1 h.

AB Full: Contaminated absorbent materials used during the cleanup of flammable liquid and combustible liquid spills shall be stored in a storage tank or closed container conforming to this Part until removed from the premises.
AB Variations: Contaminated absorbent materials used during the cleanup of flammable liquid and combustible liquid spills shall be stored in a storage tank or closed container conforming to this Part until removed from the premises.

AB Full: The ground enclosed by a tent or air-supported structure and for not less than 3 m outside the structure shall be cleared of all flammable material or vegetation that will spread fire. (See Note A-2.9.3.2.(2).)
AB Variations: The ground enclosed by a tent or air-supported structure and for not less than 3 m outside the structure shall be cleared of all flammable material or vegetation that will spread fire. (See Note A-2.9.3.2.(2).)

AB Full: The person appointed under Sentence 2.14.1.1.(3) shall inspect the camp complex, including all industrial relocatable accommodation, for fire hazards on a monthly basis.
AB Variations: The person appointed under Sentence 2.14.1.1.(3) shall inspect the camp complex, including all industrial relocatable accommodation, for fire hazards on a monthly basis.

AB Full: Water closet stalls shall be constructed of smooth, easily cleanable material.
AB Variations: Water closet stalls shall be constructed of smooth, easily cleanable material.

AB Full: Piping and steam lines shall be enclosed in insulation conforming to the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Piping and steam lines shall be enclosed in insulation conforming to the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Operation of card- or key-activated dispensers shall be restricted to persons authorized by the supply agent to possess a card or key to operate the dispensers, provided the card or key issuer provides, on an annual basis, card or key holders with a detailed training package on the requirements including safe operating and emergency procedures, the card or key issuer notifies card or key holders that, in order to use the card or key facilities, the card or key holder must train all card or key users on the requirements of the document and maintain a record of the training, the card or key holder maintains a training record for each person authorized by the card or key holder to dispense product in accordance with the requirements of this document, and training records referred to in this Sentence are retained in conformance with Article 2.2.1.2..
AB Variations: Operation of card- or key-activated dispensers shall be restricted to persons authorized by the supply agent to possess a card or key to operate the dispensers, provided the card or key issuer provides, on an annual basis, card or key holders with a detailed training package on the requirements including safe operating and emergency procedures, the card or key issuer notifies card or key holders that, in order to use the card or key facilities, the card or key holder must train all card or key users on the requirements of the document and maintain a record of the training, the card or key holder maintains a training record for each person authorized by the card or key holder to dispense product in accordance with the requirements of this document, and training records referred to in this Sentence are retained in conformance with Article 2.2.1.2..

AB Full: If a fire alarm or sprinkler system is required to transmit a signal to the fire department in conformance with the NBC(AE), the connection shall be operational at all times.
AB Variations: If a fire alarm or sprinkler system is required to transmit a signal to the fire department in conformance with the NBC(AE), the connection shall be operational at all times.

AB Full: Laboratories using or intending to use biological agents classified in the Canadian Biosafety Standard (CBS), published by the Government of Canada, shall be designed and constructed in accordance with the containment requirements of that standard.
AB Variations: Laboratories using or intending to use biological agents classified in the Canadian Biosafety Standard (CBS), published by the Government of Canada, shall be designed and constructed in accordance with the containment requirements of that standard.

AB Full: A ventilation system required by this Subsection shall be maintained in conformance with Article 5.5.4.1. of Division B of the NFC(AE).
AB Variations: A ventilation system required by this Subsection shall be maintained in conformance with Article 5.5.4.1. of Division B of the NFC(AE).

AB Full: This Part shall not apply to the transportation of flammable liquids or combustible liquids under TC SOR/2016-95 Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids on farms for individual farm use and on isolated construction projects (see Note A-4.1.1.1.(3)(b)), the storage of aerosol products covered under part 3., liquefied petroleum gas-burning appliances and equipment within the scope of the gas regulations made pursuant to the Govt. of Alberta R.S.A. 2000, ch. S-1 Safety Codes Act, the production, storage or handling of liquefied natural gas within the scope of the gas regulations made pursuant to the Govt. of Alberta R.S.A. 2000, ch. S-1 Safety Codes Act, liquids such as certain halogenated hydrocarbons and mixtures containing hydrocarbons which are without flash points but which may be flammable under certain conditions, or the storage and handling of raw production flammable liquids or combustible liquids and the incidental storage and handling of hydrocarbon-based chemicals resulting from or used during crude oil or natural gas exploration, production or transmission as mandated under the scope of AER Directive 055 Storage Requirements for the Upstream Petroleum Industry
AB Variations: This Part shall not apply to the transportation of flammable liquids or combustible liquids under TC SOR/2016-95 Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (TDGR) the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids on farms for individual farm use and on isolated construction projects (see Note A-4.1.1.1.(3)(b)), the storage of aerosol products covered under part 3., liquefied petroleum gas-burning appliances and equipment within the scope of the gas regulations made pursuant to the Govt. of Alberta R.S.A. 2000, ch. S-1 Safety Codes Act, the production, storage or handling of liquefied natural gas within the scope of the gas regulations made pursuant to the Govt. of Alberta R.S.A. 2000, ch. S-1 Safety Codes Act, liquids such as certain halogenated hydrocarbons and mixtures containing hydrocarbons which are without flash points but which may be flammable under certain conditions, or the storage and handling of raw production flammable liquids or combustible liquids and the incidental storage and handling of hydrocarbon-based chemicals resulting from or used during crude oil or natural gas exploration, production or transmission as mandated under the scope of AER Directive 055 Storage Requirements for the Upstream Petroleum Industry

AB Full: Rooms or spaces that contain welding or flame cutting operations shall conform to Article 3.3.1.25.
AB Variations: Rooms or spaces that contain welding or flame cutting operations shall conform to Article 3.3.1.25.

AB Full: A building to which this Part applies shall not stay at one site for more than 5 years, except as permitted by the authority having jurisdiction.
AB Variations: A building to which this Part applies shall not stay at one site for more than 5 years, except as permitted by the authority having jurisdiction.

AB Full: Steam outlets or heaters within steam rooms and sauna rooms shall be fenced or otherwise protected to prevent burns.
AB Variations: Steam outlets or heaters within steam rooms and sauna rooms shall be fenced or otherwise protected to prevent burns.

AB Full: Except for storage tanks being withdrawn from service in accordance with Subsections 4. and 4., no person shall deliver or remove flammable liquids or combustible liquids to or from a storage tank, unless the storage tank is registered in accordance with Article 2.2.5.2., and the registration certificate is displayed as required by Sentence 2.2.5.2.(5).
AB Variations: Except for storage tanks being withdrawn from service in accordance with Subsections 4. and 4., no person shall deliver or remove flammable liquids or combustible liquids to or from a storage tank, unless the storage tank is registered in accordance with Article 2.2.5.2., and the registration certificate is displayed as required by Sentence 2.2.5.2.(5).

AB Full: Receptacles for combustible recyclable paper product, plastics, metal and glass shall be located in buildings so as not to obstruct a means of egress or any fire protection equipment including, but not limited to, fire alarm pull stations, portable extinguishers, and sprinkler or standpipe hose connections.
AB Variations: Receptacles for combustible recyclable paper product, plastics, metal and glass shall be located in buildings so as not to obstruct a means of egress or any fire protection equipment including, but not limited to, fire alarm pull stations, portable extinguishers, and sprinkler or standpipe hose connections.

AB Full: The installation and alteration of indoor incinerators shall conform to the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: The installation and alteration of indoor incinerators shall conform to the NBC(AE).

AB Full: No steps or curbs shall be permitted in the interior of a dressing area nor between the dressing room and adjoining swimming pool or water spray park deck areas.
AB Variations: No steps or curbs shall be permitted in the interior of a dressing area nor between the dressing room and adjoining swimming pool or water spray park deck areas.

AB Full: A building described in Sentence 10.1.1.3.(1) is permitted to consist of one or more transportable modules specifically designed to be readily relocatable and usable without permanent foundations.
AB Variations: A building described in Sentence 10.1.1.3.(1) is permitted to consist of one or more transportable modules specifically designed to be readily relocatable and usable without permanent foundations.

AB Full: Door release hardware shall be installed on doors in conformance with the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Door release hardware shall be installed on doors in conformance with the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Except as permitted by Sentences 10.4.1.5.(2) and 10.4.1.5.(3), exterior walls shall have not less than a 5 min membrane protection on the inner face and shall have noncombustible exterior cladding.
AB Variations: Except as permitted by Sentences 10.4.1.5.(2) and 10.4.1.5.(3), exterior walls shall have not less than a 5 min membrane protection on the inner face and shall have noncombustible exterior cladding.

AB Full: Provisions for access to roof-mounted heating, ventilating and air-conditioning equipment shall conform to the requirements of Article 3.6.4.7.
AB Variations: Provisions for access to roof-mounted heating, ventilating and air-conditioning equipment shall conform to the requirements of Article 3.6.4.7.

AB Full: A dispatch area at the top of a water slide flume shall be provided to permit staff to control sliders in a safe manner and to provide space for staff to supervise the area at all times when the flume is in operation.
AB Variations: A dispatch area at the top of a water slide flume shall be provided to permit staff to control sliders in a safe manner and to provide space for staff to supervise the area at all times when the flume is in operation.

AB Full: Except as permitted by Sentence 10.3.1.1.(2), the clear ceiling height shall be not less than 2.1 m.
AB Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence 10.3.1.1.(2), the clear ceiling height shall be not less than 2.1 m.

AB Full: The wall thickness of a water slide flume shall be designed so that the continuous and combined action of hydrostatic, dynamic and static loads and normal environmental deterioration do not cause structural failure, which could result in injury, or continually require repair, which would weaken the strength of the original structure.
AB Variations: The wall thickness of a water slide flume shall be designed so that the continuous and combined action of hydrostatic, dynamic and static loads and normal environmental deterioration do not cause structural failure, which could result in injury, or continually require repair, which would weaken the strength of the original structure.

AB Full: A canopy or hood installed before 30 June 1985 is permitted to have other than welded joints and seams.
AB Variations: A canopy or hood installed before 30 June 1985 is permitted to have other than welded joints and seams.

AB Full: If a sprinkler system is installed, it shall be designed by a registered engineering professional in conformance with NFPA 13-2013 Installation of Sprinkler Systems or NFPA 13R-2013 Installation of Sprinkler Systems in Low-Rise Residential Occupancies
AB Variations: If a sprinkler system is installed, it shall be designed by a registered engineering professional in conformance with NFPA 13-2013 Installation of Sprinkler Systems or NFPA 13R-2013 Installation of Sprinkler Systems in Low-Rise Residential Occupancies

AB Full: Except as provided in Article 4.6.8.4. for card- or key-activated equipment and Sentences 4.6.8.2.(6) to 4.6.8.2.(9) for unattended self-service outlets, special dispensers including coin-operated, card-operated and preset units, shall not be permitted at self-service outlets unless there is at least one qualified attendant on duty for each 12 hoses that can be operated simultaneously while the outlet is open to the public.
AB Variations: Except as provided in Article 4.6.8.4. for card- or key-activated equipment and Sentences 4.6.8.2.(6) to 4.6.8.2.(9) for unattended self-service outlets, special dispensers including coin-operated, card-operated and preset units, shall not be permitted at self-service outlets unless there is at least one qualified attendant on duty for each 12 hoses that can be operated simultaneously while the outlet is open to the public.

AB Full: The person making the inspection required by Sentence 2.14.1.1.(4) shall provide the owner with a written report of their findings.
AB Variations: The person making the inspection required by Sentence 2.14.1.1.(4) shall provide the owner with a written report of their findings.

AB Full: A building that incorporates the fire protection equipment, elevator control or door access outlined in Sentence 2.5.1.3.(2) shall provide a key box constructed, keyed, and located in a manner acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction containing a set or sets of keys or devices required to be used in an emergency. (See Note A-2.5.1.3.(1).)
AB Variations: A building that incorporates the fire protection equipment, elevator control or door access outlined in Sentence 2.5.1.3.(2) shall provide a key box constructed, keyed, and located in a manner acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction containing a set or sets of keys or devices required to be used in an emergency. (See Note A-2.5.1.3.(1).)

AB Full: Heating facilities shall be provided in a building used for residential occupancy which shall be capable of maintaining an indoor air temperature at the outside winter design temperature of not less than 18C in an unfinished basement, and 15C in a crawl space required to be heated.
AB Variations: Heating facilities shall be provided in a building used for residential occupancy which shall be capable of maintaining an indoor air temperature at the outside winter design temperature of not less than 18C in an unfinished basement, and 15C in a crawl space required to be heated.

AB Full: The building shall be designed and constructed so that the acoustic insulation factor is not less than the value derived from Table 11.2.1.2.-D for each component of the exterior envelope of general office areas, reception areas and all other rooms and spaces not included in Sentences 11.2.1.2.(1) to 11.2.1.2.(3).
AB Variations: The building shall be designed and constructed so that the acoustic insulation factor is not less than the value derived from Table 11.2.1.2.-D for each component of the exterior envelope of general office areas, reception areas and all other rooms and spaces not included in Sentences 11.2.1.2.(1) to 11.2.1.2.(3).

AB Full: Geotechnical components of service loads and geotechnical reactions for SLS shall be determined by a suitably qualified and experienced registered engineering professional.
AB Variations: Geotechnical components of service loads and geotechnical reactions for SLS shall be determined by a suitably qualified and experienced registered engineering professional.

AB Full: Industrial ovens in which flammable vapours may be present or through which products of combustion are circulated shall be ventilated in accordance with NFPA 86-2015 Ovens and Furnaces
AB Variations: Industrial ovens in which flammable vapours may be present or through which products of combustion are circulated shall be ventilated in accordance with NFPA 86-2015 Ovens and Furnaces

AB Full: In addition to other requirements in this Code for the installation of automatic fire extinguishing systems, an appropriate fire extinguishing system shall be installed in every industrial occupancy floor area to provide protection if required by the NFC(AE).
AB Variations: In addition to other requirements in this Code for the installation of automatic fire extinguishing systems, an appropriate fire extinguishing system shall be installed in every industrial occupancy floor area to provide protection if required by the NFC(AE).

AB Full: Spaces containing an indoor swimming pool having a total water surface area of less than 10 m2 need not comply with Sentence 9.36.3.8.(1), provided they are equipped with a cover having a nominal thermal resistance not less than 2.1 (m2K)/W.
AB Variations: Spaces containing an indoor swimming pool having a total water surface area of less than 10 m2 need not comply with Sentence 9.36.3.8.(1), provided they are equipped with a cover having a nominal thermal resistance not less than 2.1 (m2K)/W.

AB Full: Smoke detectors, other than those which are automatically tested by the fire alarm system, shall be replaced within ten years of their manufacture with a smoke detector listed for use with the fire alarm system and appropriate for the location, or from the time they reach ten years of age and onward, tested annually for sensitivity in conformance with the methods prescribed in Subsection 6.7.4. of ULC CAN/ULC-S536-13 Inspection and Testing of Fire Alarm Systems
AB Variations: Smoke detectors, other than those which are automatically tested by the fire alarm system, shall be replaced within ten years of their manufacture with a smoke detector listed for use with the fire alarm system and appropriate for the location, or from the time they reach ten years of age and onward, tested annually for sensitivity in conformance with the methods prescribed in Subsection 6.7.4. of ULC CAN/ULC-S536-13 Inspection and Testing of Fire Alarm Systems

AB Full: Floor drains shall be so designed that waste water from one shower head shall not pass over the floor area of another shower.
AB Variations: Floor drains shall be so designed that waste water from one shower head shall not pass over the floor area of another shower.

AB Full: Means of egress shall be provided in buildings in conformance with the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Means of egress shall be provided in buildings in conformance with the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Walkways, steps and stairs shall be well drained, slip-resistant, and separated from any water slide flume by a physical barrier, set back not less than 1 m from the flume so that sliders cannot contact it on the way down.
AB Variations: Walkways, steps and stairs shall be well drained, slip-resistant, and separated from any water slide flume by a physical barrier, set back not less than 1 m from the flume so that sliders cannot contact it on the way down.

AB Full: All firefighting hose shall be maintained in accordance with NFPA 1962-2018 Standard for the Care, Use, Inspection, Service Testing, and Replacement of Fire Hose, Couplings, Nozzles, and Fire Hose Appliances
AB Variations: All firefighting hose shall be maintained in accordance with NFPA 1962-2018 Standard for the Care, Use, Inspection, Service Testing, and Replacement of Fire Hose, Couplings, Nozzles, and Fire Hose Appliances

AB Full: A clothes closet not more than 800 mm in depth shall not be considered as a storage room for the purposes of this Article.
AB Variations: A clothes closet not more than 800 mm in depth shall not be considered as a storage room for the purposes of this Article.

AB Full: Access to roof-mounted heating, ventilating or air-conditioning equipment shall be provided in conformance with Article 3.6.4.7.
AB Variations: Access to roof-mounted heating, ventilating or air-conditioning equipment shall be provided in conformance with Article 3.6.4.7.

AB Full: Floors in areas where dangerous goods are stored shall be constructed in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.7.(1) of Division B of the NBC(AE), and maintained as an impervious membrane.
AB Variations: Floors in areas where dangerous goods are stored shall be constructed in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.7.(1) of Division B of the NBC(AE), and maintained as an impervious membrane.

AB Full: Storage tank systems using Class I liquids as fuel supplies for stationary engines inside buildings shall conform to this Part when they are used to supply appliances installed in conformance with NFPA 37-2015 Installation and Use of Stationary Combustion Engines and Gas Turbines
AB Variations: Storage tank systems using Class I liquids as fuel supplies for stationary engines inside buildings shall conform to this Part when they are used to supply appliances installed in conformance with NFPA 37-2015 Installation and Use of Stationary Combustion Engines and Gas Turbines

AB Full: Lint traps, vents and associated piping in laundry equipment shall be cleaned at intervals frequent enough to prevent the lint from accumulating in quantities that will constitute a fire hazard.
AB Variations: Lint traps, vents and associated piping in laundry equipment shall be cleaned at intervals frequent enough to prevent the lint from accumulating in quantities that will constitute a fire hazard.

AB Full: Lighting with a minimum of 215 lx at floor level shall be provided in swimming pool or water spray park dressing rooms and any other area of the facility used by bathers.
AB Variations: Lighting with a minimum of 215 lx at floor level shall be provided in swimming pool or water spray park dressing rooms and any other area of the facility used by bathers.

AB Full: The perimeter overflow system shall have a hydraulic capacity sufficient to carry 100% of the design flow rate.
AB Variations: The perimeter overflow system shall have a hydraulic capacity sufficient to carry 100% of the design flow rate.

AB Full: The disinfection and pH buffering equipment referred to in Sentence 7.2.3.40.(1) shall include an automated monitoring system that is capable of sensing the oxidation-reduction potential, activating and stopping the disinfection and pH feed systems, and shutting off the feed equipment if positive flow through the pool circulation system is not assured.
AB Variations: The disinfection and pH buffering equipment referred to in Sentence 7.2.3.40.(1) shall include an automated monitoring system that is capable of sensing the oxidation-reduction potential, activating and stopping the disinfection and pH feed systems, and shutting off the feed equipment if positive flow through the pool circulation system is not assured.

AB Full: Structural support shall be provided in at least one bedroom and one washroom to accommodate a ceiling track lift.
AB Variations: Structural support shall be provided in at least one bedroom and one washroom to accommodate a ceiling track lift.

AB Full: Hot and cold water shall be available from the hose bibcocks for cleaning and disinfecting.
AB Variations: Hot and cold water shall be available from the hose bibcocks for cleaning and disinfecting.

AB Full: There shall be not less than 5 m of free and unobstructed head room above diving boards and towers and not less than 4 m above deck-level diving boards.
AB Variations: There shall be not less than 5 m of free and unobstructed head room above diving boards and towers and not less than 4 m above deck-level diving boards.

AB Full: The membrane protection value in Sentence 10.4.1.5.(1) does not apply in a single module if the occupant load is not more than 10 and the module is placed not less than 10 m from any other building.
AB Variations: The membrane protection value in Sentence 10.4.1.5.(1) does not apply in a single module if the occupant load is not more than 10 and the module is placed not less than 10 m from any other building.

AB Full: The spray deck or splash area that surrounds the water features and similar equipment of a water spray park shall be sufficiently sloped toward the drains to not allow for the ponding of water.
AB Variations: The spray deck or splash area that surrounds the water features and similar equipment of a water spray park shall be sufficiently sloped toward the drains to not allow for the ponding of water.

AB Full: If elemental chlorine is supplied, a water-operated gas chlorinator shall be used, which controls and regulates the flow of the gas.
AB Variations: If elemental chlorine is supplied, a water-operated gas chlorinator shall be used, which controls and regulates the flow of the gas.

AB Full: Where it is not possible to effectively remove the dust by vacuum, it is permitted to use compressed air or other means that will cause the dust to become suspended in the air during removal if, in the dust removal area, all sources of ignition are eliminated, and all machinery and equipment is de-energized, unless such machinery or equipment is suitable for use in atmospheres containing combustible dusts, in conformance with CSA C22.1-18 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I
AB Variations: Where it is not possible to effectively remove the dust by vacuum, it is permitted to use compressed air or other means that will cause the dust to become suspended in the air during removal if, in the dust removal area, all sources of ignition are eliminated, and all machinery and equipment is de-energized, unless such machinery or equipment is suitable for use in atmospheres containing combustible dusts, in conformance with CSA C22.1-18 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I

AB Full: If a vapour barrier is cut for openings for items such as electrical outlet and junction boxes, ducts, windows or doors, the integrity of the vapour barrier around the opening shall be maintained.
AB Variations: If a vapour barrier is cut for openings for items such as electrical outlet and junction boxes, ducts, windows or doors, the integrity of the vapour barrier around the opening shall be maintained.

AB Full: The knee space beneath the barrier-free section referred to in Sentence 3.8.4.4.(1) shall be not less than 760 mm wide, 685 mm high, and 485 mm deep.
AB Variations: The knee space beneath the barrier-free section referred to in Sentence 3.8.4.4.(1) shall be not less than 760 mm wide, 685 mm high, and 485 mm deep.

AB Full: In sections of an elevated water slide flume where, contrary to intended use, a slider may stop, there shall be safety walls or other provisions to keep a slider from falling out of the flume.
AB Variations: In sections of an elevated water slide flume where, contrary to intended use, a slider may stop, there shall be safety walls or other provisions to keep a slider from falling out of the flume.

AB Full: Where storage rooms are required by Part 4 of Division B of the NFC(AE) for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids in assembly occupancies, such rooms shall not be located above or below the first storey.
AB Variations: Where storage rooms are required by Part 4 of Division B of the NFC(AE) for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids in assembly occupancies, such rooms shall not be located above or below the first storey.

AB Full: Combustion air intake inlets shall be located on the outside of the building and not within an attic or roof space or a crawl space.
AB Variations: Combustion air intake inlets shall be located on the outside of the building and not within an attic or roof space or a crawl space.

AB Full: If underwater lighting is to be used in a swimming pool, the total lamp lumens shall be not less than 650 multiplied by the area in square metres of the water surface for an outdoor swimming pool, or 1 100 multiplied by the area in square metres of the water surface for an indoor swimming pool.
AB Variations: If underwater lighting is to be used in a swimming pool, the total lamp lumens shall be not less than 650 multiplied by the area in square metres of the water surface for an outdoor swimming pool, or 1 100 multiplied by the area in square metres of the water surface for an indoor swimming pool.

AB Full: Tiling at the water line of an above-ground swimming pool is not required.
AB Variations: Tiling at the water line of an above-ground swimming pool is not required.

AB Full: Two ladders shall be provided at the deep end of a swimming pool, one at each side of the swimming pool.
AB Variations: Two ladders shall be provided at the deep end of a swimming pool, one at each side of the swimming pool.

AB Full: Balcony walls shall be protected by one of the methods mentioned in Sentence 9.10.12.5.(2) from the floor level of the balcony to the underside of the balcony or roof assembly above for the full width and depth of the balcony, and 1.2 m on either side of the balcony.
AB Variations: Balcony walls shall be protected by one of the methods mentioned in Sentence 9.10.12.5.(2) from the floor level of the balcony to the underside of the balcony or roof assembly above for the full width and depth of the balcony, and 1.2 m on either side of the balcony.

AB Full: A laboratory shall be provided with continuous mechanical ventilation that is designed in conformance with Article 6.3.4.2. of Division B of the NBC(AE), and maintained to ensure it fulfills the function for which it was designed.
AB Variations: A laboratory shall be provided with continuous mechanical ventilation that is designed in conformance with Article 6.3.4.2. of Division B of the NBC(AE), and maintained to ensure it fulfills the function for which it was designed.

AB Full: If the total volume of stored tires or shredded tires is more than 600 m3, the area occupied by the tires shall be fenced in conformance with Article 3.3.2.6.
AB Variations: If the total volume of stored tires or shredded tires is more than 600 m3, the area occupied by the tires shall be fenced in conformance with Article 3.3.2.6.

AB Full: A water heater and thermostatically controlled mixing valve accessible only to authorized staff shall be installed and shall be capable of providing 0.15 L/s of water to each shower head with a temperature range of 35C to 49C.
AB Variations: A water heater and thermostatically controlled mixing valve accessible only to authorized staff shall be installed and shall be capable of providing 0.15 L/s of water to each shower head with a temperature range of 35C to 49C.

AB Full: An access route constructed in conformance with Subsection 3.2.5. of Division B of the NBC(AE) shall be provided in outdoor storage areas to permit the approach of fire department vehicles to within 60 m travelling distance of any storage tank.
AB Variations: An access route constructed in conformance with Subsection 3.2.5. of Division B of the NBC(AE) shall be provided in outdoor storage areas to permit the approach of fire department vehicles to within 60 m travelling distance of any storage tank.

AB Full: Where vehicular, watercraft or aircraft impact or physical damage is possible, protective guarding devices shall be provided for aboveground outdoor piping.
AB Variations: Where vehicular, watercraft or aircraft impact or physical damage is possible, protective guarding devices shall be provided for aboveground outdoor piping.

AB Full: The requirements for annual smoke detector sensitivity testing outlined in Subsection 6.7.4. of ULC CAN/ULC-S536-13 Inspection and Testing of Fire Alarm Systems shall not apply until a smoke detector has been in place for 10 years. (See Note A-6.3.1.2.(3).)
AB Variations: The requirements for annual smoke detector sensitivity testing outlined in Subsection 6.7.4. of ULC CAN/ULC-S536-13 Inspection and Testing of Fire Alarm Systems shall not apply until a smoke detector has been in place for 10 years. (See Note A-6.3.1.2.(3).)

AB Full: In assembly occupancies and care, treatment, or detention occupancies, combustible materials used for festive decorations, including, but not limited to, crepe paper decorations, other combustible trimming or ornaments and Christmas trees, shall be of the flame-resistant type, or conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S109-14 Flame Tests of Flame-Resistant Fabrics and Films (See Note A-2.3.1.3.(2).)
AB Variations: In assembly occupancies and care, treatment, or detention occupancies, combustible materials used for festive decorations, including, but not limited to, crepe paper decorations, other combustible trimming or ornaments and Christmas trees, shall be of the flame-resistant type, or conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S109-14 Flame Tests of Flame-Resistant Fabrics and Films (See Note A-2.3.1.3.(2).)

AB Full: Ceiling and roof assemblies above balconies mentioned in Sentence 9.10.12.5.(3) shall be protected by one of the methods mentioned in Sentence 9.10.12.5.(2).
AB Variations: Ceiling and roof assemblies above balconies mentioned in Sentence 9.10.12.5.(3) shall be protected by one of the methods mentioned in Sentence 9.10.12.5.(2).

AB Full: In buildings regulated by Sentence 3.2.7.12.(1), access openings to each storey provided in conformance with the NBC(AE) shall be not less than 750 mm wide by 1 100 mm high. (See Note A-3.2.7.12.(3).)
AB Variations: In buildings regulated by Sentence 3.2.7.12.(1), access openings to each storey provided in conformance with the NBC(AE) shall be not less than 750 mm wide by 1 100 mm high. (See Note A-3.2.7.12.(3).)

AB Full: In buildings within the scope of Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC(AE), the fire safety plan shall, in addition to the requirements of Sentence 2.8.2.1.(1), include the training of supervisory staff in the use of the voice communication system, the procedures for the use of elevators, the action to be taken by supervisory staff in initiating any smoke control or other fire emergency systems installed in a building in the event of fire until the fire department arrives, instructions to the supervisory staff and fire department for the operation of the systems referred to in Sentence 2.8.2.4.(1), and the procedures established to facilitate fire department access to the building and fire location within the building.
AB Variations: In buildings within the scope of Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC(AE), the fire safety plan shall, in addition to the requirements of Sentence 2.8.2.1.(1), include the training of supervisory staff in the use of the voice communication system, the procedures for the use of elevators, the action to be taken by supervisory staff in initiating any smoke control or other fire emergency systems installed in a building in the event of fire until the fire department arrives, instructions to the supervisory staff and fire department for the operation of the systems referred to in Sentence 2.8.2.4.(1), and the procedures established to facilitate fire department access to the building and fire location within the building.

AB Full: Except as permitted by Sentence 10.6.2.1.(2), skirting on a module, if installed, shall be noncombustible or have noncombustible cladding.
AB Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence 10.6.2.1.(2), skirting on a module, if installed, shall be noncombustible or have noncombustible cladding.

AB Full: The minimum pipe size used for walkway, deck and terrace drainage shall conform with the Plumbing Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.
AB Variations: The minimum pipe size used for walkway, deck and terrace drainage shall conform with the Plumbing Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.

AB Full: The deck area of a deck-level swimming pool shall have a slope not less than 1:50 and not more than 1:25 away from the swimming pool for a distance of at least 0.6 m with positive drainage to the deck drains.
AB Variations: The deck area of a deck-level swimming pool shall have a slope not less than 1:50 and not more than 1:25 away from the swimming pool for a distance of at least 0.6 m with positive drainage to the deck drains.

AB Full: Prefinished wall panelling not less than 4.2 mm thick applied over plywood panelling, waferboard or oriented strandboard not less than 7.5 mm thick shall be considered to provide a 5 min membrane protection.
AB Variations: Prefinished wall panelling not less than 4.2 mm thick applied over plywood panelling, waferboard or oriented strandboard not less than 7.5 mm thick shall be considered to provide a 5 min membrane protection.

AB Full: Recessed steps with grab rails may be used in lieu of ladders.
AB Variations: Recessed steps with grab rails may be used in lieu of ladders.

AB Full: A covered way shall have a clear height of not less than 2.5 m, have a clear width of not less than 1.5 m or the width of the public way, whichever is the lesser, be designed and constructed to support safely all loads that may be reasonably expected to be applied to it, but in no case less than 2.4 kPa on the roof, have a weathertight roof sloped towards the site or, if flat, be equipped with a splash board not less than 300 mm high on the street side, be totally enclosed on the site side with a structure having a reasonably smooth surface facing the public way, have a railing 1 070 mm high on the street side where the covered way is supported by posts on the street side, be adequately lighted when the public way is lighted, and have, at each opening for pedestrian access, a gate not less than 1 200 mm high that can be locked or bolted in a closed position.
AB Variations: A covered way shall have a clear height of not less than 2.5 m, have a clear width of not less than 1.5 m or the width of the public way, whichever is the lesser, be designed and constructed to support safely all loads that may be reasonably expected to be applied to it, but in no case less than 2.4 kPa on the roof, have a weathertight roof sloped towards the site or, if flat, be equipped with a splash board not less than 300 mm high on the street side, be totally enclosed on the site side with a structure having a reasonably smooth surface facing the public way, have a railing 1 070 mm high on the street side where the covered way is supported by posts on the street side, be adequately lighted when the public way is lighted, and have, at each opening for pedestrian access, a gate not less than 1 200 mm high that can be locked or bolted in a closed position.

AB Full: Every kitchen counter shall have at least one barrier-free section not less than 760 mm long centred over a knee space conforming to Sentence 3.8.4.4.(3).
AB Variations: Every kitchen counter shall have at least one barrier-free section not less than 760 mm long centred over a knee space conforming to Sentence 3.8.4.4.(3).

AB Full: Capacity requirements under Sentence 3.2.5.7.(1) do not apply to a building having a standpipe system conforming to the requirements of NFPA 14-2013 Installation of Standpipe and Hose Systems
AB Variations: Capacity requirements under Sentence 3.2.5.7.(1) do not apply to a building having a standpipe system conforming to the requirements of NFPA 14-2013 Installation of Standpipe and Hose Systems

AB Full: If a wall framing system with stud dimensions less than those specified in Sentence 10.4.1.2.(1) is used, the membrane values required in Articles 10.4.1.3. to 10.4.1.5. shall be increased by 10 min.
AB Variations: If a wall framing system with stud dimensions less than those specified in Sentence 10.4.1.2.(1) is used, the membrane values required in Articles 10.4.1.3. to 10.4.1.5. shall be increased by 10 min.

AB Full: Glass used in shower and bathtub enclosures shall be laminated or tempered safety glass conforming to CGSB CAN/CGSB-12.1-M90 Tempered or Laminated Safety Glass
AB Variations: Glass used in shower and bathtub enclosures shall be laminated or tempered safety glass conforming to CGSB CAN/CGSB-12.1-M90 Tempered or Laminated Safety Glass

AB Full: The installation of service water heaters, including provisions for mounting, clearances and air supply, shall conform to the Pressure Equipment Safety Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act, CSA B139 Series-15 Installation Code for Oil-Burning Equipment the Gas Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act, CSA B365-17 Installation Code for Solid-Fuel-Burning Appliances and Equipment or the Electrical Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.
AB Variations: The installation of service water heaters, including provisions for mounting, clearances and air supply, shall conform to the Pressure Equipment Safety Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act, CSA B139 Series-15 Installation Code for Oil-Burning Equipment the Gas Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act, CSA B365-17 Installation Code for Solid-Fuel-Burning Appliances and Equipment or the Electrical Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.

AB Full: Sentence 7.2.2.1.(1) does not apply to a swimming pool that is provided with a cover that has been designed and constructed in conformance with ASTM F 1346-91(2018) Safety Covers and Labeling Requirements for All Covers for Swimming Pools, Spas and Hot Tubs and is provided with lockable devices to prevent access to the water by unauthorized persons.
AB Variations: Sentence 7.2.2.1.(1) does not apply to a swimming pool that is provided with a cover that has been designed and constructed in conformance with ASTM F 1346-91(2018) Safety Covers and Labeling Requirements for All Covers for Swimming Pools, Spas and Hot Tubs and is provided with lockable devices to prevent access to the water by unauthorized persons.

AB Full: The owner shall make the documentation described in Sentence 4.3.1.9.(3) available in conformance with Article 2.2.1.2..
AB Variations: The owner shall make the documentation described in Sentence 4.3.1.9.(3) available in conformance with Article 2.2.1.2..

AB Full: A surge-free automatic water level control system shall be installed to ensure that the water in a receiving pool is maintained at the proper level.
AB Variations: A surge-free automatic water level control system shall be installed to ensure that the water in a receiving pool is maintained at the proper level.

AB Full: Exit lighting, exit signs and emergency lighting shall be provided in buildings in conformance with the NBC(AE). (See Note A-2.7.3.1.(1).)
AB Variations: Exit lighting, exit signs and emergency lighting shall be provided in buildings in conformance with the NBC(AE). (See Note A-2.7.3.1.(1).)

AB Full: Exclusive of washroom and shower areas, 0.5 m2 for each male and 0.5 m2 for each female is required for dressing room space on the basis of the bathing load.
AB Variations: Exclusive of washroom and shower areas, 0.5 m2 for each male and 0.5 m2 for each female is required for dressing room space on the basis of the bathing load.

AB Full: The tie-down instructions shall be provided for a specific site only and shall be printed on a label and affixed to the module in a visible location.
AB Variations: The tie-down instructions shall be provided for a specific site only and shall be printed on a label and affixed to the module in a visible location.

AB Full: Temporary electrical installations shall be installed in conformance with the requirements of CSA C22.1-18 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I
AB Variations: Temporary electrical installations shall be installed in conformance with the requirements of CSA C22.1-18 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I

AB Full: A mirror provided over a lavatory shall be of the unbreakable type.
AB Variations: A mirror provided over a lavatory shall be of the unbreakable type.

AB Full: Spaces containing an indoor swimming pool need not comply with Sentence 9.36.3.8.(1), provided a stationary mechanical or desiccant dehumidification system is installed that provides at least 80% of the dehumidification that would result from compliance with Sentence 9.36.3.8.(1).
AB Variations: Spaces containing an indoor swimming pool need not comply with Sentence 9.36.3.8.(1), provided a stationary mechanical or desiccant dehumidification system is installed that provides at least 80% of the dehumidification that would result from compliance with Sentence 9.36.3.8.(1).

AB Full: The main waiting area shall be designed to allow a person using a wheelchair to turn in an open space not less than 1 500 mm in diameter.
AB Variations: The main waiting area shall be designed to allow a person using a wheelchair to turn in an open space not less than 1 500 mm in diameter.

AB Full: Buildings altered or occupied for purposes of providing accommodation for boarders, lodgers or roomers shall conform to the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Buildings altered or occupied for purposes of providing accommodation for boarders, lodgers or roomers shall conform to the NBC(AE).

AB Full: No person shall repair, service or store a tank vehicle in a building other than for repairs conducted in conformance with Article 4.11.2.2. and Sentence 4.11.2.6.(1), unless the building is acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction, or all flammable liquids and combustible liquids have been removed from the cargo tank and the tank has been purged of flammable vapours or combustible vapours, outside the building or in a well-ventilated area, to less than 10% of the lower explosive limit.
AB Variations: No person shall repair, service or store a tank vehicle in a building other than for repairs conducted in conformance with Article 4.11.2.2. and Sentence 4.11.2.6.(1), unless the building is acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction, or all flammable liquids and combustible liquids have been removed from the cargo tank and the tank has been purged of flammable vapours or combustible vapours, outside the building or in a well-ventilated area, to less than 10% of the lower explosive limit.

AB Full: The water velocity in a discharge pipe shall be not more than 2.3 m/s for plastic piping, 2.0 m/s for copper piping, and 1.5 m/s for cast iron piping.
AB Variations: The water velocity in a discharge pipe shall be not more than 2.3 m/s for plastic piping, 2.0 m/s for copper piping, and 1.5 m/s for cast iron piping.

AB Full: If possible, depth markings shall also be located on the wall of the swimming pool, above the operating water level.
AB Variations: If possible, depth markings shall also be located on the wall of the swimming pool, above the operating water level.

AB Full: Ducts for a kitchen exhaust system shall be constructed of 0.84 mm minimum thickness stainless steel.
AB Variations: Ducts for a kitchen exhaust system shall be constructed of 0.84 mm minimum thickness stainless steel.

AB Full: Gauges shall be installed in all piping systems to measure the pressure drop across pressure type filter systems and the suction pressure on vacuum filter systems, and on both sides of circulation pumps for checking their operational performance.
AB Variations: Gauges shall be installed in all piping systems to measure the pressure drop across pressure type filter systems and the suction pressure on vacuum filter systems, and on both sides of circulation pumps for checking their operational performance.

AB Full: For temporary uses, such as outdoor fairs and festivals, a barrier-free stall shall be provided for every 10 stalls or part thereof.
AB Variations: For temporary uses, such as outdoor fairs and festivals, a barrier-free stall shall be provided for every 10 stalls or part thereof.

AB Full: Except as otherwise stated in this Section, aisles shall be provided in conformance with the NFC(AE).
AB Variations: Except as otherwise stated in this Section, aisles shall be provided in conformance with the NFC(AE).

AB Full: Piping shall be firmly supported and protected by means of guarding devices where necessary to prevent vehicular, watercraft or aircraft impact damage, or other physical damage.
AB Variations: Piping shall be firmly supported and protected by means of guarding devices where necessary to prevent vehicular, watercraft or aircraft impact damage, or other physical damage.

AB Full: Special Emergency Services, as defined in the Elevating Devices Codes Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act, shall be provided in all elevators.
AB Variations: Special Emergency Services, as defined in the Elevating Devices Codes Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act, shall be provided in all elevators.

AB Full: At least one hose cabinet shall be provided that contains a 38 mm diam hose not more than 30 m in length, capable of reaching all parts of the building with a water stream.
AB Variations: At least one hose cabinet shall be provided that contains a 38 mm diam hose not more than 30 m in length, capable of reaching all parts of the building with a water stream.

AB Full: Fittings for inlets and outlets for firefighting use shall conform to the NFC(AE).
AB Variations: Fittings for inlets and outlets for firefighting use shall conform to the NFC(AE).

AB Full: Each log in a wall built of vertical logs shall be scribed to fit as closely as possible to the adjacent logs.
AB Variations: Each log in a wall built of vertical logs shall be scribed to fit as closely as possible to the adjacent logs.

AB Full: Building sewers shall discharge into a public sewage system where such system is available.
AB Variations: Building sewers shall discharge into a public sewage system where such system is available.

AB Full: A sidewall fan may be used.
AB Variations: A sidewall fan may be used.

AB Full: Each face of a wall separating a sleeping room from another room shall have not less than a 5 min membrane protection.
AB Variations: Each face of a wall separating a sleeping room from another room shall have not less than a 5 min membrane protection.

AB Full: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.3.2.17.(2), where a municipal hydrant system exists and is adjacent to the storage yard, the hydrant system shall be extended into the yard area so that all parts of the yard can be reached by using not more than 60 m of hose.
AB Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.3.2.17.(2), where a municipal hydrant system exists and is adjacent to the storage yard, the hydrant system shall be extended into the yard area so that all parts of the yard can be reached by using not more than 60 m of hose.

AB Full: Design live load due to wind shall be based on a reference velocity wind pressure not less than 0.7 kPa.
AB Variations: Design live load due to wind shall be based on a reference velocity wind pressure not less than 0.7 kPa.

AB Full: In addition to the requirements of this Code, a food establishment shall be designed and constructed to be capable of meeting the requirements of the food regulations made pursuant to the Public Health Act.
AB Variations: In addition to the requirements of this Code, a food establishment shall be designed and constructed to be capable of meeting the requirements of the food regulations made pursuant to the Public Health Act.

AB Full: Except as permitted at self-service outlets, a qualified attendant shall be in constant control of the dispensing of Class I and II liquids into the fuel tanks of motor vehicles, watercraft or aircraft, or into containers.
AB Variations: Except as permitted at self-service outlets, a qualified attendant shall be in constant control of the dispensing of Class I and II liquids into the fuel tanks of motor vehicles, watercraft or aircraft, or into containers.

AB Full: The spatial separation between the end walls of modules containing sleeping accommodation may be less than 10 m if the end walls adjoin a walkway or corridor that is not less than 3 m in width, is sprinklered, is separated from any adjoining module or building by a fire separation with a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min that extends through any crawl space to the ground, and contains no combustible piping.
AB Variations: The spatial separation between the end walls of modules containing sleeping accommodation may be less than 10 m if the end walls adjoin a walkway or corridor that is not less than 3 m in width, is sprinklered, is separated from any adjoining module or building by a fire separation with a fire-resistance rating not less than 45 min that extends through any crawl space to the ground, and contains no combustible piping.

AB Full: This Part applies to the design, construction, extension, alteration, renewal or repair of plumbing systems, aquatic facilities, food establishments and personal service facilities, and laboratories using biological agents.
AB Variations: This Part applies to the design, construction, extension, alteration, renewal or repair of plumbing systems, aquatic facilities, food establishments and personal service facilities, and laboratories using biological agents.

AB Full: Stairs or ladders in the deep end of a swimming pool shall be placed to direct a bather away from diving boards and the diving area.
AB Variations: Stairs or ladders in the deep end of a swimming pool shall be placed to direct a bather away from diving boards and the diving area.

AB Full: If wall inlets are used, they shall be submerged not less than 0.6 m, and located as close to the bottom as possible where the water depth is less than 0.6 m.
AB Variations: If wall inlets are used, they shall be submerged not less than 0.6 m, and located as close to the bottom as possible where the water depth is less than 0.6 m.

AB Full: Corrosion protection systems shall be maintained in operating condition when a storage tank is temporarily out of service and during seasonal shutdowns.
AB Variations: Corrosion protection systems shall be maintained in operating condition when a storage tank is temporarily out of service and during seasonal shutdowns.

AB Full: Portable electrical equipment used in atmospheres containing combustible dusts shall conform to CSA C22.1-18 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I
AB Variations: Portable electrical equipment used in atmospheres containing combustible dusts shall conform to CSA C22.1-18 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I

AB Full: Canopies, hoods and ductwork for a ventilation system exposed within the kitchen or cooking area of a food establishment shall be constructed of stainless steel.
AB Variations: Canopies, hoods and ductwork for a ventilation system exposed within the kitchen or cooking area of a food establishment shall be constructed of stainless steel.

AB Full: Before repairs or alterations are made to fire protection installations, including but not limited to fire extinguishing systems and fire alarm and detection systems, a procedure of notification acceptable to the fire department shall be established, and the procedure may include the notification of the fire department and the building occupants. (See Note A-6.1.1.3.(1).)
AB Variations: Before repairs or alterations are made to fire protection installations, including but not limited to fire extinguishing systems and fire alarm and detection systems, a procedure of notification acceptable to the fire department shall be established, and the procedure may include the notification of the fire department and the building occupants. (See Note A-6.1.1.3.(1).)

AB Full: Floor inlets shall be provided in swimming pools more than 12.8 m wide.
AB Variations: Floor inlets shall be provided in swimming pools more than 12.8 m wide.

AB Full: For a deck-level swimming pool, the width of deck beyond the edge of the gutter drained to the circulation system of the deck-level swimming pool shall be not more than 900 mm.
AB Variations: For a deck-level swimming pool, the width of deck beyond the edge of the gutter drained to the circulation system of the deck-level swimming pool shall be not more than 900 mm.

AB Full: Except for the changes and additional standards listed in this Subsection, all above-ground swimming pools shall be designed in accordance with the remainder of this Section.
AB Variations: Except for the changes and additional standards listed in this Subsection, all above-ground swimming pools shall be designed in accordance with the remainder of this Section.

AB Full: The flame-spread rating on the floor shall be not more than 300 in a corridor, and 150 in an exit stairway from a second storey.
AB Variations: The flame-spread rating on the floor shall be not more than 300 in a corridor, and 150 in an exit stairway from a second storey.

AB Full: All pumps in a water theme park shall be equipped with at least one readily visible and accessible emergency shutdown switch for use by the supervisory staff.
AB Variations: All pumps in a water theme park shall be equipped with at least one readily visible and accessible emergency shutdown switch for use by the supervisory staff.

AB Full: Fuel-fired vehicles operating in a storage area shall be maintained regularly so as not to be a fire hazard.
AB Variations: Fuel-fired vehicles operating in a storage area shall be maintained regularly so as not to be a fire hazard.

AB Full: A tire storage area designed to contain more than 375 m3 of rubber tires shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation conforming to Article 3.3.6.5. of Division B of the NBC(AE). (See Note A-3.2.4.2.(1).)
AB Variations: A tire storage area designed to contain more than 375 m3 of rubber tires shall be separated from the remainder of the building by a fire separation conforming to Article 3.3.6.5. of Division B of the NBC(AE). (See Note A-3.2.4.2.(1).)

AB Full: When a loss of flammable liquid or combustible liquid occurs from a spill, leak, or as indicated by any of the leak detection measures in part 4., the owner shall ensure that appropriate action is taken as required in Sentences 4.1.6.3.(2) and 4.1.6.3.(3), and Sentence 4.4.1.3.(1), and if the quantity of liquid spilled or leaked exceeds 50 L in aggregate or is sufficient to cause a sheen on nearby surface water, the fire department shall be notified immediately, and the authority having jurisdiction shall be notified in writing within 24 h.
AB Variations: When a loss of flammable liquid or combustible liquid occurs from a spill, leak, or as indicated by any of the leak detection measures in part 4., the owner shall ensure that appropriate action is taken as required in Sentences 4.1.6.3.(2) and 4.1.6.3.(3), and Sentence 4.4.1.3.(1), and if the quantity of liquid spilled or leaked exceeds 50 L in aggregate or is sufficient to cause a sheen on nearby surface water, the fire department shall be notified immediately, and the authority having jurisdiction shall be notified in writing within 24 h.

AB Full: The ventilation system for a power-ventilated enclosure required by Sentence 5.5.4.2.(1) of Division B of the NFC(AE) shall conform to NFPA 91-2010 Exhaust Systems for Air Conveying of Vapors, Gases, Mists, and Noncombustible Particulate Solids provide continuous exhaust ventilation at an air velocity sufficient to prevent the accumulation of combustible or reactive deposits in the power-ventilated enclosure and its exhaust duct system, confine dangerous goods vapours and particles to the area where they are generated and exhaust them to the outdoors, not return the exhausted air to the building, and be provided with well identified control switches that are located outside of the power-ventilated enclosure, and readily accessible in case of an emergency.
AB Variations: The ventilation system for a power-ventilated enclosure required by Sentence 5.5.4.2.(1) of Division B of the NFC(AE) shall conform to NFPA 91-2010 Exhaust Systems for Air Conveying of Vapors, Gases, Mists, and Noncombustible Particulate Solids provide continuous exhaust ventilation at an air velocity sufficient to prevent the accumulation of combustible or reactive deposits in the power-ventilated enclosure and its exhaust duct system, confine dangerous goods vapours and particles to the area where they are generated and exhaust them to the outdoors, not return the exhausted air to the building, and be provided with well identified control switches that are located outside of the power-ventilated enclosure, and readily accessible in case of an emergency.

AB Full: Fire separations for rooms where flammable liquids and combustible liquids are stored are required to be constructed with a fire-resistance rating in conformance with Subsection 4.2.9. of Division B of the NFC(AE).
AB Variations: Fire separations for rooms where flammable liquids and combustible liquids are stored are required to be constructed with a fire-resistance rating in conformance with Subsection 4.2.9. of Division B of the NFC(AE).

AB Full: Erosion feeders using stabilized chlorine are not approved as chlorinators for the purposes of this Article.
AB Variations: Erosion feeders using stabilized chlorine are not approved as chlorinators for the purposes of this Article.

AB Full: An arena-type building intended for occasional use for trade shows and similar exhibition purposes shall be classified in accordance with the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: An arena-type building intended for occasional use for trade shows and similar exhibition purposes shall be classified in accordance with the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Except as provided in Sentence 4.6.8.6.(2), flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall not be dispensed into the fuel tank of a motor vehicle, watercraft or aircraft while the engine is running.
AB Variations: Except as provided in Sentence 4.6.8.6.(2), flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall not be dispensed into the fuel tank of a motor vehicle, watercraft or aircraft while the engine is running.

AB Full: If wall inlets are installed in water areas more than 1.5 m deep, they shall be located no higher than one third of the depth from the bottom.
AB Variations: If wall inlets are installed in water areas more than 1.5 m deep, they shall be located no higher than one third of the depth from the bottom.

AB Full: No person shall have in his possession, sell, offer for sale, give away or otherwise distribute, discharge, fire or set off firecrackers.
AB Variations: No person shall have in his possession, sell, offer for sale, give away or otherwise distribute, discharge, fire or set off firecrackers.

AB Full: Except as otherwise required by this Subsection, the flame-spread rating of interior wall and ceiling finishes, including 90% of the surface area of cupboards and built-in furniture, shall be not more than 150.
AB Variations: Except as otherwise required by this Subsection, the flame-spread rating of interior wall and ceiling finishes, including 90% of the surface area of cupboards and built-in furniture, shall be not more than 150.

AB Full: Adequate space shall be provided for servicing the filtration equipment.
AB Variations: Adequate space shall be provided for servicing the filtration equipment.

AB Full: Emergency lighting shall be provided to average levels of not less than 10 lx at floor or tread level in all corridors and in areas serving as an access to exit from buildings having an occupant load more than 20.
AB Variations: Emergency lighting shall be provided to average levels of not less than 10 lx at floor or tread level in all corridors and in areas serving as an access to exit from buildings having an occupant load more than 20.

AB Full: In addition to the requirements of Sentence 3.8.2.8.(1), at least one universal washroom conforming to Article 3.8.3.12. shall be provided in a regional transportation terminal.
AB Variations: In addition to the requirements of Sentence 3.8.2.8.(1), at least one universal washroom conforming to Article 3.8.3.12. shall be provided in a regional transportation terminal.

AB Full: The required clearance from the exhaust duct to combustible material may be waived if a 25 mm air space, having no materials in it, separates the exhaust duct from a noncombustible material backed by not less than 25 mm of mineral wool insulation which protects the combustible material.
AB Variations: The required clearance from the exhaust duct to combustible material may be waived if a 25 mm air space, having no materials in it, separates the exhaust duct from a noncombustible material backed by not less than 25 mm of mineral wool insulation which protects the combustible material.

AB Full: Except for the storage of distilled beverage alcohol, where Class IA or IB liquids are used, dispensed or stored in open containers within a storage room, or where Class IA liquids are stored in containers exceeding 4 L in capacity, the room shall be designed to prevent critical structural and mechanical damage from an internal explosion in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.4.(2) of Division B of the NBC(AE). (See Note A-3.2.8.2.(1)(d).)
AB Variations: Except for the storage of distilled beverage alcohol, where Class IA or IB liquids are used, dispensed or stored in open containers within a storage room, or where Class IA liquids are stored in containers exceeding 4 L in capacity, the room shall be designed to prevent critical structural and mechanical damage from an internal explosion in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.4.(2) of Division B of the NBC(AE). (See Note A-3.2.8.2.(1)(d).)

AB Full: At fuel-dispensing stations that provide both attended service and self-service, the attendant required in Sentence 4.6.8.1.(1) is permitted to dispense flammable liquids or combustible liquids at the attended service island, provided that the attendant has direct view of all fueling positions at the fuel-dispensing station, and the attendant is never more than 25 m from an emergency shut-off switch.
AB Variations: At fuel-dispensing stations that provide both attended service and self-service, the attendant required in Sentence 4.6.8.1.(1) is permitted to dispense flammable liquids or combustible liquids at the attended service island, provided that the attendant has direct view of all fueling positions at the fuel-dispensing station, and the attendant is never more than 25 m from an emergency shut-off switch.

AB Full: Except where a thermostat is designed with a pre-set temperature range that is safe for users, thermostatic control of all steam rooms and sauna rooms shall be designed to only be accessible to authorized staff.
AB Variations: Except where a thermostat is designed with a pre-set temperature range that is safe for users, thermostatic control of all steam rooms and sauna rooms shall be designed to only be accessible to authorized staff.
