AB Full: Bar coding and other technologies acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction are permitted to be used as a means of record-keeping, provided an information record in accordance with Sentence 6.1.1.5.(3) is available at the premise where the portable extinguisher is located, and the tag on the extinguisher contains information indicating a five-year monthly inspection record for use by the owner, the name of the owner of the extinguisher, the name, address and telephone number of the service agency, the certification number of an approved testing agency, and the printed name and signature of the service person.
AB Variations: Bar coding and other technologies acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction are permitted to be used as a means of record-keeping, provided an information record in accordance with Sentence 6.1.1.5.(3) is available at the premise where the portable extinguisher is located, and the tag on the extinguisher contains information indicating a five-year monthly inspection record for use by the owner, the name of the owner of the extinguisher, the name, address and telephone number of the service agency, the certification number of an approved testing agency, and the printed name and signature of the service person.

AB Full: Stairs with handrails shall be provided at entry and egress points of an above-ground swimming pool and treads shall have a non-skid finish when wet.
AB Variations: Stairs with handrails shall be provided at entry and egress points of an above-ground swimming pool and treads shall have a non-skid finish when wet.

AB Full: Asbestos shall not be used in HVAC systems or equipment.
AB Variations: Asbestos shall not be used in HVAC systems or equipment.

AB Full: Except as required by Sentence 9.26.4.9.(3), flashing for a pipe or duct shall be rectangular and shall be not less than 500 mm in length by 500 mm in width and, if sleeve flashing is used, the sleeve shall extend not less than 150 mm above the roof at every point of the pipe or duct.
AB Variations: Except as required by Sentence 9.26.4.9.(3), flashing for a pipe or duct shall be rectangular and shall be not less than 500 mm in length by 500 mm in width and, if sleeve flashing is used, the sleeve shall extend not less than 150 mm above the roof at every point of the pipe or duct.

AB Full: For the purpose of applying this Code, every building or part thereof shall be classified according to its major occupancy in conformance with the NBC(AE). (See Note A-2.1.2.1.(1).)
AB Variations: For the purpose of applying this Code, every building or part thereof shall be classified according to its major occupancy in conformance with the NBC(AE). (See Note A-2.1.2.1.(1).)

AB Full: Heating and air-conditioning systems, including ducting, and mechanical heating and refrigeration equipment, shall be designed, constructed and installed to conform with good practice such as that described in the ASHRAE Handbooks and Standards, the HRAI Digest, the CHC Handbook on Hydronic Heating Systems, the Hydronics Institute Manuals, the SMACNA Manuals, and CSA B214-16 Installation Code for Hydronic Heating Systems
AB Variations: Heating and air-conditioning systems, including ducting, and mechanical heating and refrigeration equipment, shall be designed, constructed and installed to conform with good practice such as that described in the ASHRAE Handbooks and Standards, the HRAI Digest, the CHC Handbook on Hydronic Heating Systems, the Hydronics Institute Manuals, the SMACNA Manuals, and CSA B214-16 Installation Code for Hydronic Heating Systems

AB Full: Tables 11.2.3.1.-A to 11.2.3.1.-D may be used to determine the acoustic insulation factor for some typical construction materials and assemblies, including windows, doors, exterior walls and roofs.
AB Variations: Tables 11.2.3.1.-A to 11.2.3.1.-D may be used to determine the acoustic insulation factor for some typical construction materials and assemblies, including windows, doors, exterior walls and roofs.

AB Full: The design of deck-level diving boards and the corresponding water depths and clearances for a public swimming pool shall be in accordance with ANSI/APSP/ICC ANSI/APSP/ICC-1 2014 Public Swimming Pools
AB Variations: The design of deck-level diving boards and the corresponding water depths and clearances for a public swimming pool shall be in accordance with ANSI/APSP/ICC ANSI/APSP/ICC-1 2014 Public Swimming Pools

AB Full: A fan shall be rated for continuous use as a commercial exhaust fan.
AB Variations: A fan shall be rated for continuous use as a commercial exhaust fan.

AB Full: Gas chlorinators used for an indoor swimming pool shall have a capacity that is not less than 0.45 kg of chlorine per 24 h per 45  000 L of swimming pool capacity.
AB Variations: Gas chlorinators used for an indoor swimming pool shall have a capacity that is not less than 0.45 kg of chlorine per 24 h per 45 000 L of swimming pool capacity.

AB Full: The fire safety plan required as part of the emergency planning measures described in Sentence 3.3.6.7.(1) shall be retained on site for reference by the authority having jurisdiction and the fire department.
AB Variations: The fire safety plan required as part of the emergency planning measures described in Sentence 3.3.6.7.(1) shall be retained on site for reference by the authority having jurisdiction and the fire department.

AB Full: A swimming pool shall be equipped with suitable and efficient disinfecting equipment to provide continuous disinfection when in use and a residual level of free chlorine necessary to maintain the swimming pool water in a microbiologically and chemically safe condition at all times, and a mechanical device for feeding a regulated adequate dosage of pH buffering chemicals.
AB Variations: A swimming pool shall be equipped with suitable and efficient disinfecting equipment to provide continuous disinfection when in use and a residual level of free chlorine necessary to maintain the swimming pool water in a microbiologically and chemically safe condition at all times, and a mechanical device for feeding a regulated adequate dosage of pH buffering chemicals.

AB Full: Aboveground storage tanks that have been out of service for a period of more than 180 days and are to be returned to service shall, where possible, be internally inspected and the authority having jurisdiction shall be advised of the inspection results and the intention to return the storage tanks to service.
AB Variations: Aboveground storage tanks that have been out of service for a period of more than 180 days and are to be returned to service shall, where possible, be internally inspected and the authority having jurisdiction shall be advised of the inspection results and the intention to return the storage tanks to service.

AB Full: All thermometers shall be legible in single degrees Celsius with a range of at least 20C encompassing the operating temperature, and shall be installed so that they can be easily read.
AB Variations: All thermometers shall be legible in single degrees Celsius with a range of at least 20C encompassing the operating temperature, and shall be installed so that they can be easily read.

AB Full: Except as provided in Sentences 9.23.6.1.(3) to 9.23.6.1.(6), anchorage shall be provided by embedding the ends of the first floor joists in concrete, fastening the sill plate to the foundation with not less than 12.7 mm diam anchor bolts spaced not more than 2.4 m o.c., or embedding in concrete two 38 mm by 89 mm sill plates placed on edge and separated by blocking spaced 1.2 m o.c.
AB Variations: Except as provided in Sentences 9.23.6.1.(3) to 9.23.6.1.(6), anchorage shall be provided by embedding the ends of the first floor joists in concrete, fastening the sill plate to the foundation with not less than 12.7 mm diam anchor bolts spaced not more than 2.4 m o.c., or embedding in concrete two 38 mm by 89 mm sill plates placed on edge and separated by blocking spaced 1.2 m o.c.

AB Full: The water supply system shall be capable of supplying water for a period not less than 3 h at a minimum rate of 4 000 L/min if the storage area is less than 600 m3, or 8 000 L/min if the storage area is equal to or greater than 600 m3.
AB Variations: The water supply system shall be capable of supplying water for a period not less than 3 h at a minimum rate of 4 000 L/min if the storage area is less than 600 m3, or 8 000 L/min if the storage area is equal to or greater than 600 m3.

AB Full: Where containers or storage tanks containing flammable liquids, combustible liquids or liquefied petroleum gases located outdoors are used for heating, cooking or power generation purposes at industrial relocatable accommodation, they shall not be installed in any exit or corridor providing access to exit including open air or exterior corridors, under any fire escape, outside exit stair, passage or ramp, or within 7.5 m of any exit.
AB Variations: Where containers or storage tanks containing flammable liquids, combustible liquids or liquefied petroleum gases located outdoors are used for heating, cooking or power generation purposes at industrial relocatable accommodation, they shall not be installed in any exit or corridor providing access to exit including open air or exterior corridors, under any fire escape, outside exit stair, passage or ramp, or within 7.5 m of any exit.

AB Full: Every person dispensing flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall take precautions to prevent overflow or spillage of the liquid being dispensed, not knowingly overfill the fuel system, except as otherwise stated in Article 4.6.8.5., in the event of spillage, immediately apply an absorbent material to soak up the spillage in conformance with Article 4.1.6.3., not dispense Class I or II liquids in proximity to open sources of ignition, not use any object or device that is not an integral part of the hose nozzle valve assembly to maintain the flow of fuel, and not dispense the liquids into containers that are in a vehicle, watercraft or aircraft.
AB Variations: Every person dispensing flammable liquids and combustible liquids shall take precautions to prevent overflow or spillage of the liquid being dispensed, not knowingly overfill the fuel system, except as otherwise stated in Article 4.6.8.5., in the event of spillage, immediately apply an absorbent material to soak up the spillage in conformance with Article 4.1.6.3., not dispense Class I or II liquids in proximity to open sources of ignition, not use any object or device that is not an integral part of the hose nozzle valve assembly to maintain the flow of fuel, and not dispense the liquids into containers that are in a vehicle, watercraft or aircraft.

AB Full: Except as required by Sentence 6.2.1.8.(2), all buildings shall be equipped with heating facilities capable of maintaining the design indoor air temperature commensurate with the use of the building at the outside winter design temperature.
AB Variations: Except as required by Sentence 6.2.1.8.(2), all buildings shall be equipped with heating facilities capable of maintaining the design indoor air temperature commensurate with the use of the building at the outside winter design temperature.

AB Full: When underground storage tanks will be out of service for a period not exceeding 180 days, the liquid level in the storage tank shall be measured at intervals not greater than one month and a record of the measurements shall be retained in conformance with Article 2.2.1.2., fill pipe covers and covers over openings to measure liquid levels, dispensers and power controls shall be kept locked when not in use, and vent piping shall be kept open.
AB Variations: When underground storage tanks will be out of service for a period not exceeding 180 days, the liquid level in the storage tank shall be measured at intervals not greater than one month and a record of the measurements shall be retained in conformance with Article 2.2.1.2., fill pipe covers and covers over openings to measure liquid levels, dispensers and power controls shall be kept locked when not in use, and vent piping shall be kept open.

AB Full: Internal combustion engines used to power supplementary blowers required by the NBC(AE) shall be operated and maintained in conformance with part 6.
AB Variations: Internal combustion engines used to power supplementary blowers required by the NBC(AE) shall be operated and maintained in conformance with part 6.

AB Full: Attendants shall be trained on how to conduct their duties, including inventory reconciliation practices, proper and safe product transfer procedures, and responsibilities identified in this Code.
AB Variations: Attendants shall be trained on how to conduct their duties, including inventory reconciliation practices, proper and safe product transfer procedures, and responsibilities identified in this Code.

AB Full: Except as provided in Sentences 9.36.3.8.(2) and 9.36.3.8.(3), spaces containing an indoor swimming pool shall be equipped with air exhaust systems conforming to Sentence 9.36.3.8.(4) at design conditions. (See also Article 9.25.4.2.)
AB Variations: Except as provided in Sentences 9.36.3.8.(2) and 9.36.3.8.(3), spaces containing an indoor swimming pool shall be equipped with air exhaust systems conforming to Sentence 9.36.3.8.(4) at design conditions. (See also Article 9.25.4.2.)

AB Full: Any keys or special devices needed to operate the fire alarm system or provide access to any fire protection systems or equipment shall be readily available to on-duty supervisory staffor located in fire department key boxes conforming to Article 2.5.1.3.
AB Variations: Any keys or special devices needed to operate the fire alarm system or provide access to any fire protection systems or equipment shall be readily available to on-duty supervisory staffor located in fire department key boxes conforming to Article 2.5.1.3.

AB Full: Except as permitted by Sentence 6.2.1.8.(1), heating facilities capable of maintaining an indoor air temperature of 22C at the outside winter design temperature shall be provided for all sleeping rooms in a care, treatment or detention occupancy, and in a building used for residential occupancy intended for use in the winter months on a continuing basis.
AB Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence 6.2.1.8.(1), heating facilities capable of maintaining an indoor air temperature of 22C at the outside winter design temperature shall be provided for all sleeping rooms in a care, treatment or detention occupancy, and in a building used for residential occupancy intended for use in the winter months on a continuing basis.

AB Full: Sanitary napkin dispensers shall be installed in water closet and shower areas used by females.
AB Variations: Sanitary napkin dispensers shall be installed in water closet and shower areas used by females.

AB Full: No person shall store tires or shredded tires unless clearances from other stored product or salvage, including but not limited to tires, is maintained with a clear space of not less than 6 m, with at least 15 m from surrounding property lines, and with at least 15 m from buildings or as indicated in NFPA 80A-2012 Protection of Buildings from Exterior Fire Exposures whichever is the greatest distance.
AB Variations: No person shall store tires or shredded tires unless clearances from other stored product or salvage, including but not limited to tires, is maintained with a clear space of not less than 6 m, with at least 15 m from surrounding property lines, and with at least 15 m from buildings or as indicated in NFPA 80A-2012 Protection of Buildings from Exterior Fire Exposures whichever is the greatest distance.

AB Full: Except as provided in Sentences 3.2.2.7.(3) and 3.2.2.7.(4), Article 3.2.2.8. and Sentence 3.2.2.18.(2), in a building in which one major occupancy is located entirely above another major occupancy, the requirements in this Subsection for each portion of the building containing a major occupancy shall apply to that portion as if the entire building were of that major occupancy.
AB Variations: Except as provided in Sentences 3.2.2.7.(3) and 3.2.2.7.(4), Article 3.2.2.8. and Sentence 3.2.2.18.(2), in a building in which one major occupancy is located entirely above another major occupancy, the requirements in this Subsection for each portion of the building containing a major occupancy shall apply to that portion as if the entire building were of that major occupancy.

AB Full: In this Section, industrial relocatable accommodation means a building that is used to provide accommodation for an industrial work force that lives and works at a temporary location.
AB Variations: In this Section, industrial relocatable accommodation means a building that is used to provide accommodation for an industrial work force that lives and works at a temporary location.

AB Full: Where refrigerators are used to store Class I liquids, they shall be designed so that electrical equipment located within the storage compartment, within the outer shell, on the door and on the door frame of the refrigerator is in conformance with CSA C22.1-18 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I for Class I, Zone 0 or 1 hazardous locations based on the frequency of occurrence and duration of an explosive gaseous atmosphere, and electrical equipment mounted on the outside surface of the refrigerator is in conformance with CSA C22.1-18 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I for Class I, Zone 2 hazardous locations, or located above the top of the storage compartment.
AB Variations: Where refrigerators are used to store Class I liquids, they shall be designed so that electrical equipment located within the storage compartment, within the outer shell, on the door and on the door frame of the refrigerator is in conformance with CSA C22.1-18 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I for Class I, Zone 0 or 1 hazardous locations based on the frequency of occurrence and duration of an explosive gaseous atmosphere, and electrical equipment mounted on the outside surface of the refrigerator is in conformance with CSA C22.1-18 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I for Class I, Zone 2 hazardous locations, or located above the top of the storage compartment.

AB Full: Where a piped water supply is available, piping for hot and cold water shall be connected to every kitchen sink, lavatory, bathtub, shower, slop sink and laundry area.
AB Variations: Where a piped water supply is available, piping for hot and cold water shall be connected to every kitchen sink, lavatory, bathtub, shower, slop sink and laundry area.

AB Full: Wastes from every plumbing fixture shall be piped to the building sewer.
AB Variations: Wastes from every plumbing fixture shall be piped to the building sewer.

AB Full: A door equipped with an automatic closer shall be used between any part of a building and a service room, an exit stair, or a washroom facility.
AB Variations: A door equipped with an automatic closer shall be used between any part of a building and a service room, an exit stair, or a washroom facility.

AB Full: On-site storage of at least 300 m of 65 mm hose and sufficient nozzles shall be provided if not immediately available from responding public fire departments.
AB Variations: On-site storage of at least 300 m of 65 mm hose and sufficient nozzles shall be provided if not immediately available from responding public fire departments.

AB Full: A water slide flume and its receiving pool shall be watertight with smooth, inert, non-toxic surfaces that are easy to clean.
AB Variations: A water slide flume and its receiving pool shall be watertight with smooth, inert, non-toxic surfaces that are easy to clean.

AB Full: Where a bathtub is installed in a hotel or a motel, it shall have a clear floor space at least 900 mm wide along its length, except that a water closet or a lavatory is permitted to encroach this space, have faucets and other controls that conform to Sentence 3.8.3.8.(1), have a slip-resistant bottom surface, have grab bars that conform to Sentence 3.7.2.8.(1), are not less than 1 200 mm long located vertically at the end of the bathtub that is adjacent to the clear floor space, with the lower end between 180 mm and 280 mm above the bathtub rim, and are not less than 1 200 mm long located horizontally along the length of the bathtub at 180 mm to 280 mm above the bathtub rim, and be capable of being accessed along its full length with no tracks mounted on the bathtub rim.
AB Variations: Where a bathtub is installed in a hotel or a motel, it shall have a clear floor space at least 900 mm wide along its length, except that a water closet or a lavatory is permitted to encroach this space, have faucets and other controls that conform to Sentence 3.8.3.8.(1), have a slip-resistant bottom surface, have grab bars that conform to Sentence 3.7.2.8.(1), are not less than 1 200 mm long located vertically at the end of the bathtub that is adjacent to the clear floor space, with the lower end between 180 mm and 280 mm above the bathtub rim, and are not less than 1 200 mm long located horizontally along the length of the bathtub at 180 mm to 280 mm above the bathtub rim, and be capable of being accessed along its full length with no tracks mounted on the bathtub rim.

AB Full: The service building required by Sentence 3.7.2.4.(1) shall contain lavatories as required by Sentence 3.7.2.3.(1) and at least one laundry tray or similar facility, and one bathtub or shower for each sex.
AB Variations: The service building required by Sentence 3.7.2.4.(1) shall contain lavatories as required by Sentence 3.7.2.3.(1) and at least one laundry tray or similar facility, and one bathtub or shower for each sex.

AB Full: The contents of every aboveground storage tank shall be clearly identified by signs with letters of sufficient size to ensure legibility from not less than 4.5 m or from outside a diked area, whichever is greater.
AB Variations: The contents of every aboveground storage tank shall be clearly identified by signs with letters of sufficient size to ensure legibility from not less than 4.5 m or from outside a diked area, whichever is greater.

AB Full: All deck-level systems shall be installed with adequate surge capacity provided by the gutters, the piping, a properly designed surge tank, or a combination thereof.
AB Variations: All deck-level systems shall be installed with adequate surge capacity provided by the gutters, the piping, a properly designed surge tank, or a combination thereof.

AB Full: No person shall smoke or use open flame within 7.5 m of a tank vehicle that is being loaded, unloaded or repaired.
AB Variations: No person shall smoke or use open flame within 7.5 m of a tank vehicle that is being loaded, unloaded or repaired.

AB Full: Except as required by Sentence 7.2.3.13.(6), the design of a diving board or platform and the corresponding water depths and clearances for a public swimming pool shall be in accordance with the FINA Handbook.
AB Variations: Except as required by Sentence 7.2.3.13.(6), the design of a diving board or platform and the corresponding water depths and clearances for a public swimming pool shall be in accordance with the FINA Handbook.

AB Full: Collection piping from skimming devices shall be hydraulically designed to carry not less than 100% of the design flow rate.
AB Variations: Collection piping from skimming devices shall be hydraulically designed to carry not less than 100% of the design flow rate.

AB Full: A perimeter overflow system shall be adequately sloped to provide rapid drainage to drains that are not less than 50 mm diam and spaced not more than 4.5 m apart.
AB Variations: A perimeter overflow system shall be adequately sloped to provide rapid drainage to drains that are not less than 50 mm diam and spaced not more than 4.5 m apart.

AB Full: The fire alarm system required by Sentence 10.6.3.1.(1) shall be tested to ensure satisfactory operation in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S537-13 Verification of Fire Alarm Systems except that the verification may be done by an electrician qualified in the maintenance of fire alarm and detection systems.
AB Variations: The fire alarm system required by Sentence 10.6.3.1.(1) shall be tested to ensure satisfactory operation in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S537-13 Verification of Fire Alarm Systems except that the verification may be done by an electrician qualified in the maintenance of fire alarm and detection systems.

AB Full: A ventilation system for a food establishment shall not have components that allow drips to fall onto surfaces where food is prepared or into food.
AB Variations: A ventilation system for a food establishment shall not have components that allow drips to fall onto surfaces where food is prepared or into food.

AB Full: Nonmetallic aboveground storage tanks, up to 2 500 L, intended for the storage of combustible liquids, including heating oil, diesel fuel and new or used oils, shall comply with ULC CAN/ULC-S670-14 Aboveground Nonmetallic Tanks for Fuel Oil and Other Combustible Liquids
AB Variations: Nonmetallic aboveground storage tanks, up to 2 500 L, intended for the storage of combustible liquids, including heating oil, diesel fuel and new or used oils, shall comply with ULC CAN/ULC-S670-14 Aboveground Nonmetallic Tanks for Fuel Oil and Other Combustible Liquids

AB Full: If the authority having jurisdiction deems it necessary to protect children, the elderly, or persons with disabilities or infirmities from burns, piping used to distribute service hot water and other hot water in assembly occupancies, care occupancies, treatment occupancies, detention occupancies and residential occupancies shall be concealed or insulated, and the temperature of the water from faucets shall be limited to a maximum of 49C.
AB Variations: If the authority having jurisdiction deems it necessary to protect children, the elderly, or persons with disabilities or infirmities from burns, piping used to distribute service hot water and other hot water in assembly occupancies, care occupancies, treatment occupancies, detention occupancies and residential occupancies shall be concealed or insulated, and the temperature of the water from faucets shall be limited to a maximum of 49C.

AB Full: Combustible materials, such as student artwork and teaching aids, attached to school classroom and access to exit walls and ceilings shall not exceed 20% of a wall or ceiling surface unless the combustible materials have been tested to ULC CAN/ULC-S102-10 Surface Burning Characteristics of Building Materials and Assemblies and the flame-spread rating does not exceed that required for the interior finish of the space in which they are located.
AB Variations: Combustible materials, such as student artwork and teaching aids, attached to school classroom and access to exit walls and ceilings shall not exceed 20% of a wall or ceiling surface unless the combustible materials have been tested to ULC CAN/ULC-S102-10 Surface Burning Characteristics of Building Materials and Assemblies and the flame-spread rating does not exceed that required for the interior finish of the space in which they are located.

AB Full: A door frame that has not been tested and labelled by a testing agency may be used for a door required to have a 20 min fire-protection rating if the frame is rabbeted from solid wood stock and the final thickness is not less than 32 mm.
AB Variations: A door frame that has not been tested and labelled by a testing agency may be used for a door required to have a 20 min fire-protection rating if the frame is rabbeted from solid wood stock and the final thickness is not less than 32 mm.

AB Full: The radius of curvature between the walls and floor of a swimming pool shall not exceed 150 mm where the water depth is less than 1.5 m.
AB Variations: The radius of curvature between the walls and floor of a swimming pool shall not exceed 150 mm where the water depth is less than 1.5 m.

AB Full: The minimum distance required in Sentence 4.3.2.1.(2) from a storage tank containing only Class II or IIIA liquids to a building on the same property is permitted to be reduced to 1.5 m provided the tank capacity is not more than 80 000 L, or zero provided the tank capacity is not more than 2 500 L.
AB Variations: The minimum distance required in Sentence 4.3.2.1.(2) from a storage tank containing only Class II or IIIA liquids to a building on the same property is permitted to be reduced to 1.5 m provided the tank capacity is not more than 80 000 L, or zero provided the tank capacity is not more than 2 500 L.

AB Full: Where blown-in insulation is installed in above-ground or below-ground wood-frame walls of new buildings, the density of the installed insulation shall be sufficient to preclude settlement, the insulation shall be installed behind a membrane that will permit visual inspection prior to the installation of the interior finish, the insulation shall be installed in a manner that will not interfere with the installation of the interior finish, and no water shall be added to the insulation, unless it can be shown that the added water will not adversely affect other materials in the assembly.
AB Variations: Where blown-in insulation is installed in above-ground or below-ground wood-frame walls of new buildings, the density of the installed insulation shall be sufficient to preclude settlement, the insulation shall be installed behind a membrane that will permit visual inspection prior to the installation of the interior finish, the insulation shall be installed in a manner that will not interfere with the installation of the interior finish, and no water shall be added to the insulation, unless it can be shown that the added water will not adversely affect other materials in the assembly.

AB Full: When work on a construction site is suspended or ceases so that it will not be occupied during normal working hours, the hazardous part of the construction site shall be protected by covering all windows, doors and other openings located within 3 m of the ground which may give access to the building with a securely fastened barricade, or a fence or barricade constructed according to the requirements of Article 8.2.1.3.
AB Variations: When work on a construction site is suspended or ceases so that it will not be occupied during normal working hours, the hazardous part of the construction site shall be protected by covering all windows, doors and other openings located within 3 m of the ground which may give access to the building with a securely fastened barricade, or a fence or barricade constructed according to the requirements of Article 8.2.1.3.

AB Full: If underwater lighting is to be used and night swimming is to be permitted at an outdoor swimming pool, area lighting shall be provided for the deck areas and directed toward the deck areas and away from the swimming pool surface so as to provide a minimum of 215 lx at deck level.
AB Variations: If underwater lighting is to be used and night swimming is to be permitted at an outdoor swimming pool, area lighting shall be provided for the deck areas and directed toward the deck areas and away from the swimming pool surface so as to provide a minimum of 215 lx at deck level.

AB Full: Logs used in a vertical position shall have plates at the top and at the bottom that are at least as wide as the largest end diameter of any of the logs.
AB Variations: Logs used in a vertical position shall have plates at the top and at the bottom that are at least as wide as the largest end diameter of any of the logs.

AB Full: If the noise contour value at a building site is more than 30, the mechanical ventilation system required by Sentence 11.2.2.1.(1) shall be designed and installed in such a way that an owner or occupant of a dwelling unit or suite used for residential occupancy need not make changes to the structure or dimensional changes to the ventilation system in order to install an air-conditioning system.
AB Variations: If the noise contour value at a building site is more than 30, the mechanical ventilation system required by Sentence 11.2.2.1.(1) shall be designed and installed in such a way that an owner or occupant of a dwelling unit or suite used for residential occupancy need not make changes to the structure or dimensional changes to the ventilation system in order to install an air-conditioning system.

AB Full: Except as permitted by Sentence 6.1.1.5.(4), each portable extinguisher shall have a tag securely attached to it showing the type of extinguisher, the size of extinguisher, the serial number of extinguisher, the date of last annual maintenance, the date of last recharge, a five-year monthly inspection and annual maintenance record, the name of the owner of the extinguisher, the name, address and telephone number of the service agency, the certification number of the approved testing agency, and the printed name and signature of the service person.
AB Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence 6.1.1.5.(4), each portable extinguisher shall have a tag securely attached to it showing the type of extinguisher, the size of extinguisher, the serial number of extinguisher, the date of last annual maintenance, the date of last recharge, a five-year monthly inspection and annual maintenance record, the name of the owner of the extinguisher, the name, address and telephone number of the service agency, the certification number of the approved testing agency, and the printed name and signature of the service person.

AB Full: The interior finish material that forms part of the interior surface of a floor, wall, partition or ceiling shall conform to the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: The interior finish material that forms part of the interior surface of a floor, wall, partition or ceiling shall conform to the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Required clearances between chimneys, flue pipes or appliances and combustible construction shall be maintained in conformance with the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Required clearances between chimneys, flue pipes or appliances and combustible construction shall be maintained in conformance with the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Where wiring or electrical equipment is located in areas in which flammable gases or vapours, combustible dusts or combustible fibres are present in quantities sufficient to create a hazard, such wiring and electrical equipment shall conform to CSA C22.1-18 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I for hazardous locations. (See Note A-5.1.2.1.(1).)
AB Variations: Where wiring or electrical equipment is located in areas in which flammable gases or vapours, combustible dusts or combustible fibres are present in quantities sufficient to create a hazard, such wiring and electrical equipment shall conform to CSA C22.1-18 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I for hazardous locations. (See Note A-5.1.2.1.(1).)

AB Full: The firefighting water system is permitted to be combined with the domestic system, except that the water storage required for firefighting shall not be depleted by the domestic system.
AB Variations: The firefighting water system is permitted to be combined with the domestic system, except that the water storage required for firefighting shall not be depleted by the domestic system.

AB Full: No person shall park a vehicle carrying tanks, containers, or cylinders of flammable liquids, combustible liquids or dangerous goods in an underground parking facility, or any enclosed parking structure used by the general public.
AB Variations: No person shall park a vehicle carrying tanks, containers, or cylinders of flammable liquids, combustible liquids or dangerous goods in an underground parking facility, or any enclosed parking structure used by the general public.

AB Full: A ladder shall be corrosion-resistant and shall be rigidly installed.
AB Variations: A ladder shall be corrosion-resistant and shall be rigidly installed.

AB Full: All partitions and walls between portions of the dressing room areas, screen partitions, shower, water closet stalls and dressing room booths shall be of durable material not subject to damage by water and shall be so designed that a gap of not less than 150 mm above floor level is provided between the partitions and the floor.
AB Variations: All partitions and walls between portions of the dressing room areas, screen partitions, shower, water closet stalls and dressing room booths shall be of durable material not subject to damage by water and shall be so designed that a gap of not less than 150 mm above floor level is provided between the partitions and the floor.

AB Full: When an existing fire alarm system has not been subjected to an initial verification as required by ULC CAN/ULC-S524-14 Installation of Fire Alarm Systems and described in ULC CAN/ULC-S537-13 Verification of Fire Alarm Systems the authority having jurisdiction may require the system to be audited in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S536-13 Inspection and Testing of Fire Alarm Systems unless the authority having jurisdiction is satisfied that the system has been maintained and is functioning in a manner acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction.
AB Variations: When an existing fire alarm system has not been subjected to an initial verification as required by ULC CAN/ULC-S524-14 Installation of Fire Alarm Systems and described in ULC CAN/ULC-S537-13 Verification of Fire Alarm Systems the authority having jurisdiction may require the system to be audited in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S536-13 Inspection and Testing of Fire Alarm Systems unless the authority having jurisdiction is satisfied that the system has been maintained and is functioning in a manner acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction.

AB Full: When a single module is 15 m or more from trees, shrubs or similar vegetation, the skirting, if installed, is permitted to be combustible.
AB Variations: When a single module is 15 m or more from trees, shrubs or similar vegetation, the skirting, if installed, is permitted to be combustible.

AB Full: A food establishment in which food is prepared and the process generates odours, smoke, steam or heat shall have a mechanical ventilation system that includes canopies, ductwork and fans to remove odours, smoke, steam or heat to the exterior of the building.
AB Variations: A food establishment in which food is prepared and the process generates odours, smoke, steam or heat shall have a mechanical ventilation system that includes canopies, ductwork and fans to remove odours, smoke, steam or heat to the exterior of the building.

AB Full: The maximum permissible occupant load for any room shall be calculated on the basis of the lesser of the number of occupants determined in accordance with Table 3.1.17.1. of Division B of the NBC(AE), the occupant load for which means of egress are provided, or the occupant load as calculated and posted in accordance with the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: The maximum permissible occupant load for any room shall be calculated on the basis of the lesser of the number of occupants determined in accordance with Table 3.1.17.1. of Division B of the NBC(AE), the occupant load for which means of egress are provided, or the occupant load as calculated and posted in accordance with the NBC(AE).

AB Full: The kitchen sink or cooktop referred to in Sentence 3.8.4.4.(4) shall be provided with a clearance beneath the sink or cooktop of not less than 760 mm wide, 685 mm high at a point 205 mm back from the front edge, and 230 mm high over the distance from a point 280 mm to a point 430 mm back from the front edge.
AB Variations: The kitchen sink or cooktop referred to in Sentence 3.8.4.4.(4) shall be provided with a clearance beneath the sink or cooktop of not less than 760 mm wide, 685 mm high at a point 205 mm back from the front edge, and 230 mm high over the distance from a point 280 mm to a point 430 mm back from the front edge.

AB Full: Fire department vehicles shall have direct access to at least one face of every building by means of a street, yard or roadway in conformance with the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Fire department vehicles shall have direct access to at least one face of every building by means of a street, yard or roadway in conformance with the NBC(AE).

AB Full: In a barrier-free path of travel, a downward change in elevation shall be signalled by the use of a 600 mm wide tactile warning strip placed 250 mm from the edge and for the full width of a stair, escalator, moving walk, ramp or platform, and identified using colour and brightness contrast.
AB Variations: In a barrier-free path of travel, a downward change in elevation shall be signalled by the use of a 600 mm wide tactile warning strip placed 250 mm from the edge and for the full width of a stair, escalator, moving walk, ramp or platform, and identified using colour and brightness contrast.

AB Full: For the deck area of a swimming pool in which recessed gutters or skimmers are used, the deck shall be sloped not less than 1:50 and not more than 1:25 away from the swimming pool and drained to waste.
AB Variations: For the deck area of a swimming pool in which recessed gutters or skimmers are used, the deck shall be sloped not less than 1:50 and not more than 1:25 away from the swimming pool and drained to waste.

AB Full: At least one entrance serving an adaptable dwelling unit, including exterior walks leading to the entrance from a public thoroughfare and from on-site parking areas, shall be barrier-free. (See also Article 3.8.2.2. for common entrances to buildings and Article 3.8.2.5. for parking stalls.)
AB Variations: At least one entrance serving an adaptable dwelling unit, including exterior walks leading to the entrance from a public thoroughfare and from on-site parking areas, shall be barrier-free. (See also Article 3.8.2.2. for common entrances to buildings and Article 3.8.2.5. for parking stalls.)

AB Full: Structural and fire safety requirements in other Parts of this Code shall apply.
AB Variations: Structural and fire safety requirements in other Parts of this Code shall apply.

AB Full: A building classified as Group F, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.83.(2) provided it is not more than 3 storeys in building height, and it has a building area not more than the value in Table 3.2.2.83.
AB Variations: A building classified as Group F, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.83.(2) provided it is not more than 3 storeys in building height, and it has a building area not more than the value in Table 3.2.2.83.

AB Full: Air contaminants in spaces where workers will be present shall not exceed the occupational exposure limits set out in the Occupational Health and Safety Act and its Regulations.
AB Variations: Air contaminants in spaces where workers will be present shall not exceed the occupational exposure limits set out in the Occupational Health and Safety Act and its Regulations.

AB Full: An adaptable dwelling unit shall be provided with a bathroom containing either a barrier-free shower or bathtub, in accordance with the following: where there is an even number of adaptable dwelling units required, 50% of the dwelling units shall have a bathroom containing a barrier-free shower, and the remaining 50% shall have a bathroom containing a barrier-free bathtub, and where there is an odd number of adaptable dwelling units required, the number of dwelling units with a bathroom containing a barrier-free shower shall exceed the number of dwelling units with a bathroom containing a barrier-free bathtub by 1.
AB Variations: An adaptable dwelling unit shall be provided with a bathroom containing either a barrier-free shower or bathtub, in accordance with the following: where there is an even number of adaptable dwelling units required, 50% of the dwelling units shall have a bathroom containing a barrier-free shower, and the remaining 50% shall have a bathroom containing a barrier-free bathtub, and where there is an odd number of adaptable dwelling units required, the number of dwelling units with a bathroom containing a barrier-free shower shall exceed the number of dwelling units with a bathroom containing a barrier-free bathtub by 1.

AB Full: Where a submerged pool outlet is provided, it shall be interconnected with not less than one other outlet, and these interconnected outlets shall be separated by a space of not less than 1 m o.c., or being located on two different planes, not including any horizontal seating surface, and hydraulically balanced.
AB Variations: Where a submerged pool outlet is provided, it shall be interconnected with not less than one other outlet, and these interconnected outlets shall be separated by a space of not less than 1 m o.c., or being located on two different planes, not including any horizontal seating surface, and hydraulically balanced.

AB Full: Procedures acceptable to the fire department shall be developed to notify occupants if a fire or other emergency occurs while the fire alarm and detection system is inoperative. (See Note A-2.8.2.8.(2).)
AB Variations: Procedures acceptable to the fire department shall be developed to notify occupants if a fire or other emergency occurs while the fire alarm and detection system is inoperative. (See Note A-2.8.2.8.(2).)

AB Full: The area surrounding an above-ground swimming pool shall be sloped away from the swimming pool and shall be adequately drained away from the swimming pool.
AB Variations: The area surrounding an above-ground swimming pool shall be sloped away from the swimming pool and shall be adequately drained away from the swimming pool.

AB Full: The distance between the sides of adjacent water slide flume extensions shall be not less than 1.8 m.
AB Variations: The distance between the sides of adjacent water slide flume extensions shall be not less than 1.8 m.

AB Full: Except as provided in Sentence 3.3.2.5.(2), an access route constructed in conformance with Subsection 3.2.5. of Division B of the NBC(AE) shall be provided to permit the approach of fire department vehicles to within 60 m travelling distance of any part of an individual storage area.
AB Variations: Except as provided in Sentence 3.3.2.5.(2), an access route constructed in conformance with Subsection 3.2.5. of Division B of the NBC(AE) shall be provided to permit the approach of fire department vehicles to within 60 m travelling distance of any part of an individual storage area.

AB Full: A building shall be provided with direct access to the roof by an interior stairway if heating, ventilating or air-conditioning equipment is installed on the roof, and the roof elevation is more than 4 m above grade.
AB Variations: A building shall be provided with direct access to the roof by an interior stairway if heating, ventilating or air-conditioning equipment is installed on the roof, and the roof elevation is more than 4 m above grade.

AB Full: Adequate water drainage shall be provided under an above-ground swimming pool platform.
AB Variations: Adequate water drainage shall be provided under an above-ground swimming pool platform.

AB Full: Where provided, the minimum number of skimming devices shall be determined by providing one device for each 40 m2 of swimming pool area, or one device for each 3 L/s based on the flow rate for the swimming pool, whichever is greater.
AB Variations: Where provided, the minimum number of skimming devices shall be determined by providing one device for each 40 m2 of swimming pool area, or one device for each 3 L/s based on the flow rate for the swimming pool, whichever is greater.

AB Full: A demountable exhaust extension may be used if the connection is exposed and is grease-tight.
AB Variations: A demountable exhaust extension may be used if the connection is exposed and is grease-tight.

AB Full: Controls for the operation of building services or safety devices, including electrical switches, electrical panels, thermostats and intercom switches, shall conform to Article 3.8.3.8.
AB Variations: Controls for the operation of building services or safety devices, including electrical switches, electrical panels, thermostats and intercom switches, shall conform to Article 3.8.3.8.

AB Full: If the authority having jurisdiction grants permission to abandon a storage tank in place in accordance with Sentence 4.3.17.2.(3), the owner shall purge the storage tank of vapours to less than 10% of the lower explosive limit, check for the presence of vapours using combustible gas detection equipment, arrange for a certified person to enter the storage tank and conduct an internal inspection of the storage tank for perforations, notify the authority having jurisdiction if the storage tank is perforated, conduct additional investigations or take remedial actions in accordance with directions issued by the authority having jurisdiction, remove sludge from the storage tank and dispose of it in a manner acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction, make holes along the top of the storage tank large enough to permit filling the storage tank with inert material, fill the storage tank with sand, gravel, concrete or other inert material acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction, and remove associated piping from service in conformance with Sentence 4.3.17.1.(1).
AB Variations: If the authority having jurisdiction grants permission to abandon a storage tank in place in accordance with Sentence 4.3.17.2.(3), the owner shall purge the storage tank of vapours to less than 10% of the lower explosive limit, check for the presence of vapours using combustible gas detection equipment, arrange for a certified person to enter the storage tank and conduct an internal inspection of the storage tank for perforations, notify the authority having jurisdiction if the storage tank is perforated, conduct additional investigations or take remedial actions in accordance with directions issued by the authority having jurisdiction, remove sludge from the storage tank and dispose of it in a manner acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction, make holes along the top of the storage tank large enough to permit filling the storage tank with inert material, fill the storage tank with sand, gravel, concrete or other inert material acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction, and remove associated piping from service in conformance with Sentence 4.3.17.1.(1).

AB Full: Treads of a ladder in a swimming pool shall be not less than 75 mm wide over their full length and have slip-resistant surfaces, and be a uniform distance apart, with a distance of not less than 178 mm and not more than 305 mm in between treads.
AB Variations: Treads of a ladder in a swimming pool shall be not less than 75 mm wide over their full length and have slip-resistant surfaces, and be a uniform distance apart, with a distance of not less than 178 mm and not more than 305 mm in between treads.

AB Full: Joints in exterior horizontal log walls shall be constructed to be self-draining or gasketted, and resistant to water, air and insect infiltration.
AB Variations: Joints in exterior horizontal log walls shall be constructed to be self-draining or gasketted, and resistant to water, air and insect infiltration.

AB Full: In addition to the requirements of this Subsection, a water theme park shall be constructed in accordance with the remainder of this Section.
AB Variations: In addition to the requirements of this Subsection, a water theme park shall be constructed in accordance with the remainder of this Section.

AB Full: Fire safety at construction and demolition sites shall conform to Section 5.6. of Division B of the NFC(AE).
AB Variations: Fire safety at construction and demolition sites shall conform to Section 5.6. of Division B of the NFC(AE).

AB Full: A whirlpool shall have a minimum clear deck space not less than 1.8 m at the main entrance point.
AB Variations: A whirlpool shall have a minimum clear deck space not less than 1.8 m at the main entrance point.

AB Full: Submerged equalizers for skimming devices shall not be permitted.
AB Variations: Submerged equalizers for skimming devices shall not be permitted.

AB Full: Ventilation shall be provided for hazardous locations and processes in conformance with the NBC(AE) and with this Part.
AB Variations: Ventilation shall be provided for hazardous locations and processes in conformance with the NBC(AE) and with this Part.

AB Full: An aggregate of buildings as referred to in Sentence 10.4.7.1.(1) shall be considered as being a group of buildings that function as one unit and are not more than 10 m from each other, or are physically connected to each other by corridors, walkways or other facilities through which fire or smoke could spread.
AB Variations: An aggregate of buildings as referred to in Sentence 10.4.7.1.(1) shall be considered as being a group of buildings that function as one unit and are not more than 10 m from each other, or are physically connected to each other by corridors, walkways or other facilities through which fire or smoke could spread.

AB Full: A door to a service room may open outward from the service room.
AB Variations: A door to a service room may open outward from the service room.

AB Full: Not less than one swimming pool ladder with grab rails shall be located adjacent to the platform of an above-ground swimming pool and one ladder shall be provided at the opposite side or end of the swimming pool.
AB Variations: Not less than one swimming pool ladder with grab rails shall be located adjacent to the platform of an above-ground swimming pool and one ladder shall be provided at the opposite side or end of the swimming pool.

AB Full: Any diving board or platform that is provided shall have corrosion-resistant anchorage fittings and hardware and be rigidly constructed and properly anchored at the base with sufficient bracing to ensure stability under the heaviest possible design load.
AB Variations: Any diving board or platform that is provided shall have corrosion-resistant anchorage fittings and hardware and be rigidly constructed and properly anchored at the base with sufficient bracing to ensure stability under the heaviest possible design load.

AB Full: Logs shall be seasoned to a moisture content not exceeding 19% before installation.
AB Variations: Logs shall be seasoned to a moisture content not exceeding 19% before installation.

AB Full: A basement shall not be used for the storage, manufacture or handling of volatile solids, liquids or gases that generate explosive air-vapour mixtures or for processes that involve explosive dusts.
AB Variations: A basement shall not be used for the storage, manufacture or handling of volatile solids, liquids or gases that generate explosive air-vapour mixtures or for processes that involve explosive dusts.

AB Full: No access to exit for patrons in an assembly occupancy shall pass through a kitchen, service space or storage room.
AB Variations: No access to exit for patrons in an assembly occupancy shall pass through a kitchen, service space or storage room.

AB Full: Door release hardware, latches and locks shall be maintained in good working condition at all times.
AB Variations: Door release hardware, latches and locks shall be maintained in good working condition at all times.

AB Full: The portion of any log coming into contact with masonry or concrete at or below ground level, or with soil, shall be treated with preservative.
AB Variations: The portion of any log coming into contact with masonry or concrete at or below ground level, or with soil, shall be treated with preservative.

AB Full: A building referred to in this Part is permitted to have a permanent or temporary foundation.
AB Variations: A building referred to in this Part is permitted to have a permanent or temporary foundation.

AB Full: Logs used in log construction shall be sound and free of rot or other such defects.
AB Variations: Logs used in log construction shall be sound and free of rot or other such defects.

AB Full: One in every five treatment rooms or part thereof shall have a doorway with a clear width not less than 915 mm when the door is in the open position, be designed to allow a person using a wheelchair to turn in an open space not less than 1 500 mm in diameter, and have one lavatory conforming to Article 3.8.3.15.
AB Variations: One in every five treatment rooms or part thereof shall have a doorway with a clear width not less than 915 mm when the door is in the open position, be designed to allow a person using a wheelchair to turn in an open space not less than 1 500 mm in diameter, and have one lavatory conforming to Article 3.8.3.15.

AB Full: Except where they are equipped with hold-open devices conforming to the NBC(AE), doors in fire separations that are required to be equipped with self-closing devices shall be inspected at intervals not greater than 24 h to ensure that they remain in the closed position when not in use.
AB Variations: Except where they are equipped with hold-open devices conforming to the NBC(AE), doors in fire separations that are required to be equipped with self-closing devices shall be inspected at intervals not greater than 24 h to ensure that they remain in the closed position when not in use.

AB Full: The number of water closets required by Sentence 3.7.2.4.(2) for a campground is permitted to be provided by self-contained recreation vehicles or camping sites served by water and sewer connections, provided that the number of camping sites used to calculate water closet requirements is not reduced to less than one third of the total number of camping sites.
AB Variations: The number of water closets required by Sentence 3.7.2.4.(2) for a campground is permitted to be provided by self-contained recreation vehicles or camping sites served by water and sewer connections, provided that the number of camping sites used to calculate water closet requirements is not reduced to less than one third of the total number of camping sites.

AB Full: Buildings intended for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.6.(3) of Division B of the NBC(AE), have ventilation in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.6.(4) of Division B of the NBC(AE), and be designed to prevent the ammonium nitrate from coming into contact with building materials that may react with it as described in Sentence 3.3.6.6.(6) of Division B of the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Buildings intended for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.6.(3) of Division B of the NBC(AE), have ventilation in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.6.(4) of Division B of the NBC(AE), and be designed to prevent the ammonium nitrate from coming into contact with building materials that may react with it as described in Sentence 3.3.6.6.(6) of Division B of the NBC(AE).

AB Full: All plumbing installations shall comply with the Plumbing Code Regulation and Private Sewage Disposal Systems Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.
AB Variations: All plumbing installations shall comply with the Plumbing Code Regulation and Private Sewage Disposal Systems Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.

AB Full: Methods to ensure safe entry, in addition to water backup, deceleration distance and attitude control, are acceptable if safe discharge velocities and slider attitudes are assured under normal use.
AB Variations: Methods to ensure safe entry, in addition to water backup, deceleration distance and attitude control, are acceptable if safe discharge velocities and slider attitudes are assured under normal use.

AB Full: The fire safety plan for a building within the scope of Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC(AE) shall be kept at the central alarm and control facility.
AB Variations: The fire safety plan for a building within the scope of Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC(AE) shall be kept at the central alarm and control facility.

AB Full: Except as provided in Sentence 2.8.3.2.(2), fire drills as described in Sentence 2.8.3.1.(1) shall be held at intervals not greater than 12 months for the supervisory staff, except that in day-care centres and in Group B major occupancies, such drills shall be held at intervals not greater than one month, in schools attended by children, total evacuation fire drills shall be held at least 3 times in each of the fall and spring school terms, and in buildings within the scope of Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC(AE), such drills shall be held at intervals not greater than 2 months.
AB Variations: Except as provided in Sentence 2.8.3.2.(2), fire drills as described in Sentence 2.8.3.1.(1) shall be held at intervals not greater than 12 months for the supervisory staff, except that in day-care centres and in Group B major occupancies, such drills shall be held at intervals not greater than one month, in schools attended by children, total evacuation fire drills shall be held at least 3 times in each of the fall and spring school terms, and in buildings within the scope of Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC(AE), such drills shall be held at intervals not greater than 2 months.

AB Full: This Subsection applies to all steam rooms and sauna rooms, except those serving a single dwelling unit or a house with a secondary suite.
AB Variations: This Subsection applies to all steam rooms and sauna rooms, except those serving a single dwelling unit or a house with a secondary suite.

AB Full: Smoke alarms in a house with a secondary suite shall be interconnected so that the activation of any one smoke alarm causes all smoke alarms within the house with a secondary suite to sound. (See Note A-9.10.19.5.(2).)
AB Variations: Smoke alarms in a house with a secondary suite shall be interconnected so that the activation of any one smoke alarm causes all smoke alarms within the house with a secondary suite to sound. (See Note A-9.10.19.5.(2).)

AB Full: If it is impracticable to remove an underground storage tank, the owner shall apply to the authority having jurisdiction for permission to abandon the storage tank in place.
AB Variations: If it is impracticable to remove an underground storage tank, the owner shall apply to the authority having jurisdiction for permission to abandon the storage tank in place.

AB Full: Skirting shall be installed on that portion of the space beneath the module that is more than 750 mm in height measured at the exterior face of the module and measured between the ground surface and the underside of the module.
AB Variations: Skirting shall be installed on that portion of the space beneath the module that is more than 750 mm in height measured at the exterior face of the module and measured between the ground surface and the underside of the module.

AB Full: Lighting with a minimum of 215 lx shall be provided at deck level and at the water surface of an indoor swimming pool facility, and at deck level of a water spray park.
AB Variations: Lighting with a minimum of 215 lx shall be provided at deck level and at the water surface of an indoor swimming pool facility, and at deck level of a water spray park.

AB Full: This Section applies to garages and carports serving not more than one dwelling unitor a house with a secondary suite .
AB Variations: This Section applies to garages and carports serving not more than one dwelling unitor a house with a secondary suite .

AB Full: Cylinders of anhydrous ammonia or dangerous goods classified as toxic or oxidizing gases stored indoors shall be located in a room that is separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.3.(2) of Division B of the NBC(AE), is located on an exterior wall, can be entered from the exterior, and whose closures leading to the interior of the building are in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.3.(2) of Division B of the NBC(AE), and is provided with ventilation to the outdoors.
AB Variations: Cylinders of anhydrous ammonia or dangerous goods classified as toxic or oxidizing gases stored indoors shall be located in a room that is separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.3.(2) of Division B of the NBC(AE), is located on an exterior wall, can be entered from the exterior, and whose closures leading to the interior of the building are in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.3.(2) of Division B of the NBC(AE), and is provided with ventilation to the outdoors.

AB Full: If a brushed concrete finish is used on a deck surface, the brushing shall be done toward the drains.
AB Variations: If a brushed concrete finish is used on a deck surface, the brushing shall be done toward the drains.

AB Full: Roof live load shall be ground snow load and associated rain load, and is permitted to be modified by a coefficient but shall be not less than 2 kPa.
AB Variations: Roof live load shall be ground snow load and associated rain load, and is permitted to be modified by a coefficient but shall be not less than 2 kPa.

AB Full: The number of water closets, lavatories and urinals serving dressing rooms shall be based on the bathing load and determined in accordance with Articles 3.7.2.2. and 3.7.2.3.
AB Variations: The number of water closets, lavatories and urinals serving dressing rooms shall be based on the bathing load and determined in accordance with Articles 3.7.2.2. and 3.7.2.3.

AB Full: Not more than one elevator at one time is required to operate on emergency power.
AB Variations: Not more than one elevator at one time is required to operate on emergency power.

AB Full: Disposal chutes described in Clause 8.2.5.2.(1)(b) of Division B of the NBC(AE) shall be constructed of noncombustible material, or terminate not less than 2 m above the disposal bin they serve.
AB Variations: Disposal chutes described in Clause 8.2.5.2.(1)(b) of Division B of the NBC(AE) shall be constructed of noncombustible material, or terminate not less than 2 m above the disposal bin they serve.

AB Full: Low pressure storage tanks shall be constructed in conformance with API 620-2013 Design and Construction of Large, Welded, Low-Pressure Storage Tanks or ASME BPVC-2017 Boiler and Pressure Vessel Code
AB Variations: Low pressure storage tanks shall be constructed in conformance with API 620-2013 Design and Construction of Large, Welded, Low-Pressure Storage Tanks or ASME BPVC-2017 Boiler and Pressure Vessel Code

AB Full: For a deck-level wading pool, the required surge capacity is permitted to be less than the volume stated in Sentence 7.2.3.27.(2) provided the proposed surge capacity is acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction.
AB Variations: For a deck-level wading pool, the required surge capacity is permitted to be less than the volume stated in Sentence 7.2.3.27.(2) provided the proposed surge capacity is acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction.

AB Full: If lead sheet is used as a flashing for a plumbing system pipe, it shall be worked over and into a hub of the increaser, which shall then be fitted with a 100 mm diam or larger roof ring caulked into the hub of the increaser.
AB Variations: If lead sheet is used as a flashing for a plumbing system pipe, it shall be worked over and into a hub of the increaser, which shall then be fitted with a 100 mm diam or larger roof ring caulked into the hub of the increaser.

AB Full: The location of dispensers of Class I liquids within a building shall conform to Subsection 3.3.5. of Division B of the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: The location of dispensers of Class I liquids within a building shall conform to Subsection 3.3.5. of Division B of the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Except as permitted in Table 3.2.7.6., solid and liquid dangerous goods classified as oxidizers or organic peroxides shall be separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.2.(1) of Division B of the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Except as permitted in Table 3.2.7.6., solid and liquid dangerous goods classified as oxidizers or organic peroxides shall be separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.2.(1) of Division B of the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Where a storage tank is to be permanently disposed of, sufficient openings shall be cut in the tank to render it unfit for further use. (See Note A-4.3.16.3.(1).)
AB Variations: Where a storage tank is to be permanently disposed of, sufficient openings shall be cut in the tank to render it unfit for further use. (See Note A-4.3.16.3.(1).)

AB Full: The identification plate shall be fixed to the module in a location that is visible when the unit is complexed or standing alone.
AB Variations: The identification plate shall be fixed to the module in a location that is visible when the unit is complexed or standing alone.

AB Full: Insulation shields required in Sentence 9.25.2.3.(9) shall be constructed of noncombustible material of sufficient thickness so that they will not be deformed during installation and shall be designed so that the appropriate clearance is maintained automatically.
AB Variations: Insulation shields required in Sentence 9.25.2.3.(9) shall be constructed of noncombustible material of sufficient thickness so that they will not be deformed during installation and shall be designed so that the appropriate clearance is maintained automatically.

AB Full: The foundation depths required in Sentence 9.12.2.2.(1) are permitted to be decreased where experience with local soil conditions shows that lesser depths are satisfactory, or where the foundation is designed for lesser depths by a registered professional.
AB Variations: The foundation depths required in Sentence 9.12.2.2.(1) are permitted to be decreased where experience with local soil conditions shows that lesser depths are satisfactory, or where the foundation is designed for lesser depths by a registered professional.

AB Full: Other methods acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction are permitted to be used to supply water to a storage area in lieu of the water supplies specified in Sentence 3.3.2.16.(1).
AB Variations: Other methods acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction are permitted to be used to supply water to a storage area in lieu of the water supplies specified in Sentence 3.3.2.16.(1).

AB Full: Where a building contains more than one major occupancy, such occupancies shall be separated from each other in conformance with the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Where a building contains more than one major occupancy, such occupancies shall be separated from each other in conformance with the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Non-fixed seating shall conform to the NFC(AE).
AB Variations: Non-fixed seating shall conform to the NFC(AE).

AB Full: Fuel supplies for heating equipment and internal combustion engines shall conform to CSA B139-15 Installation Code for Oil-Burning Equipment or CSA B149.1-10 Natural Gas and Propane Installation Code
AB Variations: Fuel supplies for heating equipment and internal combustion engines shall conform to CSA B139-15 Installation Code for Oil-Burning Equipment or CSA B149.1-10 Natural Gas and Propane Installation Code

AB Full: The limits on the area of glazed openings shall not apply to the exposing building face of a dwelling unit facing a detached garage or accessory building, where the detached garage or accessory building serves only one dwelling unit or a house with a secondary suite, the detached garage or accessory building is located on the same property as that dwelling unit, and the dwelling unit served by the detached garage or accessory building is the only major occupancy on the property.
AB Variations: The limits on the area of glazed openings shall not apply to the exposing building face of a dwelling unit facing a detached garage or accessory building, where the detached garage or accessory building serves only one dwelling unit or a house with a secondary suite, the detached garage or accessory building is located on the same property as that dwelling unit, and the dwelling unit served by the detached garage or accessory building is the only major occupancy on the property.

AB Full: The floor of an equipment or mechanical room shall have a slope not less than 1:50 and not more than 1:25 to floor drains.
AB Variations: The floor of an equipment or mechanical room shall have a slope not less than 1:50 and not more than 1:25 to floor drains.

AB Full: An above-ground swimming pool is permitted to be installed and operated as a public swimming pool or semi-public swimming pool adjacent to or near existing dressing rooms if the existing dressing rooms are in satisfactory condition and the layout and number of showers meet the requirements of this Code, and an impervious walkway, not less than 1.2 m wide, is provided between the swimming pool and dressing rooms.
AB Variations: An above-ground swimming pool is permitted to be installed and operated as a public swimming pool or semi-public swimming pool adjacent to or near existing dressing rooms if the existing dressing rooms are in satisfactory condition and the layout and number of showers meet the requirements of this Code, and an impervious walkway, not less than 1.2 m wide, is provided between the swimming pool and dressing rooms.

AB Full: If acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction, fire protection is permitted to be provided by municipal street hydrants and mobile pumping equipment. (See Note A-3.3.2.17.(2).)
AB Variations: If acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction, fire protection is permitted to be provided by municipal street hydrants and mobile pumping equipment. (See Note A-3.3.2.17.(2).)

AB Full: Flame-retardant treatments shall be renewed as often as is required to ensure that the material will pass the match flame test in NFPA 705-2018 Recommended Practice for a Field Flame Test for Textiles and Films (See Note A-2.3.2.2.(1).)
AB Variations: Flame-retardant treatments shall be renewed as often as is required to ensure that the material will pass the match flame test in NFPA 705-2018 Recommended Practice for a Field Flame Test for Textiles and Films (See Note A-2.3.2.2.(1).)

AB Full: Tests to ensure operation in conformance with ASME/CSA ASME A17.1-2013/CSA B44-13 Safety Code for Elevators and Escalators shall be performed on in-car emergency service switches, manual key-operated recall switches located outside an elevator shaft, and automatic emergency recall systems.
AB Variations: Tests to ensure operation in conformance with ASME/CSA ASME A17.1-2013/CSA B44-13 Safety Code for Elevators and Escalators shall be performed on in-car emergency service switches, manual key-operated recall switches located outside an elevator shaft, and automatic emergency recall systems.

AB Full: Where life safety and fire protection systems are installed, they shall be tested in accordance with the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Where life safety and fire protection systems are installed, they shall be tested in accordance with the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Handrails are not required for stairs and ramps serving a single dwelling unit or a house with a secondary suite, where interior stairs have not more than 2 risers, exterior stairs have not more than 3 risers, or ramps rise not more than 400 mm.
AB Variations: Handrails are not required for stairs and ramps serving a single dwelling unit or a house with a secondary suite, where interior stairs have not more than 2 risers, exterior stairs have not more than 3 risers, or ramps rise not more than 400 mm.

AB Full: The capacity of gas chlorinators used for an outdoor swimming pool shall be sufficient to feed at a rate of 1.35 kg of chlorine per 24 h per 45  000 L of swimming pool capacity.
AB Variations: The capacity of gas chlorinators used for an outdoor swimming pool shall be sufficient to feed at a rate of 1.35 kg of chlorine per 24 h per 45 000 L of swimming pool capacity.

AB Full: An above-ground swimming pool platform shall be supplied for not less than 30% of the swimming pool perimeter.
AB Variations: An above-ground swimming pool platform shall be supplied for not less than 30% of the swimming pool perimeter.

AB Full: All circulation system components shall comply with NSF/ANSI 50-2017 Equipment and Chemicals for Swimming Pools, Spas, Hot Tubs and Other Recreational Water Facilities and shall have the approval of an accepted testing laboratory.
AB Variations: All circulation system components shall comply with NSF/ANSI 50-2017 Equipment and Chemicals for Swimming Pools, Spas, Hot Tubs and Other Recreational Water Facilities and shall have the approval of an accepted testing laboratory.

AB Full: A concealed space referred to in Sentence 3.2.5.12.(10) need not be equipped with sprinklers, provided the concealed space meets one of the criteria described in Clause 8.15.1.2 of NFPA 13-2013 Installation of Sprinkler Systems
AB Variations: A concealed space referred to in Sentence 3.2.5.12.(10) need not be equipped with sprinklers, provided the concealed space meets one of the criteria described in Clause 8.15.1.2 of NFPA 13-2013 Installation of Sprinkler Systems

AB Full: In buildings not required to be equipped with a standpipe and hose system by the NBC(AE), hose stations shall be provided in the vicinity of the storage room, such that all parts of the room are within reach of a hose stream. (See Note A-4.3.14.4.(1).)
AB Variations: In buildings not required to be equipped with a standpipe and hose system by the NBC(AE), hose stations shall be provided in the vicinity of the storage room, such that all parts of the room are within reach of a hose stream. (See Note A-4.3.14.4.(1).)

AB Full: If the window referred to in Sentence 9.9.10.1.(1) is provided with security bars, the security bars shall be openable from the inside without the use of keys, tools or special knowledge.
AB Variations: If the window referred to in Sentence 9.9.10.1.(1) is provided with security bars, the security bars shall be openable from the inside without the use of keys, tools or special knowledge.

AB Full: Storage tank systems for Class II and IIIA liquids inside buildings shall conform to this Part when they are used to supply appliances installed in conformance with CSA B139-15 Installation Code for Oil-Burning Equipment
AB Variations: Storage tank systems for Class II and IIIA liquids inside buildings shall conform to this Part when they are used to supply appliances installed in conformance with CSA B139-15 Installation Code for Oil-Burning Equipment

AB Full: Not less than one hose bibcock conforming to the requirements of Article 7.2.3.17. shall be provided in each dressing room.
AB Variations: Not less than one hose bibcock conforming to the requirements of Article 7.2.3.17. shall be provided in each dressing room.

AB Full: The owner of industrial relocatable accommodation shall, at a camp location, appoint a fire crew and ensure that it is trained for firefighting duties at the camp (see Note A-2.14.1.1.(3)(a)), ensure that the work force is familiar with the fire hazards that exist in and around the camp, and appoint one person to be responsible for fire prevention and inspection duties in the camp.
AB Variations: The owner of industrial relocatable accommodation shall, at a camp location, appoint a fire crew and ensure that it is trained for firefighting duties at the camp (see Note A-2.14.1.1.(3)(a)), ensure that the work force is familiar with the fire hazards that exist in and around the camp, and appoint one person to be responsible for fire prevention and inspection duties in the camp.
