AB Full: A barrier-free path of travel shall be provided from the entrance referred to in Article 3.8.2.2. to an exterior parking area, if exterior parking is provided, at least one parking level in a parking structure, and every parking level in a parking structure served by a passenger elevator.
AB Variations: A barrier-free path of travel shall be provided from the entrance referred to in Article 3.8.2.2. to an exterior parking area, if exterior parking is provided, at least one parking level in a parking structure, and every parking level in a parking structure served by a passenger elevator.

AB Full: Except as permitted in Article 4.3.17.2., when an underground storage tank system has no further use or has been out of service for 2 years, the owner shall notify the authority having jurisdiction in writing at least 30 days before the removal of an underground storage tank system, storage tanks shall have all flammable liquids and combustible liquids removed from them, storage tanks shall be purged of vapours and removed from the ground (see Note A-4.3.17.1.(1)(c)), and the associated piping shall be purged of vapours and the ends permanently sealed by capping or plugging, or removed from the ground.
AB Variations: Except as permitted in Article 4.3.17.2., when an underground storage tank system has no further use or has been out of service for 2 years, the owner shall notify the authority having jurisdiction in writing at least 30 days before the removal of an underground storage tank system, storage tanks shall have all flammable liquids and combustible liquids removed from them, storage tanks shall be purged of vapours and removed from the ground (see Note A-4.3.17.1.(1)(c)), and the associated piping shall be purged of vapours and the ends permanently sealed by capping or plugging, or removed from the ground.

AB Full: If required by the authority having jurisdiction, the record referred to in Sentence 4.4.4.1.(4) shall be the subject of an audit performed in a manner acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction.
AB Variations: If required by the authority having jurisdiction, the record referred to in Sentence 4.4.4.1.(4) shall be the subject of an audit performed in a manner acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction.

AB Full: Notwithstanding the requirements of this Subsection, plumbing fixtures are not required for a building of low human occupancy. (See Note A-3.7.2.1.(4).)
AB Variations: Notwithstanding the requirements of this Subsection, plumbing fixtures are not required for a building of low human occupancy. (See Note A-3.7.2.1.(4).)

AB Full: This Subsection is concerned with the efficient use of energy by systems used to heat service water for household use as well as for indoor swimming pools, including hot tubs.
AB Variations: This Subsection is concerned with the efficient use of energy by systems used to heat service water for household use as well as for indoor swimming pools, including hot tubs.

AB Full: At least 2 emergency wave shutdown switches, one located on each side of the pool, shall be provided at pool side for use by the supervisory staff of a wave pool.
AB Variations: At least 2 emergency wave shutdown switches, one located on each side of the pool, shall be provided at pool side for use by the supervisory staff of a wave pool.

AB Full: The owner of a storage tank shall ensure that documentation is provided that indicates the location of the storage tank, the product to be stored in the storage tank, the capacity of the storage tank, the material from which the storage tank is constructed, the type of corrosion protection, if any, applied to the storage tank, and the records of any leak tests performed on the storage tank.
AB Variations: The owner of a storage tank shall ensure that documentation is provided that indicates the location of the storage tank, the product to be stored in the storage tank, the capacity of the storage tank, the material from which the storage tank is constructed, the type of corrosion protection, if any, applied to the storage tank, and the records of any leak tests performed on the storage tank.

AB Full: Electrical installations, including the service capacity of the installation and the number and distribution of circuits and receptacles, shall conform to the Electrical Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.
AB Variations: Electrical installations, including the service capacity of the installation and the number and distribution of circuits and receptacles, shall conform to the Electrical Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.

AB Full: Buildings used for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall incorporate spatial separation and exposure protection in conformance with Subsection 3.2.3. of Division B of the NBC(AE). (See Note A-3.2.9.2.(5).)
AB Variations: Buildings used for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall incorporate spatial separation and exposure protection in conformance with Subsection 3.2.3. of Division B of the NBC(AE). (See Note A-3.2.9.2.(5).)

AB Full: Service information that is required to be placed monthly or annually on the tag referred to in Sentences 6.1.1.5.(3)and 6.1.1.5.(4) shall be handwritten.
AB Variations: Service information that is required to be placed monthly or annually on the tag referred to in Sentences 6.1.1.5.(3)and 6.1.1.5.(4) shall be handwritten.

(www.ul.com)ULCULC Standards (canada.ul.com/ulcstandards)UNUnited Nations (www.un.org)

AB Full: A building containing sleeping accommodation is permitted to include spaces for other uses not exceeding 100 m2 each in area, and if more than 50 m2 in area, each space shall be separated from the remainder of the building by doors and a wall conforming to Sentence 10.4.1.3.(3) and Article 10.4.5.1.
AB Variations: A building containing sleeping accommodation is permitted to include spaces for other uses not exceeding 100 m2 each in area, and if more than 50 m2 in area, each space shall be separated from the remainder of the building by doors and a wall conforming to Sentence 10.4.1.3.(3) and Article 10.4.5.1.

AB Full: Where a fire safety plan is required, it shall conform to Section 2.8. of Division B of the NFC(AE).
AB Variations: Where a fire safety plan is required, it shall conform to Section 2.8. of Division B of the NFC(AE).

AB Full: Every spray feature contained within a swimming pool or water spray park shall be connected to a potable source of water, or designed to deliver water that is 100% filtered and disinfected.
AB Variations: Every spray feature contained within a swimming pool or water spray park shall be connected to a potable source of water, or designed to deliver water that is 100% filtered and disinfected.

AB Full: Lights shall be located so that bulbs can be replaced even when the swimming pool is in full use.
AB Variations: Lights shall be located so that bulbs can be replaced even when the swimming pool is in full use.

AB Full: The airflow in and around a canopy or hood shall be in accordance with good engineering practice and each design shall be submitted to the authority having jurisdiction for review.
AB Variations: The airflow in and around a canopy or hood shall be in accordance with good engineering practice and each design shall be submitted to the authority having jurisdiction for review.

AB Full: Portable extinguishers shall be installed in conformance with the NFC(AE).
AB Variations: Portable extinguishers shall be installed in conformance with the NFC(AE).

AB Full: Where a heat-recovery ventilator is required in the reference house in accordance with Article 9.36.3.8., the ventilation flow rate, in L/s, in the zone served by the swimming pool shall be multiplied by 4.18 W/L/s to determine the heat-recovery ventilator power, in W, to be used in the energy model calculations.
AB Variations: Where a heat-recovery ventilator is required in the reference house in accordance with Article 9.36.3.8., the ventilation flow rate, in L/s, in the zone served by the swimming pool shall be multiplied by 4.18 W/L/s to determine the heat-recovery ventilator power, in W, to be used in the energy model calculations.

AB Full: Each submerged outlet shall be protected in conformance with ANSI/APSP/ICC ANSI/APSP/ICC-16 2017 Suction Outlet Fitting Assemblies (SOFA) for Use in Pools, Spas and Hot Tubs
AB Variations: Each submerged outlet shall be protected in conformance with ANSI/APSP/ICC ANSI/APSP/ICC-16 2017 Suction Outlet Fitting Assemblies (SOFA) for Use in Pools, Spas and Hot Tubs

AB Full: Wall, floor and ceiling assemblies of part 10. structures need not comply with Articles 9.36.2.3. to 9.36.2.6. (See Article 10.5.1.2.).
AB Variations: Wall, floor and ceiling assemblies of part 10. structures need not comply with Articles 9.36.2.3. to 9.36.2.6. (See Article 10.5.1.2.).

AB Full: Any portion of the swimming pool or water spray park construction concerning itself with facilities for its occupants shall be designed on the basis of 50% male and 50% female, or as dictated from experience or proposed use.
AB Variations: Any portion of the swimming pool or water spray park construction concerning itself with facilities for its occupants shall be designed on the basis of 50% male and 50% female, or as dictated from experience or proposed use.

AB Full: Buildings or parts thereof used for the storage of baled combustible fibres shall conform to Article 3.1.2.6. of Division B of the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Buildings or parts thereof used for the storage of baled combustible fibres shall conform to Article 3.1.2.6. of Division B of the NBC(AE).

AB Full: The emergency lighting system shall be installed and arranged to ensure that the water surface of the swimming pool, the deck, the deck area of a water spray park, the dressing room facility and the egress passageways are lit to a minimum average level of 10 lx to facilitate prompt evacuation.
AB Variations: The emergency lighting system shall be installed and arranged to ensure that the water surface of the swimming pool, the deck, the deck area of a water spray park, the dressing room facility and the egress passageways are lit to a minimum average level of 10 lx to facilitate prompt evacuation.

AB Full: Swimming pool inlets shall be constructed of corrosion-resistant material and shall be designed to minimize the effects of being blocked by bathers and to minimize the water stream effect.
AB Variations: Swimming pool inlets shall be constructed of corrosion-resistant material and shall be designed to minimize the effects of being blocked by bathers and to minimize the water stream effect.

AB Full: Except as required by Sentence 9.35.4.1.(2), interior finish need not be applied to garage and carport walls.
AB Variations: Except as required by Sentence 9.35.4.1.(2), interior finish need not be applied to garage and carport walls.

AB Full: A forced air heating system shall be provided with air filters.
AB Variations: A forced air heating system shall be provided with air filters.

AB Full: Notwithstanding the requirements of this Subsection, a semi-public swimming pool or water spray park is permitted to be installed and operated without providing a bathhouse, dressing rooms, lockers, showers, lavatories, urinals, or water closets if the summer camp, apartment building, condominium, private club, multiple housing unit, mobile home park, trailer park, or residential school is equipped with an adequate number of water closets, showers or baths, and lavatories, and the use of the swimming pool or water spray park is restricted entirely to registered guests, tenants, or members and their guests, except that if conditions exist, develop or are anticipated whereby the maintenance of satisfactory water quality is jeopardized, the authority having jurisdiction may require the installation of shower and water closet facilities.
AB Variations: Notwithstanding the requirements of this Subsection, a semi-public swimming pool or water spray park is permitted to be installed and operated without providing a bathhouse, dressing rooms, lockers, showers, lavatories, urinals, or water closets if the summer camp, apartment building, condominium, private club, multiple housing unit, mobile home park, trailer park, or residential school is equipped with an adequate number of water closets, showers or baths, and lavatories, and the use of the swimming pool or water spray park is restricted entirely to registered guests, tenants, or members and their guests, except that if conditions exist, develop or are anticipated whereby the maintenance of satisfactory water quality is jeopardized, the authority having jurisdiction may require the installation of shower and water closet facilities.

AB Full: Where a public sewage system is not available, the building sewer shall discharge into a private sewage disposal system.
AB Variations: Where a public sewage system is not available, the building sewer shall discharge into a private sewage disposal system.

AB Full: Except as provided in Sentence 4.6.4.2.(2)and Sentences 4.6.8.2.(6) to 4.6.8.2.(9) and in addition to the device required by Sentence 4.6.4.1.(1), an emergency shut-off switch to simultaneously stop the flow of fuel at all dispensers at self-service outlets shall be located at the central control console described in Sentence 4.6.8.2.(2) so that it is readily accessible to the attendant.
AB Variations: Except as provided in Sentence 4.6.4.2.(2)and Sentences 4.6.8.2.(6) to 4.6.8.2.(9) and in addition to the device required by Sentence 4.6.4.1.(1), an emergency shut-off switch to simultaneously stop the flow of fuel at all dispensers at self-service outlets shall be located at the central control console described in Sentence 4.6.8.2.(2) so that it is readily accessible to the attendant.

AB Full: This Part also applies to Group D and Group F, Division 3 occupancies for a workforce working in a temporary location.
AB Variations: This Part also applies to Group D and Group F, Division 3 occupancies for a workforce working in a temporary location.

AB Full: Doors listed and labeled as having not less than a 20 min fire-protection rating or as conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S113-16 Wood Core Doors Meeting the Performance Required by CAN/ULC-S104 for Twenty Minute Fire Rated Closure Assemblies shall be used as smoke doors, and between any part of a building and a corridor, an exit stair, or a service room.
AB Variations: Doors listed and labeled as having not less than a 20 min fire-protection rating or as conforming to ULC CAN/ULC-S113-16 Wood Core Doors Meeting the Performance Required by CAN/ULC-S104 for Twenty Minute Fire Rated Closure Assemblies shall be used as smoke doors, and between any part of a building and a corridor, an exit stair, or a service room.

AB Full: Where installed, a swimming pool shall be provided with a perimeter overflow system around the entire perimeter of the swimming pool.
AB Variations: Where installed, a swimming pool shall be provided with a perimeter overflow system around the entire perimeter of the swimming pool.

AB Full: Elevators shall comply with the Elevating Devices Codes Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.
AB Variations: Elevators shall comply with the Elevating Devices Codes Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.

AB Full: Foamed plastic shall not be exposed in any part of a building.
AB Variations: Foamed plastic shall not be exposed in any part of a building.

AB Full: The top surface of the barrier-free section referred to in Sentence 3.8.4.4.(1) shall be not more than 865 mm above the finished floor.
AB Variations: The top surface of the barrier-free section referred to in Sentence 3.8.4.4.(1) shall be not more than 865 mm above the finished floor.

AB Full: Every doorway into rooms within the dwelling unit shall have a clear width not less than 850 mm when the door is in the open position.
AB Variations: Every doorway into rooms within the dwelling unit shall have a clear width not less than 850 mm when the door is in the open position.

AB Full: Every doorway that is located in a barrier-free path of travel to a physician clinic or office shall have a clear width not less than 915 mm when the door is in the open position.
AB Variations: Every doorway that is located in a barrier-free path of travel to a physician clinic or office shall have a clear width not less than 915 mm when the door is in the open position.

AB Full: Shingles and shakes shall conform to CSA O118.1-08 Western Red Cedar Shakes and Shingles CSA O118.2-08 Eastern White Cedar Shingles or CSA O118.3-93 Northern Pine Tapersawn Shakes
AB Variations: Shingles and shakes shall conform to CSA O118.1-08 Western Red Cedar Shakes and Shingles CSA O118.2-08 Eastern White Cedar Shingles or CSA O118.3-93 Northern Pine Tapersawn Shakes

AB Full: The requirements regarding fire-resistance rating, type of construction and type of cladding need not apply to the exposing building face of a detached garage or accessory building facing a dwelling unit, where the detached garage or accessory building serves only one dwelling unit or a house with a secondary suite, the detached garage or accessory building is located on the same property as that dwelling unit, and the dwelling unit served by the detached garage or accessory building is the only major occupancy on the property.
AB Variations: The requirements regarding fire-resistance rating, type of construction and type of cladding need not apply to the exposing building face of a detached garage or accessory building facing a dwelling unit, where the detached garage or accessory building serves only one dwelling unit or a house with a secondary suite, the detached garage or accessory building is located on the same property as that dwelling unit, and the dwelling unit served by the detached garage or accessory building is the only major occupancy on the property.

AB Full: Electrical receptacles shall be mounted between 400 mm and 1 200 mm above the finished floor.
AB Variations: Electrical receptacles shall be mounted between 400 mm and 1 200 mm above the finished floor.

AB Full: A laboratory shall be separated from other parts of the building by fire separations conforming to this Code and the NBC(AE), but having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h.
AB Variations: A laboratory shall be separated from other parts of the building by fire separations conforming to this Code and the NBC(AE), but having a fire-resistance rating of not less than 1 h.

AB Full: The storage area provided for chemicals shall not be near heating equipment nor have direct access to areas that are accessible to the public.
AB Variations: The storage area provided for chemicals shall not be near heating equipment nor have direct access to areas that are accessible to the public.

AB Full: For areas between adjacent swimming pools, the minimum required deck width shall be the aggregate of the minimum required deck width for each pool.
AB Variations: For areas between adjacent swimming pools, the minimum required deck width shall be the aggregate of the minimum required deck width for each pool.

AB Full: The owner of a building for which Sentences 3.2.4.7.(1) to 3.2.4.7.(3) require signals to the fire department shall provide evidence of compliance to the authority having jurisdiction by means of a Fire Protective Signalling Certificate from a certified listing agency showing the address of the building, the listed fire alarm installation company, and the listed fire alarm monitoring company.
AB Variations: The owner of a building for which Sentences 3.2.4.7.(1) to 3.2.4.7.(3) require signals to the fire department shall provide evidence of compliance to the authority having jurisdiction by means of a Fire Protective Signalling Certificate from a certified listing agency showing the address of the building, the listed fire alarm installation company, and the listed fire alarm monitoring company.

AB Full: The disinfectant injection equipment shall be on the swimming pool supply line and as close to the swimming pool inlet as possible.
AB Variations: The disinfectant injection equipment shall be on the swimming pool supply line and as close to the swimming pool inlet as possible.

AB Full: At the 1.2 m mark and at any point in a swimming pool where the slope is greater than 1:12, the swimming pool shall be equipped with provisions for the installation of a safety line having a minimum diameter of 19 mm and equipped with floats.
AB Variations: At the 1.2 m mark and at any point in a swimming pool where the slope is greater than 1:12, the swimming pool shall be equipped with provisions for the installation of a safety line having a minimum diameter of 19 mm and equipped with floats.

AB Full: Except as required in Sentence 9.10.22.1.(2), natural gas and propane cooktops and ovens shall be installed in accordance with the Gas Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act. (See also Article 9.34.1.1.)
AB Variations: Except as required in Sentence 9.10.22.1.(2), natural gas and propane cooktops and ovens shall be installed in accordance with the Gas Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act. (See also Article 9.34.1.1.)

AB Full: Heating, ventilating and air-conditioning appliances and equipment shall be installed in conformance with the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Heating, ventilating and air-conditioning appliances and equipment shall be installed in conformance with the NBC(AE).

AB Full: In addition to the requirements in Sentence 4.6.8.5.(1), attendants on duty at marine fuel-dispensing stations shall activate the controls to permit the dispensing of fuel at an individual dispenser only after all ports and hatches on the watercraft have been closed, and ensure that containers for flammable liquids and combustible liquids, are not filled beyond their safe filling level, and are filled only after they have been removed from the watercraft or aircraft.
AB Variations: In addition to the requirements in Sentence 4.6.8.5.(1), attendants on duty at marine fuel-dispensing stations shall activate the controls to permit the dispensing of fuel at an individual dispenser only after all ports and hatches on the watercraft have been closed, and ensure that containers for flammable liquids and combustible liquids, are not filled beyond their safe filling level, and are filled only after they have been removed from the watercraft or aircraft.

AB Full: The number of showers provided in each dressing room shall be one for each 50 bathers and not less than 3 showers per dressing room.
AB Variations: The number of showers provided in each dressing room shall be one for each 50 bathers and not less than 3 showers per dressing room.

AB Full: Except as otherwise provided by this Subsection, interior finishes, furnishings and decorative materials shall conform to Section 2.3. of Division B of the NFC(AE).
AB Variations: Except as otherwise provided by this Subsection, interior finishes, furnishings and decorative materials shall conform to Section 2.3. of Division B of the NFC(AE).

AB Full: All ducts for a heating system and for a ventilation system shall be constructed of galvanized steel.
AB Variations: All ducts for a heating system and for a ventilation system shall be constructed of galvanized steel.

AB Full: Valved piping shall be provided for regulating flow through the heater and for by-passing or isolating the heater.
AB Variations: Valved piping shall be provided for regulating flow through the heater and for by-passing or isolating the heater.

AB Full: At least one elevator shall be provided with features described in Sentences 3.2.6.5.(4) to 3.2.6.5.(8).
AB Variations: At least one elevator shall be provided with features described in Sentences 3.2.6.5.(4) to 3.2.6.5.(8).

AB Full: An assistive listening device shall be provided at the main reception area and in at least one physical examination or treatment room. (See Note A-3.8.3.18.)
AB Variations: An assistive listening device shall be provided at the main reception area and in at least one physical examination or treatment room. (See Note A-3.8.3.18.)

AB Full: A skimming device shall be constructed of substantial corrosion-resistant materials, be fully recessed behind the face of the swimming pool wall, have access provided in the deck to each skimmer, have automatic adjustment of the overflow weir to variations in water level through a vertical distance of not less than 75 mm, have a valve or other device at each skimmer discharge for flow regulation so that uniform skimming action can be achieved, be designed to take not less than 3 L/s for each unit, be provided with a non-corrosive basket in the body of the device, and be equipped with grills on the face that are capable of removal for cleaning purposes.
AB Variations: A skimming device shall be constructed of substantial corrosion-resistant materials, be fully recessed behind the face of the swimming pool wall, have access provided in the deck to each skimmer, have automatic adjustment of the overflow weir to variations in water level through a vertical distance of not less than 75 mm, have a valve or other device at each skimmer discharge for flow regulation so that uniform skimming action can be achieved, be designed to take not less than 3 L/s for each unit, be provided with a non-corrosive basket in the body of the device, and be equipped with grills on the face that are capable of removal for cleaning purposes.

AB Full: An adequate water supply for firefighting shall be provided as soon as combustible construction materials arrive on the site. (See Note A-5.6.3.5.(1).) (See also Note A-3.2.5.7. of Division B of the NBC(AE).)
AB Variations: An adequate water supply for firefighting shall be provided as soon as combustible construction materials arrive on the site. (See Note A-5.6.3.5.(1).) (See also Note A-3.2.5.7. of Division B of the NBC(AE).)

AB Full: This Part provides for the inspection, testing and maintenance of the fire emergency systems installed in high buildings as defined in Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: This Part provides for the inspection, testing and maintenance of the fire emergency systems installed in high buildings as defined in Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Ducts used to ventilate a flammable liquids or combustible liquids storage room described in Sentence 6.9.1.2.(3) shall be used solely for that purpose.
AB Variations: Ducts used to ventilate a flammable liquids or combustible liquids storage room described in Sentence 6.9.1.2.(3) shall be used solely for that purpose.

AB Full: Portable extinguishers shall be installed in all buildings except dwelling units. (See Note A-2.1.5.1.(1).)
AB Variations: Portable extinguishers shall be installed in all buildings except dwelling units. (See Note A-2.1.5.1.(1).)

AB Full: A field review shall be carried out by the designer or by another suitably qualified person to ascertain that the subsurface conditions are consistent with the design and that construction is carried out in accordance with the design and good engineering practice. (See Note A-4.2.2.3.(1).)
AB Variations: A field review shall be carried out by the designer or by another suitably qualified person to ascertain that the subsurface conditions are consistent with the design and that construction is carried out in accordance with the design and good engineering practice. (See Note A-4.2.2.3.(1).)

AB Full: A fire marshal appointed under Sentence 2.15.1.1.(1) shall, at least every 6 months, inspect the building and all related buildings for fire hazards and provide a written report to the person in charge indicating the condition of the exits, fire extinguishers and fire alarm equipment, and any other conditions relative to fire safety in the building or related buildings.
AB Variations: A fire marshal appointed under Sentence 2.15.1.1.(1) shall, at least every 6 months, inspect the building and all related buildings for fire hazards and provide a written report to the person in charge indicating the condition of the exits, fire extinguishers and fire alarm equipment, and any other conditions relative to fire safety in the building or related buildings.

AB Full: A wading pool or group of wading pools shall be designed to be served by an independent circulation system.
AB Variations: A wading pool or group of wading pools shall be designed to be served by an independent circulation system.

AB Full: Except as provided in Sentence 4.6.8.1.(2)and required by Sentences 4.6.8.2.(6) to 4.6.8.2.(9) for unattended self-service outlets, every fuel-dispensing station shall have at least one attendant referred to in Article 4.6.8.5. on duty when the station is open for business.
AB Variations: Except as provided in Sentence 4.6.8.1.(2)and required by Sentences 4.6.8.2.(6) to 4.6.8.2.(9) for unattended self-service outlets, every fuel-dispensing station shall have at least one attendant referred to in Article 4.6.8.5. on duty when the station is open for business.

AB Full: Materials installed to protect combustible sprinkler piping, as is required by the NBC(AE), shall be maintained in accordance with the provisions of the same edition of the NBC(AE) used for their installation. (See Note A-2.1.3.4.(1).)
AB Variations: Materials installed to protect combustible sprinkler piping, as is required by the NBC(AE), shall be maintained in accordance with the provisions of the same edition of the NBC(AE) used for their installation. (See Note A-2.1.3.4.(1).)

AB Full: The design, construction, installation and alteration of every elevator, escalator, passenger-elevating device, freight platform lift and dumbwaiter shall conform to the Elevating Devices Codes Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act. (See Note A-3.5.2.1.(1).)
AB Variations: The design, construction, installation and alteration of every elevator, escalator, passenger-elevating device, freight platform lift and dumbwaiter shall conform to the Elevating Devices Codes Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act. (See Note A-3.5.2.1.(1).)

AB Full: Unless otherwise specified herein, the documents referenced in this Code shall include all amendments, revisions, reaffirmations, reapprovals, addenda and supplements effective to 01 April 2019.
AB Variations: Unless otherwise specified herein, the documents referenced in this Code shall include all amendments, revisions, reaffirmations, reapprovals, addenda and supplements effective to 01 April 2019.

AB Full: Except as required by Sentences 4.3.1.7.(2) and 4.3.1.7.(3), a storage tank and its filling and emptying connections shall be identified in conformance with CFA 1990 Using the Canadian Fuels Colour-Symbol System to Mark Equipment and Vehicles for Product Identification
AB Variations: Except as required by Sentences 4.3.1.7.(2) and 4.3.1.7.(3), a storage tank and its filling and emptying connections shall be identified in conformance with CFA 1990 Using the Canadian Fuels Colour-Symbol System to Mark Equipment and Vehicles for Product Identification

AB Full: A circulation system for a swimming pool shall be designed to be capable of handling a turnover period that is the lesser of the turnover period calculated to accommodate the maximum number of bathers in any one day on the basis of providing 2 m3 of filtered chemically treated water per bather per day, or the applicable turnover period provided in Sentence 7.2.3.30.(2).
AB Variations: A circulation system for a swimming pool shall be designed to be capable of handling a turnover period that is the lesser of the turnover period calculated to accommodate the maximum number of bathers in any one day on the basis of providing 2 m3 of filtered chemically treated water per bather per day, or the applicable turnover period provided in Sentence 7.2.3.30.(2).

AB Full: The slope of the floor of a receiving pool shall be not more than 1:7.
AB Variations: The slope of the floor of a receiving pool shall be not more than 1:7.

AB Full: In a building to which this Part applies, air may be circulated provided supply and return air systems are ducted, and 100% of the supply air is exhausted and not returned from washroom facilities, clothes drying areas, and kitchens and other areas containing cooking facilities.
AB Variations: In a building to which this Part applies, air may be circulated provided supply and return air systems are ducted, and 100% of the supply air is exhausted and not returned from washroom facilities, clothes drying areas, and kitchens and other areas containing cooking facilities.

AB Full: Signs installed in accordance with Sentence 4.3.1.7.(2) shall be located on at least two sides of a storage tank.
AB Variations: Signs installed in accordance with Sentence 4.3.1.7.(2) shall be located on at least two sides of a storage tank.

AB Full: A minimum horizontal clearance not less than 1.2 m in width, of which 0.6 m shall be completely free of obstructions, shall be provided around the entire perimeter of an above-ground swimming pool.
AB Variations: A minimum horizontal clearance not less than 1.2 m in width, of which 0.6 m shall be completely free of obstructions, shall be provided around the entire perimeter of an above-ground swimming pool.

AB Full: Ventilation systems in storage rooms where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are stored in compliance with the NFC(AE) shall provide at least 5 L/s of exhaust air per square metre of room area, but not less than 70 L/s in total.
AB Variations: Ventilation systems in storage rooms where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are stored in compliance with the NFC(AE) shall provide at least 5 L/s of exhaust air per square metre of room area, but not less than 70 L/s in total.

AB Full: Underground service passageways shall be considered unusual structures under Sentence 3.2.2.2.(1).
AB Variations: Underground service passageways shall be considered unusual structures under Sentence 3.2.2.2.(1).

AB Full: At least one emergency shutdown switch shall be located at pool side for use by the supervisory staff of a whirlpool.
AB Variations: At least one emergency shutdown switch shall be located at pool side for use by the supervisory staff of a whirlpool.

AB Full: Tents and air-supported structures shall be designed and installed in conformance with the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Tents and air-supported structures shall be designed and installed in conformance with the NBC(AE).

AB Full: No person shall smoke or use an open-flame appliance or device, including welding or cutting equipment, in a storage area.
AB Variations: No person shall smoke or use an open-flame appliance or device, including welding or cutting equipment, in a storage area.

AB Full: The location of storage rooms referred to in Sentence 4.2.4.2.(4) shall conform to Article 3.3.2.16. and Sentence 3.3.4.3.(4) of Division B of the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: The location of storage rooms referred to in Sentence 4.2.4.2.(4) shall conform to Article 3.3.2.16. and Sentence 3.3.4.3.(4) of Division B of the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Storage piles shall not be located beneath electrical power lines.
AB Variations: Storage piles shall not be located beneath electrical power lines.

AB Full: At least one telephone with a built-in communication device for the deaf shall be provided where public telephones are installed.
AB Variations: At least one telephone with a built-in communication device for the deaf shall be provided where public telephones are installed.

AB Full: Every hose nozzle valve through which a Class I or II liquid is dispensed by a motorized dispenser into a vehicle tank shall be automatic closing as required in Sentence 4.6.5.2.(2), and conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S620-07 Hose Nozzle Valves for Flammable and Combustible Liquids
AB Variations: Every hose nozzle valve through which a Class I or II liquid is dispensed by a motorized dispenser into a vehicle tank shall be automatic closing as required in Sentence 4.6.5.2.(2), and conform to ULC CAN/ULC-S620-07 Hose Nozzle Valves for Flammable and Combustible Liquids

AB Full: The building shall be designed and constructed so that the acoustic insulation factor is not less than the value derived from Table 11.2.1.2.-C for each component of the exterior envelope of every kitchen, bathroom, laundry room, and all other rooms of a similar nature, in residential occupancies, and every private office, conference room, meeting room and all other rooms of a similar nature.
AB Variations: The building shall be designed and constructed so that the acoustic insulation factor is not less than the value derived from Table 11.2.1.2.-C for each component of the exterior envelope of every kitchen, bathroom, laundry room, and all other rooms of a similar nature, in residential occupancies, and every private office, conference room, meeting room and all other rooms of a similar nature.

AB Full: If a person who carries out the maintenance of fire protection installations, including but not limited to portable fire extinguishers, fire extinguishing systems, fire alarm systems or fire alarm devices, discovers that a device or system is inoperative or defective and the owner or their authorized agent is unwilling or unable to correct the defect, the person carrying out the maintenance shall forthwith notify, in writing, the fire department and the owner or their authorized agent of that notification.
AB Variations: If a person who carries out the maintenance of fire protection installations, including but not limited to portable fire extinguishers, fire extinguishing systems, fire alarm systems or fire alarm devices, discovers that a device or system is inoperative or defective and the owner or their authorized agent is unwilling or unable to correct the defect, the person carrying out the maintenance shall forthwith notify, in writing, the fire department and the owner or their authorized agent of that notification.

AB Full: For the purposes of this Subsection, the bathing load shall be based on one bather for each 1.5 m2 of swimming pool area or the maximum design bathing load for the water circulation system, whichever is lesser, for a swimming pool, other than a whirlpool, one bather for each 1.0 m2 of swimming pool area or the maximum design bathing load for the water circulation system, whichever is lesser, for whirlpools, and one bather for each 1.0 m2 of spray deck or splash area for a water spray park.
AB Variations: For the purposes of this Subsection, the bathing load shall be based on one bather for each 1.5 m2 of swimming pool area or the maximum design bathing load for the water circulation system, whichever is lesser, for a swimming pool, other than a whirlpool, one bather for each 1.0 m2 of swimming pool area or the maximum design bathing load for the water circulation system, whichever is lesser, for whirlpools, and one bather for each 1.0 m2 of spray deck or splash area for a water spray park.

AB Full: A deck surface shall be slip-resistant when wet, impervious to moisture, sufficiently smooth to facilitate cleaning and disinfecting, and finished so that there will be no discomfort to bare feet. (See Note A-7.2.3.15.(6).)
AB Variations: A deck surface shall be slip-resistant when wet, impervious to moisture, sufficiently smooth to facilitate cleaning and disinfecting, and finished so that there will be no discomfort to bare feet. (See Note A-7.2.3.15.(6).)

AB Full: Before being placed in service, every elevator, escalator, passenger-elevating device, freight platform lift or dumbwaiter installation, including safety and control devices, shall be inspected and tested in accordance with the Elevating Devices Codes Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.
AB Variations: Before being placed in service, every elevator, escalator, passenger-elevating device, freight platform lift or dumbwaiter installation, including safety and control devices, shall be inspected and tested in accordance with the Elevating Devices Codes Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act.

AB Full: The circulating water from a skimming device or perimeter overflow system and the circulating water from the main drains shall be separately valved and piped to the mechanical room, but are permitted to be joined at that location.
AB Variations: The circulating water from a skimming device or perimeter overflow system and the circulating water from the main drains shall be separately valved and piped to the mechanical room, but are permitted to be joined at that location.

AB Full: A building shall be located not closer than 15 m to any bushes, trees or similar vegetation.
AB Variations: A building shall be located not closer than 15 m to any bushes, trees or similar vegetation.

AB Full: Except as provided in Articles 6.9.4.2. and Article 6.3.1.5., the installation of heating and air-conditioning equipment, including mechanical refrigeration equipment, and including provisions for mounting, clearances and air supply, shall conform to the requirements of the Pressure Equipment Safety Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act, CSA B52-13 Mechanical Refrigeration Code CSA B139 Series-15 Installation Code for Oil-Burning Equipment the Gas Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act, CSA B365-17 Installation Code for Solid-Fuel-Burning Appliances and Equipment the Electrical Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act, or the Environmental Protection and Enhancement Act and its Regulations.
AB Variations: Except as provided in Articles 6.9.4.2. and Article 6.3.1.5., the installation of heating and air-conditioning equipment, including mechanical refrigeration equipment, and including provisions for mounting, clearances and air supply, shall conform to the requirements of the Pressure Equipment Safety Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act, CSA B52-13 Mechanical Refrigeration Code CSA B139 Series-15 Installation Code for Oil-Burning Equipment the Gas Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act, CSA B365-17 Installation Code for Solid-Fuel-Burning Appliances and Equipment the Electrical Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act, or the Environmental Protection and Enhancement Act and its Regulations.

AB Full: Operators of self-service outlets, fuel-dispensing stations and marine fuel-dispensing stations shall ensure that electronic liquid measuring or leak detection equipment is inspected each business day to confirm that the equipment is functioning as intended.
AB Variations: Operators of self-service outlets, fuel-dispensing stations and marine fuel-dispensing stations shall ensure that electronic liquid measuring or leak detection equipment is inspected each business day to confirm that the equipment is functioning as intended.

AB Full: Except as required by Article 10.4.2.2. for a wall of a service room, an air duct is permitted to penetrate a wall with membrane protection without installing a fire damper at the penetration.
AB Variations: Except as required by Article 10.4.2.2. for a wall of a service room, an air duct is permitted to penetrate a wall with membrane protection without installing a fire damper at the penetration.

AB Full: Except as specifically varied in this Part, Parts 1 to 9 apply to a building regulated by this Part.
AB Variations: Except as specifically varied in this Part, Parts 1 to 9 apply to a building regulated by this Part.

AB Full: A person involved in the alteration, repair, shutdown or impairment that affect the operation of a hydrant shall ensure that the fire department is notified, the fire department approves the alterations, repairs, shutdown or impairment, and the affected hydrant is identified in a manner acceptable to the fire department.
AB Variations: A person involved in the alteration, repair, shutdown or impairment that affect the operation of a hydrant shall ensure that the fire department is notified, the fire department approves the alterations, repairs, shutdown or impairment, and the affected hydrant is identified in a manner acceptable to the fire department.

AB Full: Stairs and seats or their edges shall be finished in a manner that contrasts with the swimming pool colour.
AB Variations: Stairs and seats or their edges shall be finished in a manner that contrasts with the swimming pool colour.

AB Full: Notwithstanding the requirements of this Subsection, a flow-through water spray park is permitted to be constructed without dressing and sanitary facilities for bathers.
AB Variations: Notwithstanding the requirements of this Subsection, a flow-through water spray park is permitted to be constructed without dressing and sanitary facilities for bathers.

AB Full: Records acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction of maintenance and inspections required by Articles 4.6.10.1. and 4.6.10.2. shall be retained in conformance with Article 2.2.1.2..
AB Variations: Records acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction of maintenance and inspections required by Articles 4.6.10.1. and 4.6.10.2. shall be retained in conformance with Article 2.2.1.2..

AB Full: If cartridge-type filters are used for a whirlpool, they shall be the surface-type designed with a maximum flow rate of 0.27 L/s/m2 of effective filter area. (See Note A-7.2.6.2.(6).)
AB Variations: If cartridge-type filters are used for a whirlpool, they shall be the surface-type designed with a maximum flow rate of 0.27 L/s/m2 of effective filter area. (See Note A-7.2.6.2.(6).)

AB Full: Where passenger elevators are used in a barrier-free path of travel, features described in Appendix E of ASME/CSA ASME A17.1-2013/CSA B44-13 Safety Code for Elevators and Escalators shall be included in their design and construction.
AB Variations: Where passenger elevators are used in a barrier-free path of travel, features described in Appendix E of ASME/CSA ASME A17.1-2013/CSA B44-13 Safety Code for Elevators and Escalators shall be included in their design and construction.

AB Full: An area or room for the rendering of first aid shall be incorporated in a water theme park.
AB Variations: An area or room for the rendering of first aid shall be incorporated in a water theme park.

AB Full: Combustible contents in interconnected floor spaces in which the ceiling is more than 8 m above the floor, shall not exceed the limit specified in Subsection 3.2.8. of Division B of the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Combustible contents in interconnected floor spaces in which the ceiling is more than 8 m above the floor, shall not exceed the limit specified in Subsection 3.2.8. of Division B of the NBC(AE).

AB Full: At least one emergency river shutdown switch shall be located at pool side for use by the supervisory staff of a leisure river.
AB Variations: At least one emergency river shutdown switch shall be located at pool side for use by the supervisory staff of a leisure river.

AB Full: Hose bibcocks shall be recessed or located away from traffic areas to avoid injury.
AB Variations: Hose bibcocks shall be recessed or located away from traffic areas to avoid injury.

AB Full: Electrical installations shall conform to the appropriate provincial or territorial regulations or municipal bylaws, or in the absence of such regulations, to CSA C22.1-18 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I except that alternatives to these requirements are permitted as described in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1) in areas other than those described in Article 5.1.2.1.
AB Variations: Electrical installations shall conform to the appropriate provincial or territorial regulations or municipal bylaws, or in the absence of such regulations, to CSA C22.1-18 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I except that alternatives to these requirements are permitted as described in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1) in areas other than those described in Article 5.1.2.1.

AB Full: All curves, turns, and tunnels within the path of a water slide flume shall be designed so that body impact with the walls of the flume or ceiling of a tunnel does not present a hazard.
AB Variations: All curves, turns, and tunnels within the path of a water slide flume shall be designed so that body impact with the walls of the flume or ceiling of a tunnel does not present a hazard.

AB Full: The thermal characteristics of log walls need not comply with this Section. (See Note A-9.36.2.1.(6).)
AB Variations: The thermal characteristics of log walls need not comply with this Section. (See Note A-9.36.2.1.(6).)

AB Full: Except as required by Sentence 7.2.7.3.(15), multiple-egress water slide flumes shall have parallel discharges or be constructed so that their centre lines do not intersect for a distance not less than 6 m from the discharge of each flume.
AB Variations: Except as required by Sentence 7.2.7.3.(15), multiple-egress water slide flumes shall have parallel discharges or be constructed so that their centre lines do not intersect for a distance not less than 6 m from the discharge of each flume.

AB Full: A water slide flume discharge system shall provide safe entry into the receiving pool.
AB Variations: A water slide flume discharge system shall provide safe entry into the receiving pool.

AB Full: Notwithstanding the installation of overhead doors for vehicular access, at least one egress door not less than 1 980 mm high and 760 mm wide, swinging on a vertical axis shall be installed to serve a storage garage. (See Note A-9.7.2.3.(1).)
AB Variations: Notwithstanding the installation of overhead doors for vehicular access, at least one egress door not less than 1 980 mm high and 760 mm wide, swinging on a vertical axis shall be installed to serve a storage garage. (See Note A-9.7.2.3.(1).)

AB Full: Except for vent risers and vertical fill piping systems, underground piping systems shall be of double-walled construction. (See Note A-4.5.6.1.(1).)
AB Variations: Except for vent risers and vertical fill piping systems, underground piping systems shall be of double-walled construction. (See Note A-4.5.6.1.(1).)

AB Full: If an underground storage tank has been out of service for more than 12 months, the tank and piping shall be tested for leakage in conformance with part 4.
AB Variations: If an underground storage tank has been out of service for more than 12 months, the tank and piping shall be tested for leakage in conformance with part 4.

AB Full: During construction of a building regulated by this Part, the constructor is jointly responsible with the owner for compliance with this Code.
AB Variations: During construction of a building regulated by this Part, the constructor is jointly responsible with the owner for compliance with this Code.

AB Full: An owner who makes application for permission to abandon a storage tank in place in accordance with Sentence 4.3.17.2.(1) shall describe in the application, the reasons why it is impracticable to remove the storage tank and provide other information that supports the application, satisfy the authority having jurisdiction that the soil under and around the storage tank has not been contaminated with petroleum product, and provide confirmation that the owner of the property is aware of the application and agrees with the plan to abandon the storage tank in place.
AB Variations: An owner who makes application for permission to abandon a storage tank in place in accordance with Sentence 4.3.17.2.(1) shall describe in the application, the reasons why it is impracticable to remove the storage tank and provide other information that supports the application, satisfy the authority having jurisdiction that the soil under and around the storage tank has not been contaminated with petroleum product, and provide confirmation that the owner of the property is aware of the application and agrees with the plan to abandon the storage tank in place.

AB Full: The depth of water in a swimming pool shall be plainly marked at the points of minimum depth, maximum depth, 1.2 m depth, and at the points of break between gentle and steep bottom slopes.
AB Variations: The depth of water in a swimming pool shall be plainly marked at the points of minimum depth, maximum depth, 1.2 m depth, and at the points of break between gentle and steep bottom slopes.

AB Full: Except for the storage of flammable liquids and combustible liquids inside a single-family dwelling unit and garages or sheds attached to these dwelling units, where storage rooms are required by Part 4 of Division B of the NFC(AE) for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids in residential occupancies, such rooms shall not be located above or below the first storey.
AB Variations: Except for the storage of flammable liquids and combustible liquids inside a single-family dwelling unit and garages or sheds attached to these dwelling units, where storage rooms are required by Part 4 of Division B of the NFC(AE) for the storage of flammable liquids or combustible liquids in residential occupancies, such rooms shall not be located above or below the first storey.

AB Full: Except for stand-alone diving tanks, the slope of the bottom of a swimming pool where the water is greater than 1.5 m deep shall be not more than 1:3.
AB Variations: Except for stand-alone diving tanks, the slope of the bottom of a swimming pool where the water is greater than 1.5 m deep shall be not more than 1:3.

AB Full: Receptacles for combustible recyclable material having a capacity greater than 0.250 m3 used within a building shall be of noncombustible, fully enclosed construction with a tight-fitting lid, or located in a storage room conforming to Article 2.4.1.2.
AB Variations: Receptacles for combustible recyclable material having a capacity greater than 0.250 m3 used within a building shall be of noncombustible, fully enclosed construction with a tight-fitting lid, or located in a storage room conforming to Article 2.4.1.2.

AB Full: A fence is not required around any portion of an outdoor private swimming pool if the top of the outside wall of the private swimming pool is not less than 1.8 m above the level of the ground outside the wall and the wall is constructed so that the only means of access to the private swimming pool is through a gate or similar facility.
AB Variations: A fence is not required around any portion of an outdoor private swimming pool if the top of the outside wall of the private swimming pool is not less than 1.8 m above the level of the ground outside the wall and the wall is constructed so that the only means of access to the private swimming pool is through a gate or similar facility.

AB Full: There shall be a physical separation of the space used by spectators and that used by bathers, with separate entrances to each.
AB Variations: There shall be a physical separation of the space used by spectators and that used by bathers, with separate entrances to each.

AB Full: Unless acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction, only two receptacles for combustible recyclable materials per suite shall be permitted in an unsprinklered building.
AB Variations: Unless acceptable to the authority having jurisdiction, only two receptacles for combustible recyclable materials per suite shall be permitted in an unsprinklered building.

AB Full: Except as required in Sentence 7.2.6.3.(3), the slope of the bottom of a swimming pool where the water is less than 1.5 m deep shall be a uniform slope not more than 1:12 for a public swimming pool and 1:10 for a semi-public swimming pool.
AB Variations: Except as required in Sentence 7.2.6.3.(3), the slope of the bottom of a swimming pool where the water is less than 1.5 m deep shall be a uniform slope not more than 1:12 for a public swimming pool and 1:10 for a semi-public swimming pool.

AB Full: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 6.10.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
AB Variations: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 6.10.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

AB Full: The flame-spread rating in a corridor and in an exit stairway from a second storey shall be not more than 25 on 90% of the ceiling surface area, and 90% of the wall surface area.
AB Variations: The flame-spread rating in a corridor and in an exit stairway from a second storey shall be not more than 25 on 90% of the ceiling surface area, and 90% of the wall surface area.

AB Full: If a single treatment plant serves 2 or more separate swimming pools, provision shall be made for measuring the flow into or from each swimming pool.
AB Variations: If a single treatment plant serves 2 or more separate swimming pools, provision shall be made for measuring the flow into or from each swimming pool.

AB Full: In addition to the barrier-free entrances required by Sentence 3.8.2.2.(2), not less than 50% of the pedestrian entrances, including the primary entrance, of a building referred to in Sentence 3.8.2.1.(1), including exterior walks leading to the entrances from a public thoroughfare and from on-site parking areas, shall be barrier-free.
AB Variations: In addition to the barrier-free entrances required by Sentence 3.8.2.2.(2), not less than 50% of the pedestrian entrances, including the primary entrance, of a building referred to in Sentence 3.8.2.1.(1), including exterior walks leading to the entrances from a public thoroughfare and from on-site parking areas, shall be barrier-free.

AB Full: Discharge of steam into, or placing heating coils directly in a swimming pool shall be prohibited.
AB Variations: Discharge of steam into, or placing heating coils directly in a swimming pool shall be prohibited.

AB Full: The owner of a leased dwelling unit shall ensure smoke alarms within the dwelling unit are tested and cleaned prior to occupancy, and provide tenants information concerning ongoing smoke alarm testing and maintenance.
AB Variations: The owner of a leased dwelling unit shall ensure smoke alarms within the dwelling unit are tested and cleaned prior to occupancy, and provide tenants information concerning ongoing smoke alarm testing and maintenance.

AB Full: Glass used in shower and bathtub enclosures shall comply with Sentence 9.6.1.4.(6).
AB Variations: Glass used in shower and bathtub enclosures shall comply with Sentence 9.6.1.4.(6).

AB Full: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.3.2.16.(2), water supplies for firefighting shall be available from a public or private water system, or water supplies that conform to the requirements of NFPA 1142-2017 Standard on Water Supplies for Suburban and Rural Fire Fighting (see Note A-3.3.2.16.(1)(b)).
AB Variations: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.3.2.16.(2), water supplies for firefighting shall be available from a public or private water system, or water supplies that conform to the requirements of NFPA 1142-2017 Standard on Water Supplies for Suburban and Rural Fire Fighting (see Note A-3.3.2.16.(1)(b)).

AB Full: No person shall purchase, store, use or supervise the use of a pyrotechnic device, unless the pyrotechnic device conforms to the requirements of NRCan R.S.C., 1985, c. E-17 Explosives Act and its Regulations, and the person is certified in accordance with NRCan R.S.C., 1985, c. E-17 Explosives Act and its Regulations.
AB Variations: No person shall purchase, store, use or supervise the use of a pyrotechnic device, unless the pyrotechnic device conforms to the requirements of NRCan R.S.C., 1985, c. E-17 Explosives Act and its Regulations, and the person is certified in accordance with NRCan R.S.C., 1985, c. E-17 Explosives Act and its Regulations.

AB Full: Daycare centres shall be constructed in conformance with the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Daycare centres shall be constructed in conformance with the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Reactive materials shall be separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.2.(2) of Division B of the NBC(AE).
AB Variations: Reactive materials shall be separated from the remainder of the building in conformance with Sentence 3.3.6.2.(2) of Division B of the NBC(AE).

AB Full: Where a standpipe system is to be installed in portions of a building under construction or alteration that are not occupied, the following shall apply: a permanent or temporary standpipe system is permitted in accordance with Clauses 5.6.1.6.(2)and 5.6.1.6.(2), the standpipe system shall be provided with conspicuously marked and readily accessible fire department connections on the outside of the building at street level and shall have at least one hose outlet at each floor, the pipe size, hose valves and water supply shall conform to Subsection 3.2.5. of Division B of the NBC(AE), the standpipe system shall, as a minimum, be securely supported and restrained on alternate floors, at least one hose valve for attaching fire department hose shall be provided at each intermediate landing or floor level in the exit stairway, valves shall be kept closed at all times and guarded against mechanical damage, the standpipe shall be not more than one floor below the highest forms, staging, and similar combustible elements at all times, and temporary standpipe systems shall remain in service until the permanent standpipe installation is complete.
AB Variations: Where a standpipe system is to be installed in portions of a building under construction or alteration that are not occupied, the following shall apply: a permanent or temporary standpipe system is permitted in accordance with Clauses 5.6.1.6.(2)and 5.6.1.6.(2), the standpipe system shall be provided with conspicuously marked and readily accessible fire department connections on the outside of the building at street level and shall have at least one hose outlet at each floor, the pipe size, hose valves and water supply shall conform to Subsection 3.2.5. of Division B of the NBC(AE), the standpipe system shall, as a minimum, be securely supported and restrained on alternate floors, at least one hose valve for attaching fire department hose shall be provided at each intermediate landing or floor level in the exit stairway, valves shall be kept closed at all times and guarded against mechanical damage, the standpipe shall be not more than one floor below the highest forms, staging, and similar combustible elements at all times, and temporary standpipe systems shall remain in service until the permanent standpipe installation is complete.

AB Full: The use of dangerous goods in a laboratory shall be confined inside a power-ventilated enclosure conforming to Articles 6.3.4.3. and 6.3.4.4. of Division B of the NBC(AE) when their use releases flammable vapours or causes runaway or potentially explosive reactions, liquids are heated to a temperature equal to or greater than their flash point, or Class I liquids or unstable liquids are used.
AB Variations: The use of dangerous goods in a laboratory shall be confined inside a power-ventilated enclosure conforming to Articles 6.3.4.3. and 6.3.4.4. of Division B of the NBC(AE) when their use releases flammable vapours or causes runaway or potentially explosive reactions, liquids are heated to a temperature equal to or greater than their flash point, or Class I liquids or unstable liquids are used.

AB Full: Smoke alarms are permitted to be battery-operated in dwelling units constructed before July 5, 1977. (See Note A-2.1.3.3.(4).).
AB Variations: Smoke alarms are permitted to be battery-operated in dwelling units constructed before July 5, 1977. (See Note A-2.1.3.3.(4).).

AB Full: Operators of self-service outlets, fuel-dispensing stations and marine fuel-dispensing stations shall inspect and maintain the cathodic protection systems on underground storage tanks and piping in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S603.1-11 External Corrosion Protection Systems for Steel Underground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids for sacrificial anode systems, or CFA PACE Report 87-1 Impressed Current Method of Cathodic Protection of Underground Storage Tanks Clause 5.5(c) and Part 6.0 for impressed current systems.
AB Variations: Operators of self-service outlets, fuel-dispensing stations and marine fuel-dispensing stations shall inspect and maintain the cathodic protection systems on underground storage tanks and piping in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S603.1-11 External Corrosion Protection Systems for Steel Underground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids for sacrificial anode systems, or CFA PACE Report 87-1 Impressed Current Method of Cathodic Protection of Underground Storage Tanks Clause 5.5(c) and Part 6.0 for impressed current systems.

AB Full: Areas for concessions, exercise or other special purposes shall not be located within the minimum surrounding deck areas required by this Code.
AB Variations: Areas for concessions, exercise or other special purposes shall not be located within the minimum surrounding deck areas required by this Code.

AB Full: Centrifugal type pumps shall not be used to transfer water contaminated with flammable liquids or combustible liquids from diked areas to a collection system.
AB Variations: Centrifugal type pumps shall not be used to transfer water contaminated with flammable liquids or combustible liquids from diked areas to a collection system.

AB Full: The freeboard for a whirlpool shall be not more than 300 mm.
AB Variations: The freeboard for a whirlpool shall be not more than 300 mm.

AB Full: A hose shall be equipped with a nozzle that is adjustable from fog to a straight stream.
AB Variations: A hose shall be equipped with a nozzle that is adjustable from fog to a straight stream.

AB Full: The clearances required by Sentence 7.2.3.13.(2) shall extend not less than 3 m on either side and in front of all diving boards and towers measured from the tip or end of the board.
AB Variations: The clearances required by Sentence 7.2.3.13.(2) shall extend not less than 3 m on either side and in front of all diving boards and towers measured from the tip or end of the board.

AB Full: Each building module conforming to this Part shall be clearly and permanently identified with a plate showing the date of construction, the name of the constructor, the address of the constructor, the model number and serial number, and the structural and mechanical design parameters.
AB Variations: Each building module conforming to this Part shall be clearly and permanently identified with a plate showing the date of construction, the name of the constructor, the address of the constructor, the model number and serial number, and the structural and mechanical design parameters.

AB Full: A fuel-fired appliance placed in a building containing sleeping accommodation shall be placed in a service room.
AB Variations: A fuel-fired appliance placed in a building containing sleeping accommodation shall be placed in a service room.

AB Full: Each horizontal log shall be scribed to fit as closely as possible to its bearer and fastened to the bearer in at least 3 places throughout its length by dowels, continuous machined joints, vertical framing members, interlocking sections or any combination of these, and the distance between fastenings shall not exceed 1.8 m.
AB Variations: Each horizontal log shall be scribed to fit as closely as possible to its bearer and fastened to the bearer in at least 3 places throughout its length by dowels, continuous machined joints, vertical framing members, interlocking sections or any combination of these, and the distance between fastenings shall not exceed 1.8 m.

AB Full: A lightning protection system, when provided, shall conform to the requirements of CSA CAN/CSA-B72-M87 Installation Code for Lightning Protection Systems
AB Variations: A lightning protection system, when provided, shall conform to the requirements of CSA CAN/CSA-B72-M87 Installation Code for Lightning Protection Systems

AB Full: Flange joints or unions shall be inserted at intervals to permit any part of the piping system to be disassembled for cleaning or repairs.
AB Variations: Flange joints or unions shall be inserted at intervals to permit any part of the piping system to be disassembled for cleaning or repairs.

AB Full: Windows shall be equipped with opening devices located not more than 60 mm above the window sill and of a design that does not require tight grasping, pinching with fingers, or twisting of the wrist as the only means of operation, and be located so that the sill is not more than 865 mm above the floor level.
AB Variations: Windows shall be equipped with opening devices located not more than 60 mm above the window sill and of a design that does not require tight grasping, pinching with fingers, or twisting of the wrist as the only means of operation, and be located so that the sill is not more than 865 mm above the floor level.

AB Full: The building shall be designed and constructed so that the acoustic insulation factor is not less than the value derived from Table 11.2.1.2.-B for each component of the exterior envelope of every living room, dining room, recreational room, and all other rooms of a similar nature, in residential occupancies.
AB Variations: The building shall be designed and constructed so that the acoustic insulation factor is not less than the value derived from Table 11.2.1.2.-B for each component of the exterior envelope of every living room, dining room, recreational room, and all other rooms of a similar nature, in residential occupancies.

AB Full: The circulation piping and fittings shall be of a non-toxic, corrosion-resistant material and able to withstand operating pressures.
AB Variations: The circulation piping and fittings shall be of a non-toxic, corrosion-resistant material and able to withstand operating pressures.

AB Full: If tie-down devices are required, the manufacturer shall provide tie-down instructions with each module specifying the location, required capacity and anchoring of recommended tie-down devices.
AB Variations: If tie-down devices are required, the manufacturer shall provide tie-down instructions with each module specifying the location, required capacity and anchoring of recommended tie-down devices.

AB Full: If the stability of adjoining buildings may be endangered by the work of excavating, adequate underpinning, shoring and bracing shall be provided to prevent damage to, or movement of, any part of the adjoining building, and the creation of a hazard to the public.
AB Variations: If the stability of adjoining buildings may be endangered by the work of excavating, adequate underpinning, shoring and bracing shall be provided to prevent damage to, or movement of, any part of the adjoining building, and the creation of a hazard to the public.

AB Full: The floor and curb of the area used by spectators shall be tightly constructed of impervious material and shall be sloped and adequately drained.
AB Variations: The floor and curb of the area used by spectators shall be tightly constructed of impervious material and shall be sloped and adequately drained.

AB Full: No person shall operate or install a combustible display or exhibit in a Group A, Division 1, 2 or 3 major occupancy unless the building is protected by an automatic sprinkler system designed and installed in conformance with the NBC(AE) or until precautions have been taken to protect the occupants from the hazards of fire. (See Note Note A-2.1.2.2.(1).)
AB Variations: No person shall operate or install a combustible display or exhibit in a Group A, Division 1, 2 or 3 major occupancy unless the building is protected by an automatic sprinkler system designed and installed in conformance with the NBC(AE) or until precautions have been taken to protect the occupants from the hazards of fire. (See Note Note A-2.1.2.2.(1).)

AB Full: Skirting shall be installed if the wall of a module is less than 15 m from the wall of another module or from another wall of the same module that forms an included angle of less than 135.
AB Variations: Skirting shall be installed if the wall of a module is less than 15 m from the wall of another module or from another wall of the same module that forms an included angle of less than 135.

AB Full: In areas subject to earthquake forces, storage tanks, supports and connections shall be designed to resist such forces in conformance with Part 4 of Division B of the NBC(AE), and Appendix A2 of ULC CAN/ULC-S601-14 Shop Fabricated Steel Aboveground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids
AB Variations: In areas subject to earthquake forces, storage tanks, supports and connections shall be designed to resist such forces in conformance with Part 4 of Division B of the NBC(AE), and Appendix A2 of ULC CAN/ULC-S601-14 Shop Fabricated Steel Aboveground Tanks for Flammable and Combustible Liquids

AB Full: A window with non-breakable glazing or that is not openable shall not be used in a sleeping area unless the window is designed and permanently marked as being of a knock-out type.
AB Variations: A window with non-breakable glazing or that is not openable shall not be used in a sleeping area unless the window is designed and permanently marked as being of a knock-out type.

AB Full: Exits shall be located so that the travel distance from any part of the building to at least one exit is not more than 25 m if the building is not sprinklered, or 40 m if the building is sprinklered.
AB Variations: Exits shall be located so that the travel distance from any part of the building to at least one exit is not more than 25 m if the building is not sprinklered, or 40 m if the building is sprinklered.

AB Full: A drainage opening shall be free from obstruction, including benches and lockers, to allow for ease of cleaning.
AB Variations: A drainage opening shall be free from obstruction, including benches and lockers, to allow for ease of cleaning.

AB Full: Except as provided in Articles 9.33.5.3. and 9.33.5.4., the installation of heating and air-conditioning equipment, including mechanical refrigeration equipment, and including provisions for mounting, clearances and air supply, shall conform to the Pressure Equipment Safety Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act, CSA B52-13 Mechanical Refrigeration Code CSA B139 Series-15 Installation Code for Oil-Burning Equipment the Gas Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act, the Electrical Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act, or CSA C448 Series-13 Design and Installation of Earth Energy Systems
AB Variations: Except as provided in Articles 9.33.5.3. and 9.33.5.4., the installation of heating and air-conditioning equipment, including mechanical refrigeration equipment, and including provisions for mounting, clearances and air supply, shall conform to the Pressure Equipment Safety Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act, CSA B52-13 Mechanical Refrigeration Code CSA B139 Series-15 Installation Code for Oil-Burning Equipment the Gas Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act, the Electrical Code Regulation made pursuant to the Safety Codes Act, or CSA C448 Series-13 Design and Installation of Earth Energy Systems

AB Full: The removal, abandonment in place, disposal or temporary taking out of service of an underground piping system shall be in conformance with Sentence 2.2.3.1.(1).. (See Note A-4.3.16.1.(1).)
AB Variations: The removal, abandonment in place, disposal or temporary taking out of service of an underground piping system shall be in conformance with Sentence 2.2.3.1.(1).. (See Note A-4.3.16.1.(1).)

AB Full: Swimming pool inlets and outlets shall be provided and arranged to produce a uniform circulation of water from the bottom to the top surface and to maintain a uniform concentration of chlorine or equivalent disinfectant throughout the swimming pool with provisions to adjust the flow through all inlets.
AB Variations: Swimming pool inlets and outlets shall be provided and arranged to produce a uniform circulation of water from the bottom to the top surface and to maintain a uniform concentration of chlorine or equivalent disinfectant throughout the swimming pool with provisions to adjust the flow through all inlets.

AB Full: A deck along the egress side of a receiving pool shall be not less than 3 m wide, have slip-resistant surfaces, and be sloped not less than 1:50 and not more than 1:25 away from the receiving pool to drainage or to deck drains.
AB Variations: A deck along the egress side of a receiving pool shall be not less than 3 m wide, have slip-resistant surfaces, and be sloped not less than 1:50 and not more than 1:25 away from the receiving pool to drainage or to deck drains.

AB Full: A drainage system shall be designed in accordance with good engineering practice.
AB Variations: A drainage system shall be designed in accordance with good engineering practice.

AB Full: For the purpose of the application of the load combinations given in Table 4.1.3.2.-A, the geotechnical components of loads and the factored geotechnical resistances at ULS shall be determined by a suitably qualified and experienced registered engineering professional. (See Note A-4.2.4.1.(3).)
AB Variations: For the purpose of the application of the load combinations given in Table 4.1.3.2.-A, the geotechnical components of loads and the factored geotechnical resistances at ULS shall be determined by a suitably qualified and experienced registered engineering professional. (See Note A-4.2.4.1.(3).)

AB Full: If a room contains not more than 1 water closet, the doorway to the room shall be provided with a full-height door that is capable of being locked from the inside, or no fewer than 2 water closets or at least 1 water closet and 1 urinal, the room shall be designed so that water closets and urinals are not visible from the entrance to the room.
AB Variations: If a room contains not more than 1 water closet, the doorway to the room shall be provided with a full-height door that is capable of being locked from the inside, or no fewer than 2 water closets or at least 1 water closet and 1 urinal, the room shall be designed so that water closets and urinals are not visible from the entrance to the room.

AB Full: Full log, interlocking, scribe-fit construction shall be designed on the basis of structural analysis, accepted tests, or standards such as ILBA 2000 Log Building Standards for Residential, Handcrafted, Interlocking, Scribe-fit Construction and ILBA 2005 Log Span Tables for Floor Joists, Beams, and Roof Support Systems
AB Variations: Full log, interlocking, scribe-fit construction shall be designed on the basis of structural analysis, accepted tests, or standards such as ILBA 2000 Log Building Standards for Residential, Handcrafted, Interlocking, Scribe-fit Construction and ILBA 2005 Log Span Tables for Floor Joists, Beams, and Roof Support Systems

AB Full: Except for specific requirements for a private swimming pool, this Section applies to public swimming pools and semi-public swimming pools, water theme parks, water spray parks, and steam rooms and sauna rooms.
AB Variations: Except for specific requirements for a private swimming pool, this Section applies to public swimming pools and semi-public swimming pools, water theme parks, water spray parks, and steam rooms and sauna rooms.
